Review Title: Great place, great location, wonderful staff
Happy Review: Great location. Wonderful amenities
Unhappy Review: Liked everything

Review Title: Good hotel, excellent location, rip off parking fee (£60 reduced to £45  for 8 hour stay)
Happy Review: Left before breakfast. Location excellent.
Unhappy Review: Astronomic car park price for one short night. Only advised of excessive charge in email 3 days prior to stay. Would have book another hotel further out if I had known at time of booking.

Happy Review: Shower excellent, room was lovely, comfortable and quiet!

Review Title: Hotel staff excellent, rooms comfortable but overpriced meals and drinks on top of expensive rooms.
Happy Review: Proximity to the airport. Comfort and cleanliness of the rooms.
Unhappy Review:
Drinks and food overpriced. 
Plastic dispensers for breakfast buffet eg storing bacon etc
Cooked breakfast either looked tired or lacked components

Review Title: Staff as helpful and pleasant as possible though
Happy Review: Given how new the hotel is and the price I was surprised by how worn and dirty some things were.Like seating in restaurent area and chairs in room The shower was backing up the drain.
Unhappy Review: It would be good given the long ramos up to the terminal for an 80 yr old to pull a suitcase for trolleys to be available at the hotelI got one the night before and brought it down - a palaver

Review Title: Very convenient comfortable hotel perfect for the tired traveller
Happy Review: Clean room, comfy bed and good quality sheets and towels. Spotlessly clean bathroom. Adequate room size. No complaints. Breakfast had a good choice. Staff went out of their way to assist.
Unhappy Review: We were quite  happy with everthing

Review Title: Given a disability access room, this had not been requested. Reception were very reluctant to change
Happy Review: Continental breakfast available due to early morning departure

Review Title: Great location but some practices are budget hotel when paying normal hotel prices
Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Prices compared to value

Happy Review: The location was great, the breakfast had everything you would want, and check out time was good.
Unhappy Review: Perhaps a small fridge in the room would be good.

Happy Review:
Room and bed very comfortable 
Location for airport excellent.
Unhappy Review:
Food.
Breakfast just OK, bacon dried out at 7 am
Evening meal , poor selection and what I ordered was cold and had no flavour.

Review Title: Clean & Comfy but take your own food!!
Happy Review: Clean, Modern, comfortable
Unhappy Review:
Restaurant and Menu!
Third time I’ve been here.
It’s the start of your holidays. 
At least provide a decent menu so we can start off as we mean to go on!

Happy Review: Really well managed hotel with good processes in place to make guests stay comfortable. The staff are the stand out attribute, clearly great training takes place and the staff were extremely helpful, and a real asset to the hotel.
Unhappy Review: The breakfast could be improved significantly. The dinner menu whilst good variety, the quality of the food has room for improvement. The desk chairs in the room were sticky, I think it’s from the type of material they are made from.

Review Title: Our stay helped us to recharge ready for our long drive home.
Happy Review: After a long flight during the night,  the hotel was much appreciated and the member of staff that greeted us was most helpful and welcoming.
Unhappy Review: Decor of our room and public areas looked dated and tired.

Review Title: Perfect location for pre flight stay
Happy Review: Free breakfast and location
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Location, very clean, comfy bed, friendly staff.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast sausage could be better quality.

Happy Review: Breakfast was fine, except for toasting machine. Better when dial adjusted.
Location
Unhappy Review: Overpriced- breakfast should not be compulsory charge for early flight

Happy Review: Close proximity to airport
Unhappy Review: The price of drinks. £11 for a glass of wine is exorbitant.

Review Title: Nice clean comfortable but very costly
Happy Review: Location bed was super comfortable
Unhappy Review: Very expensive

Happy Review: Clean, modern hotel with super friendly staff.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast could have had healthier options. Car parking expensive.

Happy Review: Fast check-in and out. Professional and helpfull staff. Room ligtning was very good. Room was clean and beds comfortamble as well as the bathroom was well equipped. Location of the hotel allowed fast access by walk to the departure hall. Thank you for a good stay.
Unhappy Review: Here only to complain a bit abot the size of the room as there was not a good space between table and bed and not comfortable to sit behingd the table.

Review Title: My Stay at Hamption by Hilton Bristol Airport
Happy Review: Hotel is very well located being a couple of minutes walk to the terminal. Staff was very friendly and chatty. Glad they had gym facility, can do some workout on the spin bike or treadmill.
Unhappy Review: The air conditioning system wasn't working in the room I was assigned, had to swap rooms and staff was helpful to sort that issue. I didn't find the bed to comfy, didn't sleep well, it felt a bit hard, in my opinion.

Happy Review: Great rooms
Unhappy Review: Had to move your car after arriving after 1 hr. Right pain especially when it's raining. Needs more choice on menu

Happy Review: Close to the airport. Clean room
Unhappy Review: the shower drain was clogged

Happy Review: Friendly accommodating staff everywhere you went who would go out of their way to help you.
Unhappy Review: Menu a little limited especially for people with dietary needs but otherwise excellent.

Happy Review: Breakfast was amazing , staff friendly ,
Unhappy Review: Hard beds

Review Title: does what it says on the can
Happy Review: basic but clean
Unhappy Review: disabled room

Happy Review:
Location excellent 
Staff friendly and efficient
Unhappy Review: Air conditioning in our room didn’t work

Review Title: Clean, convenient and comfortable.  I would stay there again
Happy Review: Clean, close to the terminal and better facilities than expected
Unhappy Review: The hotel website does not make it clear that food is available in the evening or that there is a bar so we purchased an M&S picnic which wasted some time for us.  You could make that more explicit on your website

Review Title: We had a good sleep which was the main purpose for the stay.
Happy Review: Very quiet rooms, very comfortable beds and exceptionally clean.
Unhappy Review: The take-away breakfast was poor - very unappetising - but we had no other choice as we had an early departure from the airport.

Happy Review: Ideal for its proximity to Bristol Airport for our early morning flight.
Very close to Bristol airport. Comfortable stay. Can get continental breakfast from 4m.
Unhappy Review: N/A

Happy Review: The close proximity to the airport
Unhappy Review: Not really Worth the price paid for one night, very basic & bar very expensive

Happy Review: Breakfast was basic at 5.00am.
Breakfast good.
Unhappy Review: Bedroom carpet could have been cleaner.

Review Title: I enjoyed a short restful stay with the bonus close proximity to the airport for my morning flight.
Happy Review:
Friendly, welcoming, helpful , polite members of staff. 
 Extensive selection of breakfast food and good choices of meals / snacks on other menus.
Clean, comfortable room facilities.
Unhappy Review: If rooms with baths are available , I prefer a bath and a shower.

Happy Review: Situation. Room very clean and well appointed. Dinner was good.
Unhappy Review: Poor selection for early risers needing to grab breakfast to go. Only croissants available. Also, room price expensive but balanced by ease of access to airport terminal.

Happy Review: Clean room, quiet and great breakfast
Unhappy Review: Detour in the rain as rear entrance was closed was not appreciated in the middle of the night with luggage & child in tow!

Happy Review: Breakfast was great
Unhappy Review: Fire alarm going off at 6.45am!

Review Title: Great location and as such you do pay a premium
Happy Review: Location to airport
Unhappy Review: A bit expensive

Happy Review:
Good breakfast 
Airport hotel very noisy because of lots of people leaving all time in the night and and early morning

All as expected, stayed here numerous times 
And always had the best service.
Unhappy Review: N/a

Happy Review: Friendly staff, comfortable room, good breakfast, perfect location
Unhappy Review: The price is rather high for the quality here.  It is within easy walking distance of the terminal, so perhaps worth it, but it seems to me they are milking a captive audience. I f you want to stay at Bristol airport, you have to stay here, and you are paying substantially more than the quality would otherwise demand for that.  The biggest other problem is that the parking situation is awful. The parking at Bristol is abysmal, and it would be really helpful if the hotel parking was at least competitive, pricewise. Going away for a three or four day  business trip,  you really want to be able to park at the hotel and pick up your car their upon return. At the current pricing this is not practical,

Review Title: Had a good stay would recommend
Happy Review: Had a continental breakfast was very good
Unhappy Review: More choice for evening meal

Happy Review: local tomairport
Not much
Unhappy Review: Airport hotel, captive audience, fish in a barrel to catch early flight

Review Title: Lovely, helpful staff, clean comfortable rooms and a great breakfast (and waffle irons!)
Happy Review: It was nice, modern and the rooms were lovely, clean and high quality. The room was all ready for us to stay so we just came in and went straight to bed, after a long journey.
Unhappy Review: The bed was quite firm, but that’s just personal preference. The air con in the room was a bit noisy, so we ended up switching it off.

Happy Review: Proximity from airport
Unhappy Review: Not enough milk in room

Happy Review: Food in the evening was a decent standard would have been good if they accepted cash rather than just card.

Review Title: Served its purpose for next day flight
Happy Review: Everything
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Comfortable place to stay when arroving late or leaving early
Happy Review: Walking distance from the terminal, very friendy staff, clean and good breakfast!
Unhappy Review: No family rooms - we had to book two (adjoining) roms which makes it a little pricy.

Happy Review: Early breakfast (from 4.00 am) is a great idea ! Wifi was quite fast and stable. 4-minutes walk to the Airport is a great advantage.
Unhappy Review: Price was a bit too high.

Happy Review: Very clean. Breakfast even at 4.30am
Very convenient for the terminal. Good continental breakfast at 5 AM. Comfortable room. Quiet

Review Title: Lovely hotel.  Great room and breakfast. Parking pricey
Happy Review:
I liked the helpful staff at reception. The room is very clean. Bedding comfortable. Tea facility good. No complaints at all. The room was also quiet which is very important to me. Great breakfast too.
My only complaint is we had to pay £45 for our car park in the hotel, from approximately 10 pm till 6am.  I think it’s expensive tbh.
Unhappy Review: Parking overnight was £45  - too expensive

Review Title: Great location for an overnight stay before your flight
Happy Review:
Friendly, welcoming staff at reception.  Our room was clean and comfortable.
Perfect location for an overnight stay before an early morning check in.  Breakfast was included.
Extremely convenient for airport as on site. Very quiet too. Comfortable beds, lovely linen, pillow a bit hard for me but now I’m being fussy!
Unhappy Review: I think if hadn’t got time or timing didn’t work out ,to have breakfast it would be a bit galling to have no option to not purchase breakfast as included in price.

Review Title: Excellent value for money for early transfers from Bristol airport
Happy Review: Easy to find, great accessibility to Bristol airport and super friendly and informative staff
The proximity to the airport. Clean room and given a ground floor room in view of husband’s walkingdifficulty
Unhappy Review: Nothing really. All was as expected

Review Title: Good but expensive option for connection flight for one night.
Happy Review: Really close to airport (by walk 3-5 min under roof, it was raining so it helps). Little gym, but nothing to see around. We stay just for overnight and this was ok.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast could be better for this money (we paid 200 eur per night).
Poor Food Selection

Happy Review: Breakfast buffet at 4 in the morning was excellent i I wasn't expecting anything to be open that time,considering we had to be at the the airport at 5 room was clean&comfortable
Unhappy Review: Nothing really but if  anything woukd like to see a bit more on the dinner menu as not many options

Review Title: Great staff and location, room lovely and clean. Uncomfortable pillows made for restless night.
Happy Review: Staff were lovely. Location is brilliant, food and drink were great.
Unhappy Review: We found the pillows very uncomfortable, so didn’t sleep very well.

Happy Review: Check in was fast and good, staff gave all info we needed. room was clean and comfortable. beds very comfortable. morning call was offered. breakfast has plenty of options.
Unhappy Review: no shuttle to the terminal if the weather is bad, works affected the pathway to the hotel

Happy Review: Stylish, friendly and convenient.
Unhappy Review: Can be a bit noisy still at night due to location.

Happy Review:
Ideal location
Friendly and professional staff
Would recommend
Great location, smart clean rooms and amazing staff!
Unhappy Review: All good 👍

Review Title: an ideal location when travelling from Bristol airport
Happy Review: Nice welcome near midnight and a barman still able to let us buy a whisky... After a long day's travelling.  A clean and comfortable room with air con/heating that was responsive. Satisfactory breakfast
Unhappy Review: There wasn't anything

Happy Review: Closeness to the airport
Unhappy Review: Finding out that the parking at the hotel was £45 for a night when I was already booked in to the next door multi storey for the following day. I could have just added an extra day to the parking in the multi storey.

Happy Review: Location and convenience to terminal
Unhappy Review:
The bar options and restaurant menu
Seating quality in bar/restaurant

Happy Review: Rooms good & breakfast good
Unhappy Review:
The performance to pay to get a drink at the bar.
Seemed crazy bar staff couldn't take  payment and had to go to reception to set a tab up.  
Price for it was a bit steep as well.

Review Title: Great location but painfully expensive for the time I was there.
Happy Review: Brand new hotel, nice room, 3 minute walk to airport so perfectly located.
Unhappy Review: The price!!!! You really do have to pay through the nose for the convenience of being right by the airport. But it's not like anyone will be staying for anything other than hours. It would be good if they had a different ptrice structure so that you could rent the room for 12 hours .

Review Title: Friendly staff, clean spacious rooms, clarity on suites needed
Happy Review: We loved the checking in experience - Cameron was exceptionally friendly and helpful. The rooms were spacious, clean and as expected (we booked adjoining interconnected rooms as a family suite).
Unhappy Review: The only issue was the inability to specify that we wanted one room as a,twin instead of a double. We had hoped to put the children in a twin room but instead had to do one parent one child per double bed, which didn't result in great sleep for anyone.

Review Title: Perfect for before an early flight
Happy Review: Cameron who checked us in was professional and polite, had a lovely friendly manner as he chatted to my family. Breakfast had a good selection
Unhappy Review: All okay

Review Title: Easily accessible to the airport, clean and tidy hotel
Happy Review: The flight was to early to have breakfast
Unhappy Review: A bit costly

Review Title: Couldn't be better under the circumstances of our travel.
Happy Review: Friendly and helpful staff. Easy checking in even though we arrived late. Decent breakfast & comfortable room to fall into when arriving exhausted. Thank you.
Unhappy Review: The common seating area could have been better cleaned.

Happy Review: The first time we stayed at this location, very convenient as our arrival was late. We were impressed. The room was very loved the bed and shower. The breakfast was nice.
Unhappy Review: No decaffeinated coffee in the room.

Happy Review: friendly and very central
Unhappy Review: No issues

Happy Review: so handy for the airport - we dragged off a late flight into the hotel in minutes to catch up with our sleep. The nightime staff on reception were lovely.
Unhappy Review: we weren't sure whether we could eat late so bought sandwiches in the airport before coming over. breakfast is served until 10 - a little later would be helpful given the comings and goings of people using this type of hotel (& the price)

Happy Review: So close to airport room and food was great

Review Title: Excellent location the hotel cleanliness was excellent
Happy Review:
Location, cleanliness, the room, and food was great. 
I would certainly use this hotel again.
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Ideal for our purposes would be happy to stay there again if flying from Bristol Airport.
Happy Review: Very friendly and helpful staff, great breakfast selection even very early in the morning. The room was clean and had everything we needed for our short stay. Proximity to Bristol airport was ideal.
Unhappy Review: Being unable to pay cash for drinks and food.

Happy Review: Location excellent. Always clean and comfortable. Lovely  quality toiletries and spacious shower with shower head not fixed which is great for washing hair without drowning.  Varied buffet breakfast.  Dinner available in the evening fortunately as nothing else around and fair price at around £15 for a main. Nice wine stocked too 😂
Unhappy Review: One odd thing. The bathroom sink is set quite far back in its surround. Have to lean quite far in which is a bit uncomfortable.  Be nice to have a magnifying mirror if possible one day.

Review Title: Well worth taking the stress out of an early flight
Happy Review: Perfect

Review Title: Comfortable hotel marred by parking charge
Happy Review: Disgusting price for parking unexplained in website. Would never book again £60 to park in a hotel car park!!!!
Unhappy Review: Rip off parking could never recommend hotel to others

Review Title: very good, convenient, evening meal disappointing
Happy Review: room breakfast
Unhappy Review: evening meal

Happy Review: Very convenient next to the airport when having an early flight. Room was tidy and had everything needed for a one night stay. Quiet and quite comfy beds. The staff at reception the were very pleasant.
Unhappy Review: The breakfast. Ok it is a part of the price you pay when you stay (we paid £154 for one night) but compared to other hotels who offer this I would expect a bit better quality when paying that amount per night. Everything seemed very unhealthily greasy especially the hash browns!

Happy Review: Proximity to terminal. All good.
Unhappy Review: The bed

Review Title: Very relaxing - perfect way to start our holiday
Happy Review: Room was quiet, bed very comfortable.  Did not have breakfast due to early flight, but had a drink and meal in the bar the previous evening.  Drinks and meals were lovely.
Strategic position, very friendly staff and spacious room with everything you may need.
Unhappy Review: Quite expensive obviously because it’s literally next to the terminal. What I found ridiculous is the 45 £ parking fee for a hotel guest that arrives at 21.00 and leaves at 08.00. That is a total rip-off, the rest is fair overall, including the restaurant and bar (not bad at all)

Happy Review:
WE had an early flight so it took the pressure off in the morning as it's a short walk through to the terminal. 
Basic but good. Food was OK so it was fine for what we needed.
Unhappy Review: Fine for what we needed

Review Title: Have been previously, and the price has increased, but not the eating experience.
Happy Review: The room was fine. The food was overpriced.  Chairs somewhat uncomfortable for eating.
Unhappy Review: Lower prices for the standard received.

Happy Review: Location is very convenient for late arrivals/ early departures. Lovely buffet breakfast
Unhappy Review:
A little pricey. 
The receptionist told us to go to the short stay carpark to get an Uber but Uber told us that we could have waited in the warm hotel as they come in and validate the hotel car park ticket :(

Happy Review:
We liked the proximity to the airport.
Drinks were reasonable prices and good quality drinks.
Very friendly staff.
Carole and the younger lad behind the bar. Sorry I didn't catch your name.
We had a wake up call too as we had an early flight.
Also breakfast was served from 4 am which was perfect to grab some coffee before we left.
Unhappy Review:
The bar / lounge area wasn't very warm.
The food wasn't the best. I only had a toasted sandwich.

Review Title: Easy airport access perfect for young families
Happy Review: Perfect location to stay with our toddler before an earlier flight. Breakfast was easy to access and staff were brilliant.
Location , comfortable bed, good shower , well maintained,service was efficient and it ticked all the boxes for catering.

Review Title: Comfortable hotel to stay in if arriving late, or leaving from the airport early.
Happy Review: The location next to the airport was very convenient. The staff were pleasant and helpful. The toom was totally silent so the soundproofing was perfect. The bed was very comfortable. The noticeboard for the flights was very useful.
Unhappy Review:
The television had no access to Netflix or other apps which was a bit frustrating.
The reception and dining area felt chilly, and the decor was too grey and uniform.

Happy Review: Close to airport. Breakfast was good. Room was ideal.
Unhappy Review: Cost of parking

Happy Review: The staff were very friendly
Unhappy Review: Nothing came to mind

Review Title: This is a very good location near the airport
Happy Review: I liked the croissants and coffee
Well designed and comfortable room, bed and shower room.  Close to the airport so very convenient for our trip to and from Málaga
Unhappy Review: The lunchtime food menu was not good and very little choice for people with allergies.  Very expensive also.

Happy Review:
Location 
Breakfast 
Room

Unhappy Review: Unable to open a window due to building work

Review Title: First stay, so pleased with the location and accommodation.
Happy Review: Clean, modern, comfortable bed, lovely bathroom. Very short, easy walk from departures/arrivals
Unhappy Review: Nothing, perfect for an airport stay

Happy Review: Staff very friendly with my daughter
Unhappy Review: Food was awful, cheesy chips must of been done in a microwave they were all congealed together, daughter had mac and cheese that had grease running off it

Happy Review: Perfect location for overnight stay at airport

Review Title: Have stayed a few times now and always find it comfortable and qiet in roowish we could book direct.
Happy Review: Liked room, staff, breakfast.
Unhappy Review:
Usually get better price NOT booking direct.
Would like better choice for meals and perhaps better presented.
Walk from Terminal so far at present (realise the building going on) especially at our age (Seniors) but got assistance to Terminal when leaving.

Review Title: Lovely rooms - eat before you arrive
Happy Review: Lovely room, nice clean and comfortable. The staff member who checked us in was lovely. Very close to the airport making it very easy for our 7am flight, expensive for a nights stay however for the convenience it was worth the price.
Unhappy Review:
The food. 
Very expensive poor quality food, had I known it would be the case we probably would have eaten before arrival. £40 for 2 Pepsis, 1 panini and a very tasteless chicken korma. I wouldn’t mind the price had the food been good. 
The young girl on the bar I dealt with was also quite rude, when I asked if I could pay cash she literally laughed in my face and said “there’s literally a sign right there that says card only” pointing at it. 
The smallest printed sign on front of the till, no mention of it on the menus. Rooms great, food definitely needs improvement.

Happy Review: We have stayed here since it opened , it has a lovely atmosphere
Unhappy Review: It has gone up in price quite a bit

Review Title: Apart from the works  - perfect - staying again!
Happy Review: Proximity to airport
Unhappy Review:
Unfortunately major works meant a walk around the road which lugging a heavy case was not ideal.
Still not far but not ideal when it says its a two minute walk to the airport and in fact maybe six - in the rain!

Happy Review: The location of course, right next to the airport
Unhappy Review: We’ve stayed at this hotel several times and the big thing that lets it down  every single time is the poor quality of the food. It really is not good. Considering the price of the hotel, it should be much better.

Review Title: Very convenient and glad of early breakfast
Happy Review: Location for airport was reason for booking
Unhappy Review: Bath in room

Review Title: Excellent location for flights with very nice clean and comfortable rooms
Happy Review: Clean - location - excellent bed - very nice bathroom - staff were helpful
Unhappy Review: The breakfast breads could be a bit more varied. It’s a solid but not exciting breakfast

Happy Review: Had very early flight, so convenient. Very comfortable and easy check-in/out.
Unhappy Review: There is no undercover walkway and it was raining, arriving and leaving!

Happy Review: easy walk to airport
Unhappy Review: price

Happy Review: Most of it
Unhappy Review: Supper

Happy Review: Good hotel and team
Unhappy Review: Dragging bags around due to airport works

Review Title: Very convenient for airport not sure if I’d stay
Happy Review: Convenient location.  Nice rooms
Unhappy Review: Check in took nearly an hour even with a booking confirmation and was very a stressful process. Staff were quite vacant and service was extremely slow even though it was not that busy. Rooms were very nice but reception area was like a departure lounge. Strange post office style queuing system by the bar. Very expensive.

Review Title: Room styling exceeded expectations. Shower excellent. Lots of pillows.
Happy Review: Location good. Would have preferred muesli to cornflakes.
Unhappy Review: Cereal selection

Review Title: A perfect way to start your holiday. Very close to terminal; clean and comfortable. And no aircraft noise.
Happy Review: Exceptionally clean. Very helpful and friendly staff.
Unhappy Review: Maybe a packet of biscuits on the room would be nice.

Review Title: Complete the covered walk to the terminal and this would be great improvement on a very nice hotel.
Happy Review:
Very comfortable room, cleanliness excellent, staff friendly and helpfull, although some of the reception staff seemed a little inexperienced.
Location very good.  Meals (breakfast and dinner) satisfactory.
Unhappy Review:
The sliding door on the toilet/shower room (there would have been room for a conventional hinged door).  On opening the door to the toilet, it covered the wardrobe access.
A big problem was the lack of a full covered walkway to the airport terminal.  Only about one third was covered and we were soaked after the 2-3 minute walk.

Happy Review: Free breakfast was good.  Sadly on the outward journey early banging from building works
Checked in and was given a key to a room already occupied. Complained and got a free dinner. Went to the bar later and paid £15!!!!!!!!!!!!!! for a large scotch.
Unhappy Review: The price of a large scotch

Review Title: Very handy for the terminal building
Happy Review: Convenient, clean & good facilities
Unhappy Review: Expensive

Happy Review: Excellent and friendly staff
Unhappy Review: Evening meals are basic but that's probably fine for an airport hotel.

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Long walk from the hotel to the airport pushing a heavy suitcase. Please install a more direct route so people do not have to walk all the way around the car park.

Happy Review:
Room 
Staff
Unhappy Review: Shower drain seemed to be partially blocked

Review Title: Comfortable and quiet hotel in convenient location
Happy Review: Despite being so close to the airport it was very quiet in the room . Comfortable beds so had a good few hours sleep before our flight . Early breakfast .
Unhappy Review: A bit pricey for one night stay .

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Cooked breakfast is poor quality

Review Title: Good and would use this hotel again when next in Bristol
Happy Review: Great Location and lovely room
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Comfortable overnight stay in perfect airport location
Happy Review: Location, comfort, and professional and friendly staff.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast - vegetarian sausages were horrible. Linda McCartney or Richmond meatless sausages are far superior and inexpensive. No soya milk.

Happy Review: Well situated for early morning start. Modern well equipped comfortable room
Unhappy Review: Bit pricey

Happy Review:
Breakfast 
Room 
Atmosphere in bar
Proximity to Bristol Airport terminal building
Convenience to departures. Nice breakfast from very early. Clean quiet room
Unhappy Review: Nil

Review Title: Value for money hotel located close to airport
Happy Review: Hotel was very clean and all staff I spoke with professional & friendly
Unhappy Review: Due to the on going building works the walk to the hotel from airport following the directions along the road was much longer than expected and would suggest difficult for older travellers. Cash not being excepted to pay for food and drinks was a surprise.

Happy Review: all

Location for airport. Asked for a lower room as don't use lifts and was offered an easy access room. The room turned out to be a fully disabled room which had a very clinical smell and having stayed here before was not up to the normal standard.
Unhappy Review:
Arrived late and decided to have a drink in the bar but sadly none of the tables had been cleaned. The staff were removing glasses from tables and leaving notices on them asking people to bear with them until they wiped the tables
 Couldn't really understand why this couldn't be done at the time of clearing

Happy Review:
Proximity to airport. 
Comfortable 
Good facilities
Unhappy Review: The bar seemed slow and badly organised

Happy Review: Close to airport
Unhappy Review: Very poor menu

Happy Review: Its convenient for the airport
Unhappy Review: Price a bit high. And a glass of wine is costly

Happy Review: On the airport. Decent breakfast. Staff helpful and friendly.
Unhappy Review: Bed quite hard. Room was cold on arrival and heating had been turned up high to get it warm but then would be too hot - the temperature on the thermostat did not seem to be working properly. Shower not very hot.

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Restaurant?

Happy Review: Modern and clean
Unhappy Review: Uncovered access from airport to hotel

Review Title: Good for travellers using the airport
Happy Review: Early breakfast from 4am with hot breakfast from 6pm.
Unhappy Review:
Limited choice of menu for evening meal. 
Thought hotel price was a bit high.

Happy Review: Excellent stop over for flight from Bristol. Continental breakfast was fine for a very early flight. Very quiet, clean and comfortable. Staff very helpful.

Review Title: Great peace of mind & relaxing start when taking an early flight.
Happy Review: Great choice of breakfast at very early time
Unhappy Review: With the problem of access to hotel currently limited to door from carpark only.  When you have a heavy suitcase & you are over 65 there should be some sort of  shuttle offered to reach airport . It’s a steeper & longer climb than from the front door.

Review Title: Breakfast fruit was off. Surfaces in the bedroom had not been wiped properly. Staff were excellent.
Happy Review: Still feels new. Reasonably well maintained.
Unhappy Review: Location

Review Title: Fab stay as rooms were great. Great beds and pillows were comfortable.
Happy Review: Food was great and beds were super comfortable.
Staff were extremely helpful, very comfortable generally, Breakfast was good and it was all surprisingly nice for an airport hotel. Evening food prices were reasonable.
Unhappy Review: Evening food was ok but not oustanding.

Review Title: Served the purpose after a late flight arrival
Happy Review: Convenience; quiet

Review Title: Friendly staff, clean room and good breakfast
Happy Review: Breakfast was excellent.
Unhappy Review: Only having one comfy chair in the bedroom

Happy Review: Everything
Unhappy Review: No shuttle service to the airport terminal which is more important during the building works as the walkway is closed. Took us 20minutes pushing 3 suitcases up a long hill in the rain at 4am

Review Title: Clean comfortable hotel close to airport.
Happy Review: Staff very attentive. Close to airport

It is just next to the terminal !! Very handy !!
Very comfy travelling with children !!!

Review Title: Great for early starts at the airport!
Happy Review: Friendly staff, great location and quiet rooms despite proximity to the airport
Unhappy Review: Food selection was fairly limited, and also a little utilitarian

Review Title: The best option for overnight at Bristol airports
Happy Review: Easy to reach from the airport, very clean and well equipped room .
Convenient for airport.
Unhappy Review: Evening food was not good with a very processed limited menu.

Happy Review: Easy access to airport
Unhappy Review:
Lucily we had parking already in the Airport as it was £55 per night at the hotel
Road works made access not so easy

Happy Review: Ideal for early morning flight
Unhappy Review: A long walk due to building work around hotel

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Very cold

Review Title: Early flight so good to have a nice room and breakfast.

Review Title: So so convenient for an early bird flight.
Happy Review:
I travel to Jerez de la Frontera regularly to do flamenco classes with teachers there. Not exactly leisure nor work. It’s a long journey and to save time and money I invariable catch a very early flight. I can then travel on from Malaga to Seville and then Jerez. The hotel stay makes that possible and I can leave the car in the Silvee parking and go to bed in comfort. The breakfast in the morning is a bit grundgy - but I do have a particular diet (no dairy milk, no factory bread, only organic). It is included with the price though. 
This time we had to take a long detour walking to avoid building work. Never mind all wirth it.
Unhappy Review: The staff are great. The rooms excellent.

Review Title: Overall worth booking if you’ve got an early flight. Good facilities and no noise considering so close to airport.

Unhappy Review: Quite expensive.

Unhappy Review: N/A

Review Title: Absolutely fine and the croissant were really good
Happy Review: The hotel is clean and comfortable. Croissant at breakfast were good. The rooms are comfortable. The price I think is high for what is basically a upmarket Premier Inn. However, it is the only hotel by the airport so I can fully appreciate why there is a premium. We chose to pay the price as my husband had an early flight and we wanted to be as close as possible to the airport. We could have stayed at the Clifton Gorge Hotel Du Vin for the same price which would have been much more of a 'special' stay but as we basically just wanted a bed for the night this was fine. It is a hotel that offers what it says it will do. The staff member I dealt with at check-in was very friendly and helpful.
Unhappy Review: Very small thing but I was surprised that there was only standard tea or coffee sachets in the room. I would have liked a green/peppermint/ or something similar before going to bed.

Review Title: Very handy so close to airport but overpriced
Unhappy Review: Internet was very limited access.

Happy Review: Nice, clean and easy to access from the airport.
Unhappy Review:
Arrived a little earlier (before 2pm - which check in time). I was informed to await to 1pm so they will ensure that I can get my room. Came to reception to check in at 1.15pm but suddenly were asked to pay additional fee since I arrived before 2pm (= 20 pounds). 
Better situation awareness is needed - especially comparing to other Hilton Garden hotel - Birmingham which I stayed same week.

Happy Review: Convenient location
Unhappy Review: Not much

Review Title: Nice room, good location but not without issues.
Happy Review: The beds are really comfy, rooms spacious and airy. Lovely bathroom. Breakfast was good. The location couldn't have been any better, literally just across the road from the terminal building.
Unhappy Review: We had an issue with our room when we checked in. I won't go into details but the night manager seemed quite mortified by it. The next day we were given a can of pop and a bar of chocolate each by way of an apology. I think given the nature of our complaint and how much we paid for the room, this seemed a little insulting.

Happy Review:
I bought an excellent burger and chips for my evening meal. But more of a choice of a set menu, more formal, evening meal which I would expect from a "Hilton" hotel instead of "fast food" would have been preferable.
Breakfast was good, although the English breakfast could have started a little earlier because of early flights.
I could not fault the room, clean and warm and even though just yards from the runway - no noise from aircraft!!!
Usually not a hassle to get from the hotel to the departure lounge - but difficult when the site is being upgraded.
Unhappy Review:
The only fault I can state is the fact that, even though it was beyond the hotel's control, the area around the departure/arrival terminals were being, so called "upgraded".
I believe that the hotel could have offered customers a free system for them and their baggage to have been taken to and from the terminals, instead of the 10 - 12 minute convoluted walk, when the walk would usually have taken 2-3 minutes! Wouldn't have been a problem except for the fact it was pouring with rain!! And a taxi for the 500 metre ride was quoted at £15!!!

Happy Review: The friendly staff and it was easy to walk to and from the airport terminal.
Unhappy Review: Air conditioning was to high making sleep a little uncomfortable.

Happy Review: Rooom was cold and unheated
Unhappy Review: Being cold in a premium priced property
