Unhappy Review: Bit pricey  but airport hotels usually are due to location.

Happy Review: New hotel very comfortable and clean.large beds.nice food at reasonable prices.
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Room, bed and pillows, staff.
Unhappy Review: Expensive bar and food. Bit chilly in bar/restaurant

Happy Review: Room was very nice
Unhappy Review: Long trek from the terminal due to road works

Review Title: Good once we found how to get to it.
Happy Review: Convenient to airport
Unhappy Review: The pathway to the hotel from the airport was dreadful. The surface was bad for suitcase wheels and the signage was haphazard.

Not having trolleys available to take multiple cases to airport.  Had to walk to airport to find some and then bring them back to load up.
No sound on TV BBC1

Review Title: Great location for an early flight, but you pay a premium for the location
Happy Review: Excellent location for an early flight at Bristol Airport.  Room clean, well equipped, comfortable and quiet.  Early breakfast available at 4am.  Friendly staff.
Unhappy Review: Expensive

Happy Review: I feel the room was overpriced compared to previous stays.
Location excellent and staff very nice
Unhappy Review: Cleanliness wasn’t great- hairs in the bed etc and it was expensive for what it was, even if location was great

Happy Review: It was comfortable and clean, and the staff were friendly.
Unhappy Review: The car park should be free for guests,  the fact it's airport property is a you problem not a me problem and charging excessive fees for parking makes you look very bad 👎

Happy Review: Perfect location (easy access to the airport), clean and big room, very comfortable bed and pillows, helpful staff.
Unhappy Review: All good

Happy Review: I needed somewhere to stay at the airport last minute after plans changed and this was ideal. The staff were friendly and the room spacious, clean and comfortable. It gave me peace of mind.
Unhappy Review: Everything was fine.

Review Title: Very good, I will use this hotel in the future.
Happy Review: Reception. Food. Comfort.
Unhappy Review: Lack of hotel directions in multi-storey car park.

Happy Review:
24 hour reception 
Comfortable bed
Unhappy Review:
Uninspiring breakfast 
Rather expensive

Happy Review: Great location,  excellent staff and rooms were comfortable.
Unhappy Review: The menu in the bar area wasn't very good.

Review Title: Clean and comfortable room with very good staff at the bar and restaurant .
Happy Review: Location was good for the airport but unfortunately getting into the airport was difficult due to all the work on the transport system changes.
Unhappy Review: As above

Review Title: Due to its location will stay again, but not the 'whow' factor I  expected.
Happy Review: Easy access to Bristol Airport.
Unhappy Review: Communal seating areas were very impersonal. Thought that for a top rated hotel that the facilities could have been more 'luxutious'.

Review Title: Perfect overnight stay, shame not room service
Happy Review: Clean and comfortable
Unhappy Review: No room service

Review Title: Ideal for a stay prior to an early morning flight
Happy Review:
The hotel was very clean with helpful and friendly staff 
Service in the restaurant was quick and of reasonable quality 
Room was clean with a reasonable bathroom and shower although a little small
Unhappy Review:
The price for the room I thought was a little overpriced but I suspect that’s the price you pay for a hotel at an airport 
The price of the food was a little expensive to

Happy Review: Everything was fine and welcomed by Ali.
Unhappy Review: Would prefer the option of no breakfast

Happy Review: Everything as is very convenient
Unhappy Review: Nothing it serves a purpose

Happy Review:
Proximity to the airport 
Clean newly refurbished 
Comfortable bed 
Quiet 
Friendly
Unhappy Review: All good

Review Title: Convenient location for an early flight
Happy Review: Comfort, general layout, breakfast
Unhappy Review: Duvet was a bit thin for time of year (felt cold during night)

Happy Review:
Comfortable bed
Brad in reception very helpful at checkout due to taxi issues
Unhappy Review:
Walk from airport too long due to exterior works. Workmen drilling at 9am…
Unable to process my credit card via booking. com due to their “machine not working”.. stressful check in procedure

Happy Review: Location although lots of roadworks,  which could be managed better
Unhappy Review: The price is excessive

Review Title: I would stay again but wouldn’t eat
Happy Review: Location apart from the building works beside the property
Unhappy Review: Food,very limited, basic ,poor menu

Review Title: perfect end to a great holiday
Happy Review: Comfortable beds, very clean, great shower, friendly staff.
Unhappy Review: cooked breakfast a little disappointing

Review Title: Absolutely worth staying here the night before an early flight! Quiet, lovely, comfortable room.
Happy Review: Very clean and modern facilities, welcoming atmosphere
Unhappy Review: The quality of the food available was not geared towards healthy eating. It would be nice to be able to have a more ‘healthy’ meal before travelling.

Happy Review: Perfect location to catch flight early next day
Unhappy Review: Room was nice beds were confy

Happy Review: Proximity to airport and comfort. Breakfast was also good.
Unhappy Review: Redirection from airport (I realise that this is temporary during works) as these meant quite a long walk from the property

Review Title: Very pleasant 1 night stay but can be expensive
Happy Review: Great location by the airport
Unhappy Review: Price could have been better

Review Title: An excellent place to stay if you have a flight from Bristol airport
Happy Review:
Ecelent car parking, 
Organization of disabled transport to terminal for my wife. 
Allocation of ground floor room as my wife's walking is poor
Great that breakfast started at 4am as we had an early morning staff
Excellent bar staff
Unhappy Review:
Front desk very busy at peak periods
Room rather smelly when we first went in
AirCon/Heating a challenge
Construction at airport meant a long walk with luggage to terminal (this was not the hotels' fault)

Review Title: Comfy and quiet hotel close to airport
Happy Review: Close to airport, quiet and comfortable rooms, spacious bar/restaurant
Unhappy Review: Inflexible on booking cancellations, expensive for what is a glorified Premier Inn

Review Title: Handy for an early morning flight.
Happy Review: Clean, comfortable, easy airport access.
Unhappy Review: The shower wasn’t working properly.

Review Title: Great place to stay if you are flying out early in the morning.
Happy Review: Good breakfast, beds are very comfortable.
Unhappy Review: The walk across the car park is a bit tricky due to ongoing work.

Happy Review: Staff were very welcoming
Unhappy Review: The walk from the hotel to the tunnel to go to the airport. Was very dark. As a woman on her own, was not good.
Food very basic eg burgers curry etc. a steak would be good or a salad! Not cheap food but motorway service standard. Most of us off on holiday would prefer something better. And healthier.

Happy Review: Close to the airport, The breakfast was really good.
Unhappy Review: Nothing.

Happy Review: At the airport but roadworks so long wet walk to departures
Unhappy Review: As above

Happy Review: Pleasant and helpful staff member on arrival even though it was 1.30am.. room had everything needed for overnight stay .. great breakfast and lovely staff on check out
Unhappy Review: sign posting from terminal  due to construction is poor and needs more lightning .. dark and wet on arrival and was difficult to see how to get to hotel

Happy Review: Handy for the airport, quick food service
Unhappy Review: Extra bed in family room was uncomfortable

Review Title: Ok as a transient hotel you would not want to stay otherwise
Happy Review: Close to airport
Unhappy Review: Current problems with walkway to airport making it harder to drag a suitcase uphill with no reduction in rates due to this issue.

Review Title: Useful for early departures and late arrivals
Happy Review: Close to the airport
Unhappy Review: Because of the building works on the airport the walk from airport to Hotel is longer and uncovered.  Not great when you arrive and it’s raining and you have 2 hold bags and 2 cabin bags after a 5 week stay out of the country.

Happy Review: Our rooms were booked for the wrong dates by Booking.com - but the Hilton did manage to find us a room for the night and although we didnt get two rooms they did give us one for the 3 of us which was find and didnt charge us, so I was grateful for that.
Unhappy Review: Booking.com messed up and booked us for the wrong nights - so we didnt get the two rooms I had booked - but just one. Our room wasn't that clean (snot on the wall - yuck) but as we were so tired we just ignored it. Food was pretty awful for the price and too early to have breakfast.

Review Title: Very good hotel at airport, but pity about access pathway diversion due to renovation of car parking.
Happy Review: Proximity to airport, early Continental breakfast and standard of facilities.
Unhappy Review:
The tortuous path to get to it from the airport building due to the renovations of airport parking. 
Bathroom has nowhere to hang towels after you shower.

Happy Review: Convenience and excellent friendly staff
Unhappy Review: Expensive

Review Title: Apart from the coffee I liked everything.
Happy Review: I liked everything except the coffee machine.
Unhappy Review: I think it would be good to have proper coffee to start the day. Coffee from a machine always tastes awful.  I didn't bring a car but I think the car park is too expensive.

Happy Review: Thought I would hear planes going in and out, but somehow, no noise!
Unhappy Review: Queing up to register. Had to wait a good while, at registration desk.

Happy Review: Location

Review Title: Great overnight stay ready for an early morning flight.
Happy Review: Very welcoming, great location very close to the terminal. Room was lovely, bed comfy and bathroom immaculate.
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review:
Close to airport 
Convenient parking
Unhappy Review: Cost of parking could have been included in price for at least 1 or2 nights.  Other hotels give substantial discount or free parking  if staying longer than one night

Happy Review: Very comfortable
Unhappy Review: Price per room

Happy Review:
Excellent service from staff, they could not have been more helpful.
Check-in was easy.
Room and bathroom comfortable and clean.
Unhappy Review:
Duvet so thin that I had to put on socks!
Cooked breakfast - I would expect fried and/ or poached eggs, not scrambled; neither do hard-boiled ones suffice.

Review Title: Great Staff, Clean, Beds need making more comfy xx
Happy Review: Staff friendly and proffesional
Unhappy Review: I shared a room with my daughter as we had an early flight. I slept in the sofa bed. It was very hard and uncomfortable.

Happy Review: Close to terminal
Unhappy Review:
Expensive 
Not much food choice 
Not even a reduced parking incentive

Review Title: Pleasant stay but could do better
Happy Review: The reception / checking in personnel were polite and helpful. Breakfast was plentiful and nice seating area and enjoyable.
Unhappy Review: We ate in the restaurant, although limited choices the food was acceptable but nothing special. The room seemed quite basic for a Hampton by Hilton, the bathroom could do with more hooks to hang your clothing, towels and more room to place toiletries on seemed limited on places to put your belongings. The bed seemed small for a king room.

Happy Review: The location was very convenient, the room was comfortable and clean. The staff were very helpful.
Unhappy Review: The only drawback for our stay was that there was a lot of work being carried out in the airport  grounds therefore the distance to walk was much further , so less convenient.

Happy Review: Breakfast since 4am
Unhappy Review: One side of the bed kept dropping me out the bed due to bent mattress

Review Title: One night as very early start at airport. Breakfast from 4 am so able to eat something before we left. Staff very helpfu
Happy Review: Close to airport.

Review Title: Difficult and tricky. All our clothes are soaking.
Happy Review: It was refreshing to see everything you needed was there, and the staff were exceptional
Unhappy Review: The problem is that Bristol Airport is undergoing major infrastructure changes and it took over an hour to drive from the main road to the hotel. We then had to do bag drop in the airport and the walk was 10 minutes in pouring rain with no canopy shelter. we had the same journey in the morning to the airport in the pouring rain. We are going on a cruise so had four bags to drag through and made paths. It was very dangerous on the roads approaching the hotel with people resorting to walking in the dark in the rain with no street lights. The car rental place took nearly an hour to get from the hotel to drop off and back again. Had we known this we would’ve stayed somewhere else.

Review Title: Good- staff, clean room, pretty good value. Breakfast good. Dinner only fair in my book.
Happy Review: Clean
Unhappy Review: The long walk to the hotel from the airport and back. No shuttle service. Cab £42 each way, not good!.

Review Title: So convenient for airport with very early flight. Noted continental breakfast available from 0400..
Happy Review: Room was perfect. Up to expectation.
Unhappy Review: Rather expensive for single occupancy.

Review Title: Would use again if flight time necessitated a stay.
Happy Review: Great little airport hotel.
Unhappy Review:
Disappointed by poor breakfast - not the best continental offering.
No cooked option available until 6am

Happy Review: The room was excellent so were the staff .breakfast very good
Unhappy Review: We booked  the hotel due to the location being very close to the terminal however due to works being carried out its is a nightmare to get to on foot deffinatly not suitable for most people young families elderly or the disabled in particular with no shuttle assistance available which  caused myself and wife alot of anxiety which after strenuously complaining to the hotel they did arrange disabled assistance which should have already been in place ..apart from that the hotel is fine in all other respects

Happy Review: Comfortable, convenient stay very close to the airport building.

Review Title: Convenient, clean and a good family breakfast included
Happy Review: Location, breakfast, cleanliness
Unhappy Review: We had multiple payment amounts pending in bank.  This was resolved within 48 hours but the total was pending 3 times resulting in over a £1000 pending in my bank account

Happy Review: The location and cleanliness. But the construction works around make the walk quite long.Lovely staff.
Unhappy Review: Sausages undercooked.

Happy Review: Location to airport, lovely clean and modern rooms

Review Title: Relaxing and a great way to start out break
Happy Review: Great location ideal for pre flight stay staff friendly and helpful

Review Title: Apart from the menu, everything was really good and the staff are fantastic and super helpful!
Happy Review: Convenient, clean, modern and great staff!
Unhappy Review: The limited menu was not very good.

Happy Review: Convenience to the airport especially for early morning flights
No breakfast
Unhappy Review: Friendlier staff

Review Title: Very good hotel - if you can find it
Happy Review: nice modern hotel with all the facilities you might want
Unhappy Review: Well the problem for me was getting to the hotel. It's hidden away behind the multistory car park.  Because of the work going on at Bristol Airport, you had to follow signs which weren't obvious to begin with!

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Maintenance works.

Review Title: Fantastic choice for overnight stay before travel
Happy Review: Welcoming staff 🙂. Great atmosphere and fantastic breakfast 👍🏻
Unhappy Review: Pillows a little hard

Review Title: perfect apart from we were tired from flight 1.30am so misheard breakfast time😬
Happy Review:
location
clean
very comfortable
Unhappy Review:
no fridge 
breakfast finished at 10am (we thought it was 10.30am so were 7 mins late for breakfast so missed it😭)

Review Title: Convenient - but not as convenient as my last stay
Happy Review: Clean and tidy
Unhappy Review: Building works mean it’s not really an easy walk in the middle of the night and certainly not well lit and signposted. This work is extensive so travellers should be made aware on booking

Review Title: Good option if one has an early or late flight
Happy Review: Great location with a possibility to check in any time. Comfortable rooms. Good shower and beds.
Unhappy Review: Very expensive. Breakfast could have been better.

Review Title: Apart from the debit card problem, the stay was as expected.
Happy Review: The room, the staff and the breakfast
Unhappy Review:
The evening meal selection.
The now extended walk from the airport
The fact that my debit card (despite being perfectly valid and used that very evening in the restaurant0 was declined and I had to use a different one.

Happy Review: The situation. Friendly staff....clean and welcoming. Good ample breakfast.
Unhappy Review: £9 for a glass of wine!!!! Somewhat OTT...... Wine definitely to be avoided in the future!

Review Title: Our first stay at this hotel
Happy Review: Was great. Amazing bathroom and room.was huge for the three of us.

Review Title: Great if you can find it from the terminal ???
Happy Review: all fine will use again
Unhappy Review: The directions from the airport left alot to desire at one in the morrning having followed the guide ended up in the car park???

Happy Review: Staff were excellent, rooms are lovely and the soaps etc provided
Unhappy Review: The path to the hotel from the airport and back to the airport wasn't clear. It was dark when we arrived and left and walked a long road way to get there when extremely tired after flight delays, in the rain, carrying luggage, when it's literally over the road. Clearer signposted paths needed. Some sort of construction was happening so maybe that's what's happening. Left too early to get any breakfast. Would be nice if there was a bagged up to go option

Happy Review: Closeness to the airport, comfy room, great shower, best breakfast
Unhappy Review: No bar fridge

Happy Review: The location is perfect and we were lucky to be given a ground floor room. The receptionist was excellent, could not have been more helpful. The beds were super comfy and the breakfast was amazing with so much choice
Unhappy Review: The bathroom was clean, but there was a leak coming from something. We were so tired that we just put up with it. I did report it when checking out the next day

Review Title: A busy but comfortable hotel doing a good job of managing guests' needs.
Happy Review: Evening food was very efficiently provided to a busy room, and it was good quality food. Breakfast buffet was excellent. Room was the quietest I have ever found in a hotel. Location is excellent.
Unhappy Review: Bed was somewhat hard. TV remote broken.

Happy Review: How clean it was very comfortable 😌

Review Title: Ideally situated for airport and comfortable room and helpful staff.
Happy Review: Good standards all round. Helpful staff.
Unhappy Review: Not the fault of the property in any way but due to ‘works’ in the airport arrivals area the route from the hotel with large suitcase and cabin suitcase in the rain was not great!

Happy Review:
A lovely hotel, so easy for flying early for holiday! 
Although a bit pricey.
Unhappy Review: Price

Happy Review: Good sized room
Unhappy Review: Congestion at meal times

Review Title: Good hotel, needs improving in certain areas
Happy Review: Location, clean room, friendly staff
Unhappy Review:
Price of food is comparable with other hotels, snacks are overpriced to the point of exploitation 
Breakfast could be better, no brown sauce, no fried eggs, poor quality bacon and sausages. £7 pint served in warm glass so beer flat had to change twice

beds were hard, food choices poor
expensive food and drinks

Happy Review: Great location, very clean and well functioning. Beds and pillows super comfortable
Unhappy Review:
You queue for service at bar like your getting school dinner. Did not like this
Hotel has no personality

Happy Review: Reception manned when we arrived in the early hours - friendly staff.  A good choice of vegan options at breakfast.
Unhappy Review: All OK thanks.

Happy Review:
-close to the airport 
-reasonable food. Enjoyed the early breakfast. 
-lovely and helpful staff
Unhappy Review:
- No charging plugs in the room. I had to borrow an adapter downstairs because I have spanish plugs on my phone charger. I would expect an airport hotel room to have USB plugs.
-My towel in my room was stained with makeup. It had been cleaned but it is not inviting to use a towel that was staines.

Happy Review: Clean, good breakfast
Unhappy Review: Due to the car park works at the airport the access to the hotel is a much longer distance and is very poorly signposted

Review Title: Comfortable and convenient for early morning flight
Happy Review: Proximity to airport for early morning flight
Unhappy Review: It was expensive

Pedestrian access to terminal is very bad.  Deviations more than double the required walking distance.  Staff excuse that this is the airport not the hotel, shows that the hotel is not doing enough to improve the situation.
Staff did not warn that the hotel was “cash free” and we were unable to purchase drinks unless using credit cards. A warning upon arrival is necessary.

Happy Review: Surprisingly pleasant reception area and rooms
Unhappy Review: A bit expensive

Review Title: Convenient, clean, quality furnishings, friendly staff
Happy Review: Clean, comfortable
Unhappy Review: No USB chargers in the room or biscuits with coffee

Review Title: food was v good and drinks ok price, room just a bit pricey but location excellent
Happy Review: location
Unhappy Review: I think it is a bit expensive for a night before a flight

Happy Review: Our second room once we were relocated was fine. Clean and comfortable. Breakfast choices good. Stayed one night due to late flights snd was conveniently close to the airport and bus stands.
Unhappy Review: Not impressed after checking into our room to find the toilet with dried black faecal matter all around the pan. Rang reception and she said she would sort it and hung up. We didn't know if we were meant to wait or go back to reception. After a short time elapsed we rang again to be told it was being dealt with. Then we were were ushered to a room on another floor. No apologies just a excuse that the cleaners make mistakes. Not at all pleasant to walk into after along day.

Happy Review:
the waffles
the location
the staff

Review Title: Very good, I shall use it again
Happy Review: It was a pleasant surprise to be able to get a reasonable breakfast even very early in the morning

Review Title: Exceptionally good location. Shame it’s so expensive
Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: The price!!

Happy Review: Very convenient for the airport, literally a 5 minute walk to the terminal door. Comfortable room, friendly staff. Nice restaurant area, not huge choice but food good.
Unhappy Review: Last time I stayed last year there was a breakfast bag to take away if you were on an early flight which didn't happen this year. Seeing as breakfast is included in the price we felt this was a bit of a con. If you're not going to supply anything then there should be a choice of price with breakfast included or not.

Happy Review: Location. Clean and comfortable
Unhappy Review: Pricey

Review Title: Comfortable nights stay prior to my journey.
Happy Review: Accessible to airport, easy check in, and friendly staff. Quiet too considering near the airport. Very clean.
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: It was really comfortable and easy - an excellent airport hotel.
Happy Review: Bed exceptionally comfortable, room spacious and breakfast excellent.
Unhappy Review: Slightly limited bar snacks and eating option late at night (when I arrived).

Happy Review: It was very convenient for the airport
Unhappy Review: The trek from the coach park to the hotel.

Review Title: Very comfortable quiet rooms with great facilities
Happy Review:
Clem modern rooms very well equipped with a great shower and lovely fluffy towels
Great gym
Unhappy Review:
The price of two glasses of wine at the bar!!
The path from the hotel to the terminal building was close for building work and the diversion was a very long way around

Happy Review: Unexpectedly good pre 6am breakfast

Review Title: Fine for the short time we stayed.  Air conditioning in the eating area was too cold and uncomfortab
Happy Review: Too early a flight for proper breakfast. Takeaway bag for breakfast supplied by hotel pretty unexciting.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast bag

Happy Review: At the airport
Unhappy Review: All the work going on outside the building had to take my case a long way around

Review Title: Convenient, did what it said on the can
Happy Review: booked last minute, overnight stay, no issues
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Clean, colour schemes were fine, staff were great, from check in to bar and supper and a super bright ‘good morning’ at 0350hrs. Breakfast and supper, although not stunning in choice, filled us with no complaints
Unhappy Review: To be honest, given this is a Premier Inn level airport hotel, it was clean with a nice bed, sufficient room and the social areas were fine. There was nothing to dislike

Happy Review: We have stayed here many times and as usual everything was great - however Bristol airport has changed over the last 5 years so its not such an attractive location to stay for travellers with 2 large bags and using Rental car as Avis etc ( who used to be just a short walk from the Hotel ) have moved(been moved ) to Silverstone Parking  so you have to check in at the hotel, drop your bags, get an hour of free parking then drive out of the hotel car park , drop the car at Silver Stone parking then get the bus to the terminal - since there were no trolleys provided, I grabbed one at the Terminal and took it all the way to our room
Unhappy Review: No trolleys at the hotel - long walk to terminal in the morning due to extensive Bristol Airport extensions to Car Parks etc - thats not the Hotel's fault but it makes it less attractive. That said for early morning flight still the best place to  stay near the airport.

Happy Review: Clean & modern
Unhappy Review: The restaurant was nice but the queuing system to order wasn’t great.

Happy Review: Everything!
Unhappy Review: Evening meal

Happy Review: As an airport hotel it had everything you need. very clean. comfortable and efficient. Continental  breakfast from 4.00am was perfect for an early flight. Parking by the hotel is very convenient and the hotel is close to the airport departures.
Unhappy Review: nothing

Review Title: Probably stay elsewhere and catch a shuttle bus next time we go away.
Happy Review: Close to Airport, friendly helpful staff
Unhappy Review:
The detour walk to the airport whilst the building works in place. Fortunately it wasn’t raining. Would have been drenched if it had been.
The food choice for evening meals was very limited.

Happy Review: Nice room,lovely staff  and very clean.
Unhappy Review: Difficult to get with wheelchair from bus station. Long corridor till the room with wheelchair and luggage...not much space in room for disabled person and night light is impossible to turn on with arthritis in fingers. Comfortable beds,but child's bed edges very sharp.

Happy Review: Convenient
Unhappy Review: Bathroom sliding door was very stiff and heavy to open

Review Title: The hotel suited these weary travellers perfectly.
Happy Review: In Bristol Airport. The perfect location for the weary traveller. Good reception at 3am. Nice, comfortable,clean room. with excellent sound proofing. Perfect after a long, tiring journey and flight.
Unhappy Review: Wandering around the self service breakfast which closed ruthlessly at 10am.

Happy Review: Staff very helpful and accommodating, bar at nightmare good, breakfast very tasty 😋

Review Title: Clean and modern and quick access to the airport but the price is outrageous.
Happy Review: It was easy to locate and a short walk to departures. The room was modern and had everything we needed and was clean and comfortable.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast is included in the price but was of no use to us as we had an early flight. However the cost per night of this hotel stings! £180 to stay for 1 night is a little outrageous to be honest. Airport hotel or not! We could have parked for 2 weeks for less, which will be our preferred option if the price is still high when we are travelling from Bristol again.

Happy Review:
Near airport 
Great check in staff
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Close to airport a great base to stop over
Close to airport and very Accommodating
Close to airport and they are very accommodating
Unhappy Review: Food can be hot and miss

Happy Review: Great location to airport
Very good
Unhappy Review: Nil

Review Title: The location is fab. Will definitely be back.
Happy Review: Room was lovely and quiet.  Spotlessly clean. Location couldn’t have been better.
Unhappy Review: The pillows were very uncomfortable which spoilt the quality of sleep. Breakfast was disappointing. It’s very expensive.

Review Title: Clean and comfortable but don’t waste money eating their food.
Happy Review: Clean and comfortable.
Unhappy Review: The food was TERRIBLE. Clearly designed to be as profitable as possible for The Hilton Group and a miserable experience for the customer. The Singapore Noodles that I had were tasteless and such a mean portion that I was still hungry after finishing them.

Happy Review: Breakfast was great

How near it is to airport terminal,
Comfy beds and breakfast
Unhappy Review: Checking in, the receptionist asked for payment again, but i had already paid months in advance.

Happy Review: All very good  breakfast  and staff  very helpful

Review Title: staff friendly, welcoming, provided a carrier bag breakfast due to pre 4.00am departure is brilliant
Happy Review: The hotel is right by the airport, but there were quite a lot of steps and I would not have managed them alone with a heavy suitcase. The room was excellent - clean and comfortable.  We were at the back and able to go to bed at 9pm without being woken by noise of guests or flights.  Breakfast to go was very much appreciated at 3.40 am!
Unhappy Review:
The food in the restaurant was not as good as I had expected: the choice was limited for me, and the burger and chips I ordered as a last resort was not overwhelming, just ok.  My husband chose a curry and was very happy with that.  It just shows how our tastes affect our reviews.  So other guests would probably love the food choices!!
I didn't like the two flights of steps between the hotel and the airport departures.

Happy Review:
Close to the airport. 
Clean.
Friendly staff
Unhappy Review: Quite expensive for a basic hotel.

Review Title: An ideal location and a comfortable stay.
Happy Review: The fact that the hotel is just across from the airport.  I liked the comfort of the rooms and proximity to airport and coach station.
Unhappy Review: I do not think the standard of breakfast matches the standard of the hotel generally.  For instance, last time I stayed there was a choice of fruit and yogurt which seemed to have disappeared this time.  I found the level of lighting in my room very low when I arrived in the middle of the night, and needed to quickly find things in my suitcase.
The food was ok, not good.

Review Title: Modern, well thought out hotel built for comfort and convenience to the airport.
Happy Review: Modern clean and fresh. Convenient to airport and yet well insulated and really quiet. Staff very friendly, efficient. Food very good.
Unhappy Review: Everything was great.

Happy Review: Perfect hotel
Unhappy Review: Nothing I did not like

Happy Review:
The hotel is handy for a pre early flight stay.
My husband has difficulty walking, but when we said we had assisted travel, a member of staff arranged for us to be picked up by the airport assistance staff. This was excellent, but I think the hotel  needs to tell more of their staff about this facility, another member of staff suggested we could have got a taxi at about £15.
Unhappy Review: There are site works going on between the airport and the hotel, so it was hard to get to the hotel.

Review Title: hotel great once you got inside. outside not good.
Happy Review: always a quiet and comfortable stay
Unhappy Review: access was shocking on this occasion. building works all around the access making it dangerous and difficult. Couldn’t find a ramp access to the airport so had to carry luggage up lots of steep steps.

Happy Review: Location close to terminal
Unhappy Review: The very high costs of car parking at least the first night of staying should be complimentary

Review Title: Always good as the airport is over the road, but only flying so early will stop us thinking about alternative accommodat
Happy Review: The proximity to the airport, the cleanliness, staff and included breakfast.
Unhappy Review: The bed and pillows weren’t comfortable. We felt the mattress needed replacing.

Happy Review: Room and food available.
The location to Bristol airport is perfect
Unhappy Review: Nothing to say

Happy Review: good choice of breakfast , staff are friendly and helpful , great hotel to stay at before a flight from Bristol airport

Review Title: Extremely convenient, high quality, high price.
Happy Review: Perfect position for the airport, comfortable, clean, exceptionally attentive staff and a really good breakfast starting early enough for the first flights.
Unhappy Review:
The parking arrangements are at first sight a little daunting; however the staff can help once you have the courage to pass through the barrier!
The hotel is priced to exploit a captive market - don’t expect a discount. You pay for what you get convenience.

Happy Review: Convenient location for airport
Unhappy Review: Slot of work going on around the airport surroundings

Review Title: A really good end to our holiday on kos
Happy Review: Top quality and value of the evening special on the menu and as always a good hotel breakfast
Unhappy Review: The pathway to the airport was badly effected by construction

Happy Review: Location is great for flights out of Bristol Airport and long stay parking adjacent. Staff really friendly and good bar/restaurant for evening meal.
Unhappy Review: It’s quite expensive for one night stays. We left too early before breakfast was served but it would have been good if we could have been offered a continental breakfast/take away. Also couldn’t get anyone to help with the £5 drop off charge as it was so busy at reception so ended up paying it.

Review Title: Overpriced for what it is. All about closeness to airport
Happy Review: Close to airport terminal and spacious room
Unhappy Review: The cost for what is little more than a travel lodge.

Happy Review: Easy next to airport
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Great location but you pay for it. Very good hotel in general
Happy Review: All as expected
Unhappy Review: Cost is an issue that needs to be considered with this hotel
Price

Happy Review: Easy walking distance to the airport
Unhappy Review: Rather soulless airport. Breakfast in the bag was very limited

Happy Review: Quiet room

Review Title: Fine- very much what I needed, very comfortable and convenient.
Happy Review: Good room, perfect location for my purposes,  food very good, both on arrival ( the pizza is great) and at Breakfast the next morning. Excellent service, very friendly and helpful staff.
Unhappy Review: The parking was a bit more expensive than advertised, and very confusing. Also,  foot access to the airport is rather convoluted due to construction work.

Review Title: Ideal place to stay if on an early morning flight
Happy Review: Room was very good and the breakfast first class
Unhappy Review:
Explaining how to get to the Hotel carpark, when we phoned the hotel and asked for the instructions on how to find the car park, the instructions were vague and unclear.
It cost us £7.50 as we parked in  the wrong car park, when we arrived at the hotel and explained this to one of the staff they were very unhelpful about are suituation, saying it was very easy to find your carpark.

Happy Review: Comfortable hotel and friendly staff.
Unhappy Review:
Bristol Airport. Renovations which will last for 18 months. Make access to the hotel difficult.
A long walk in the pouring rain.

Happy Review: Near airport
Unhappy Review: Building works

Review Title: Had to queue twice at reception.
Happy Review: All very handy for airport.
Unhappy Review: Were told we couldn't buy a drink at the bar until we had registered at reception to be able to do so.  Had already stood in a queue to check in then had to go back and do it again.  Never known anything like it - just to get a glass of wine!

Happy Review:
Mostly good. Rooms as nice as usual. Requested an extra sheet which was in the bedroom on arrival - very happy :)
Staff are always nice 
Handy M&S in the airport terminal prior to departures (not overpriced)  so we picked up a few nibbles.
Unhappy Review:
Early breakfast (03:00) take out was rubbish. Dry croissant, horrid apple juice and an apple or banana - that was it. Expected a much better selection for 'continental' -perhaps a portion of cheese and crackers if you don't like sweet for breakfast which I do not. Have had a much nicer breakfast at the hotel when our flight was later in the morning. 
Room was very nice, as expected, although it is overpriced for a room but I suppose you pay for the convenience being at the airport!

Happy Review: Convenience ￼to airport
Unhappy Review: Overpriced

Happy Review: Lovely reception staff. Everything clean and well maintained. Incredibly convenient location to the airport
Unhappy Review: Price of food/drink at hotel. Having stayed here in July and paid £40 for two tiny servings of pasta and 2 glasses of red wine. Decided to get food from M and S at the airport. Much cheaper.

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Was expensive  with no other alternative available

Happy Review: Great location. Nice hotel. Bathroom and rooms are lovely.
Unhappy Review: The beds are so uncomfortable. Food was not great.  The burger was poor.

Review Title: Clean, modern hotel ideally located for early morning flight.
Happy Review: Breakfast & evening meal adequate but pricey. Room good, clean & everything worked. Super bed. Alarm call right on time. Helpful staff.
Unhappy Review: Access to airport terminal through building site - not something that could be helped at present. Shower tray slippery.

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Not the easiest check-in process.

Review Title: It was OK for an early morning departure
Happy Review: The staff were helpful, and the room was clean but basic.
Unhappy Review: The food in the restaurant downstairs was awful.  Because we were staying there specifically to fly out the next morning, we didn't want to head into town, so it was the only option. Also, there is no shuttle to the airport. It should be a short walk but the usual path was all dug up so we had to drag heavy cases a long way.

Review Title: good enough for one night stay and perfect for flying.
Unhappy Review: no usb points. no little extras like toothpaste would have been useful. restaurant is horrible. no flexibility . rather cold in the room.

Happy Review: Very helpful staff
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Location to the airport was very convenient, even on very late arrival just gone midnight, signage was easy to follow through groundwork being done.
Unhappy Review: Was expensive compared to other chains we often use. No USB sockets in the room, often quite common these days. Nobody greeting guests at breakfast. Details but expected a little more for over £200 for a night. It was a convenient option for a kate flight.

Happy Review: Breakfast was ok
Unhappy Review: I suspect scrambled eggs were powdered, bacon was hardly cooked.

Happy Review: Super efficient and friendly staff. Clean and spacious hotel. Perfect for an early morning flight.

It’s location on Bristol Airports site is so convenient
Nice size room, slept extremely well
Very clean and comfortable, staff lovely
Unhappy Review: The evening meal quality was very poor, Shame it let the hotel down

Happy Review: Convenient generally very happy

Review Title: We’ll stay there again if the need comes up
Happy Review: Great location
Unhappy Review: Midnight fire alarm wasn’t on our agenda. Not property fault.

Happy Review: Close to airport
Enjoyed my stay apart from being woken by  fire alarm at 12pm
Unhappy Review:
Fire alarm going off after being asleep for 2 hours. Didn't seem very organised.. Room no wasn't  taken
How did they know every body was out of building?

Happy Review: Friendly, helpful staff.
Unhappy Review: Some snacks in the room would be appreciated.

Happy Review: Location is key
Unhappy Review: Price

Happy Review: Convenience to airport
Unhappy Review: Better restaurant experience - menu was a bit basic

Happy Review: The location was perfect and the very early morning breakfast was very convenient for early morning flights.
Unhappy Review: It was disappointing that the free Wi-Fi did NOT have an internet connection, also that one of the bedside cabinets was broken. Not what I expected from a Hampton by Hilton hotel !

Happy Review: Very clean & modern
Unhappy Review: Didn’t expect to walk quite so far from the airport at 1oclock in the morning, but of cause road works need to be done.
A/c too cold at the restaurant

Happy Review: Great location and early breakfast.

Review Title: Great, smart, clean, handy hotel with friendly and professional staff! Good all round!
Happy Review: The location is excellent for the airport, it could hardly be easier. The transport options to the airport all worked well without the pressure of an early start in the day if travel.
Unhappy Review: Nothing springs to mind!

Review Title: Good place to stay before a morning flight from Bristol
Happy Review: Large airy bar and restaurant area.
Unhappy Review: Nothing to add

Review Title: Ideal location and easy to reach from the airport, was somewhat expensive due presumably to this
Happy Review: Location ease of booking in and cleanliness of the hotel
Unhappy Review:
The shower room had a major issue with the run off to the drain and flooded the bathroom and entrance way to the bedroom area
I informed the staff but the problem is obviously due to poor design

Review Title: Perfect place to stay after a late arrival
Happy Review: Very close to arrivals. Bar open late.
Unhappy Review: I think signage via the route to buses is a waste of time for arriving passengers. Survey better to direct left outside arrivals.

Happy Review: Have used the hotel since built. Perfect for the airport.
Unhappy Review: The price has virtually doubled. £180 for just one night, booked well in advance is a lot.

Review Title: Great staff, lovely room. Good bed. Good choice for breakfast.
Happy Review: Location. Close to the airport
Unhappy Review: The walk from the airport is a bit of a bomb site

Happy Review: Clean & comfortable. Room was spacious. Good breakfast options. A short walk to the airport, very convenient. Buses to/from Bristol & Bath regularly a short walk from the hotel.
Unhappy Review: N/A

Review Title: Great location if you want to take the stress out of an early flight
Happy Review: Location on the airport site as we had an early flight. Staff were friendly and helpful.
Lovely big room, comfortable bed
Unhappy Review:
No drinking water in the room 
Breakfast was very poor, cold plates,bacon and sausage looked boiled ,didn't even bother.

Happy Review: Reception very helpful for our late at night arrival
Unhappy Review: Windows completely sealed.  we wanted some fresh air

Review Title: Comfortable stay in good location with everything I needed.
Happy Review: Having a decent gym with working equipment in good condition was really good. Meal options were fine. Bar comfortable.
Unhappy Review: Male staff member on reception was a bit short with me when I asked about a receipt. He explained I would get it after I checked out as if I should know, I paid a lot of money the day before and needed to claim it back from my employer so it was important to me. I just needed a pleasant explanation.

Review Title: The only way to stay near the airport
Happy Review:
+ Location
+ Quality
Unhappy Review: - Price, is way overpriced

Happy Review: The staff were friendly and helpful. I could share a room with my two daughters, making it more affordable. The room was ideal - clean, well designed and just what we needed. Food was pretty good and amazingly, breakfast was available from 4am so early flights don't have to mean missing breakfast! So super convenient for Bristol Airport - great to be able to walk from the carpark to the hotel and from the hotel to the airport.
Unhappy Review: No complaints - exactly what we needed.

Happy Review:
Perfect for what we needed before an early flight. Breakfast service starts early enough for those needing to leave early. 
Simple but tasty dinner choices.

Review Title: We would stay again but hope for more pillows.
Happy Review:
Friendly helpful staff. 
Good size room
Unhappy Review: Lack of pillows!!

Review Title: Lovely rooms, great staff, need deep pockets
Happy Review:
Location was great, apart from the surrounding civil works to improve access, which was difficult to navigate amongst bus queues and barriers.
Room was lovely, shame we only spent 4.5 hours in it due to our late arrival, Room not ready due to demand, and a very early departure.
Clean and pleasant bar area, staff lovely. Overall pleased with the hotel.
Unhappy Review:
Breakfast was basic at the early time we needed to leave for our departure, and there was too little food on display, with no staff around to replenish the food items, mostly run out of choice. For the overnight stay cost, including breakfast, we were very disappointed, and hungry during our day of travel. This was a letdown for us, especially paying £230 for a single night, we expected a better Breakfast experience, and not need to spend more money on food during our travels.
Also, drinks in the bar were very expensive, seems a captive audience are charged way over the normal going rate.

Happy Review: Location.
Unhappy Review: Cost.

Review Title: Quite a lot of money for a large modern clean soulless room at convenient place for flight
Happy Review: The breakfast was it's redeemable feature. I had croissants and fruit and yogurt and coffee. The breakfast was really good quality . Very pleased with the breakfast. It felt more homely and family orientated for the breakfast. A bit more heart and soul. Liked the decor and the happy slogans.
Unhappy Review:
It was a bit of a shock that you queued up to place an order for food. As my friend said an expensive MacDonalds.  Coincidentally I ended up ordering the burger bun and chips. I felt starving hungry and needed something to fill me up. 
The burger was really good. So it worked 😁. 
Next time I would know what to expect. Might try another food option. Like the noodles for example. Just was expecting a sit down restaurant with table service like other airport hotels. I thought maybe they had trouble getting staff. The receptionist said there was no proper kitchen on site. Did not really like the atmosphere of the evening dining. Lovely chairs dining area but felt soulless in the evening. The company could have a better chance here to win hearts and minds.

Review Title: Comfortable beds so well rested before a long day of travelling
Happy Review: We had an early flight but the Continental breakfast had a good choice of items
Unhappy Review: Separating drinks only from the food ordering queue might have been more efficient

Review Title: Convenient overnight stay for departure flight.
Happy Review: Within easy walking distance of airport. Comfortable bed in quiet room with air conditioning. Good breakfast.
Unhappy Review: Evening meal was disappointing. The choice was limited so felt the meals on offer should have been of a higher standard. Curry has small amounts of chicken and no flavour.

Happy Review: Beds
Unhappy Review: Quality of jacket potatoes in restaurant

Happy Review:
The location couldn't be better.
Enjoyed the curry
Unhappy Review: Building work outside had bad signing, we walked a few hundred yards to go just a few, it was confirmed at reception that a lot of customers had suffered the same, it would have been good if someone had sorted it out so that we could have got there a lot more directly.

Happy Review: Location is superb. Breakfast was excellent
Unhappy Review: Could be a better walk way to get to the hotel from the airport

Review Title: Overall our stay was great - but brief as we checked in late afternoon & checked out early next day
Happy Review: Nice, clean room, very quiet which was appreciated as we had an early flight on checkout day.  Staff were all helpful, courteous, and very good at what they do.  Delicious food in the restaurant.  And cold beer!
Unhappy Review: Nothing really.  Maybe the fact our Uber driver had to pay a fee - which was passed on to us - to drop us at the front entrance of the hotel.

Happy Review:
Quick check in,room had everything you need
Bathroom was good,with good shower and toiletries.
Great breakfast , good coffee and ample choice.
Unhappy Review:
It's the airport,so we know we are going to pay extra for most things,but felt this was taken to extreme.
I stayed in a hotel at Heathrow,10 days previously,same company ,but half the price.
Also felt bar prices were expensive,pint and gin and tonic 21pounds.

Happy Review: Nice welcome after a delayed flight
Easy check in and check out.
Unhappy Review:
Some staff were non talkative. Some would also ask you stuff to make conversation and were then very uninterested or wouldn't listen. 
Took a while to clean up any tables in the evening

Happy Review: Location facilities comfort
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Small room but clean and good breakfast.
Happy Review: Great location. Tasty breakfast with a lot of variety. Clean room and nice toiletries in bathroom. Nice and quiet - couldn’t hear outside noise at all, or other guests.
Unhappy Review: Tiny room and small bed. For travellers arriving with a lot of luggage, as you would expect near an airport, there is next to no space for luggage. We had our daughter with us so the couch was made into a bed so no space in that part of the room for us to put anything. Pillows were very uncomfortable.

Happy Review: Location is excellent
Unhappy Review: Rooms are small for a family

Happy Review:
Breakfast was very good, so much variety.
Great location for early morning flights with only walking distance to airport
Friendly staff, excellent facilities just a shame I didn't have more time to use them. Very close to the airport so easy for early morning flight.
Unhappy Review: Not being able to sleep for as long.

Review Title: Great overnight stop for Bristol Airport
Happy Review: Perfect location for Bristol Airport
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: The room was very beautiful & rustic Italian, it was good value for money & the lady running it sent me a video on how to unlock the door, where the iron was etc & met me in a local restaurant to give me the key
Unhappy Review: While it says private bathroom, this is separate from the room & there is a room in between. Which is fine but may be off putting for others as not clearly described

Review Title: We had a very pleasant stay and the hotel is very convenient for the airport
Happy Review:
the room was large and very comfortable
The bed was very comfortable
The bathroom with a shower was very clean and spacious.
Unhappy Review: The bar area and area where you order food are combined so when its busy there is a queue.

Happy Review: Close to airport
Unhappy Review: expensive for our few hours stay

Happy Review: So conveniently located by the airport and rooms are very comfortable and quiet
Close to airport
Unhappy Review: Restaurant was basic for quality hotel

Happy Review: Conveniently located across from the terminal. Breakfast served from 4am. Kind staff.
Unhappy Review: A bit pricy for what it is. Could use a renovation.

Happy Review: Convenient for the airport

Review Title: So convenient for airport  I would come again.
Happy Review: Distance to terminal.
Unhappy Review: Pricey gin and tonic.

Happy Review: Everything was satisfactory -no complaints -would stay again if flying from Bristol
Location Location Location
Unhappy Review: Evening dinner portions at the restaurant were small

Happy Review: Clean and modern
Unhappy Review: Food from restaurant small portions and very expensive
The car park charged me £192 for an overnight stay on my credit card and my debit card.  Not happy.

Happy Review: Very convenient to the airport and the rooms were very well insulated against noise ( such as aircraft movements) snd lights.
Unhappy Review: Our stay was too short

Happy Review:
Location 
Clean
Staff excellence

Review Title: Great place to stay for an early flight
Happy Review: Location.  Comfy bed.  Good shower
Unhappy Review: N/a
The pillows. You need to change them uncomfortable

Happy Review: Good
Unhappy Review: Everything was as expected

Happy Review: Didn’t have time for much breakfast! What we had was good.
Unhappy Review: Don’t know.

Happy Review: The closeness to the airport.  We could walk from the hotel to the terminal within 5 or so minutes.
Unhappy Review: It was quite a basic hotel and seemed very expensive for the facilities available.

Review Title: Super convenient for Bristol Airport, bit pricey but can walk to the terminal
Happy Review: The shower design was really nice, very modern with quality soap and lotion provided.  Lovely touch that they give you a breakfast bag to go if you leave early for a flight before the cooked breakfast starts.
Unhappy Review: The mattress was good, not the most comfy I've ever had at a hotel, but good for the night.  The pillows were very nice.

Review Title: Nice relaxing way to start a holiday
Happy Review: Convenient location to Bristol Airport, great way to start a holiday
Unhappy Review: Limited evening meal menu

Review Title: An ideal spot for that early morning flight.
Happy Review: This hotel is so close to the airport which was ideal for us with an early morning flight. A good choice of food available for the evening and a lovely choice for breakfast the following morning at 4am. The staff were so welcoming and helpful.
Unhappy Review: Nothing.

Review Title: Great location, care with parking charges!
Happy Review: Room was fine and great location for early flight
Unhappy Review: Car parking charges not as advertised and managers attitude when challenged left allot to be desired. Get you don't own car park but don't advertise one rate on website and another at entrance to car park

Happy Review: Large comfortable beds
Unhappy Review: No charge points for phone in room

Happy Review: Friendly and welcoming and excellent location
All
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Ideal location to airport for early flight
Happy Review: Great location from the hotel - literally across the road. Nice early breakfast offering.
Unhappy Review: Quite expensive for basic room but I did book it quite late. Food area was too busy for dinner.

Happy Review: The staff were helpful, the room was great - spacious, well presented and modern, and the restaurant served a good choice of food. Service was good too.
Unhappy Review: I wasn't impressed that I had to pay an additional fee for parking at the hotel. This should be included as part of the room price, as you would expect patrons of the property to be the only ones using the parking available.

Review Title: As expected. Nice place to stay.
Happy Review: All good, as expected. Clean and spotless. Lovely buffet breakfast. Ideally situated a short walk from the airport.
Unhappy Review: N/A

Review Title: very comfortable beds and helpful staff.
Happy Review: the hotel is in a super handy location a very short walk from the airport so is ideal.
Unhappy Review: the prices are rather high I guess it is a captive market.

Review Title: A comfortable clean room and great location to the airport
Happy Review: Location to airport. Able to walk there
Unhappy Review: A little expensive for a single traveler

Happy Review:
Early breakfast, 5 o’clock was more than adequate 
Nice quiet room
Unhappy Review: Nothing to dislike at all

Review Title: We thoroughly enjoyed our short stay and wished we'd got up earlier for a full breakfast.
Happy Review: Exceptionally clean, very quiet and the early breakfast was fantastic.
Unhappy Review: The frosted glass on the bathroom door although opaque, still allowed the silhouette image of the person in the bathroom and what they were doing could be seen by occupants in the bedroom.

Review Title: A comfortable place to rest weary heads 😊
Happy Review: Our easy jet flight was cancelled and delayed 12 hrs - last minute booking - met all our needs - we booked in at 2345hrs and left at 0445 - comfortable place to rest weary heads
Location
Unhappy Review: The system for serving drinks at the bar

Review Title: Convenient overnight stop for early or late flights
Happy Review: Our plane was delayed so we were late getting back to Bristol airport and rather than drive 2 hours in the middle of the night we found this hotel a convenient place to stay.  Very comfortable bed and nice buffet breakfast.  Staff very helpful too.
Unhappy Review: Parking a little expensive but that’s airport hotels for you...

Happy Review: Great location, close to airport
Location is great - a few minutes walk from airport terminal.  Room is fine & breakfast ok.
Unhappy Review: The company continues to use feather bedding, which I'm highly allergic to.  I noted this when I made the booking & sent a subsequent message on booking.com but received no acknowledgement or response.  However reception had a note & checked the bedding was hypoallergenic.   So it was resolved BUT it would be much better if the company just stopped using this.  I've stayed in many hotels in recent years across Europe, Asia & South America and it seems to be ONLY Hampton & Radisson hotels at UK airports that continue to use feathers  & to refuse to put safety of guests first.  PLEASE CAN THIS BE REVIEWED.  I shouldn't have to make this request when I book at a hotel, especially at the prices charged.  I am sure you take other allergies eg. peanuts seriously so it would be much appreciated  - & easier for you -if you avoided risks by using the types of bedding now in use at the vast majority of hotels.

Happy Review: Location
ok so you can get breakfast early but only continental
Unhappy Review: free parking would of been nice

Review Title: Great location, very convenient.   Extremely comfortable stay before our early morning flight!
Happy Review: The location was excellent - very easy for an early flight.
Unhappy Review: We liked everything

Happy Review: Convenient
Unhappy Review: Quite expensive

Happy Review: 2 min walk to departure.
Unhappy Review: Overpriced

Happy Review: Location. Walking distance to airport

Happy Review: Perfect location for an early flight

Happy Review: Location, facilities

Review Title: Great location, good value for money, helpful and friendly staff
Happy Review: Location was excellent, arrival process was seamless, would certainly look at booking again.
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Spacious. Clean. Great location for terminal for early morning flight
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Great location. Staff were helpful.
