Happy Review: Functional
Unhappy Review: Impersonal

Happy Review: Location superb,no stress for airport transfer

Review Title: Perfect for overnight stay before early morning flight
Happy Review: Very helpful reception staff

Review Title: Very handy when you have an early flight
Happy Review: The Hotel is on site at the airport so I often use it when I am flying early. Rooms are very nice and modern and exrtemely quiet. Stayed here more that once. Used the restaurant in the evening and breakfast in the morning which starts at 4am.
Unhappy Review: Price is a lot higher than similar hotels (close to £200 a night) but they know you have little other option I suppose. Doesnt stop me using the hotel but the principle bothers me a bit!

Happy Review: Clean and modern.  Ideal location for early flight.
Unhappy Review: Sink and shower drains not flowing well.  Reported on departure and sure they will be fixed.  Hotel has something of a monopoly for “on airport” location which probably explains rather high cost for very short stay.

Happy Review: It was basically an airport transfer hotel and the facilities suitable to cover passenger needs
Unhappy Review: The convenience to the airport although, due to airports ground works we had to walk further than expected

Review Title: Convenient for airport very friendly and competent staff great breakfast
Happy Review: Good breakfast staff very friendly and helpful
Unhappy Review:
Could always be cheaper 
Put times of breakfast and dinner on website

Review Title: Although we only stayed for 6 hours due to a delayed flight, everything was great!
Happy Review: The lady on the desk at 3 in the morning (our plane was severely delayed) was lovely and smiley. The same can be said for the next shift. Breakfast was welcome and good as well as being included within the price.
Unhappy Review: Nothing as far as I can see. The hotel served its purpose for us.

Happy Review: Lots of choice at Breakfast and good quality. Proximity to the airport. Service.
Unhappy Review: Size of the room for a family of three.

Happy Review: All fine for an airport hotel.
Unhappy Review: Quite pricey.

Review Title: The convenience of the hotel is the reason we choose to stay.
Happy Review: I did not have breakfast but it looked very nice. The location is perfect for the Airport
Unhappy Review: I think that the price of a glass of wine is outrageously expensive. I live in Spain and I could buy 6 bottles of wine for the price of one glass at the hotel. Apart from that our stay was very pleasant and was suitable for our onward flight.

Review Title: I had great relaxing stay and a good night's rest before my early morning jounrey
Happy Review: I enjoyed the evening meal Singapore Noodles was delicious. In the morning I had an early flight 7.20 am and found the buffet breakfast was great. It had a wide selection of items and catered to a variety of appetites.
Unhappy Review: Queueing and placing an order at the bar could be improved especially these days if there is an app that can help in both placing and paying for an order. Much like Weatherspoons own app. That said the staff were very helpful and the human interaction was appreciated.

Review Title: Perfect for an airport stop over
Happy Review: Location to airport!
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: booking in , airport , staff very helpful and always straightforward to check in and out
Unhappy Review: always find it over priced for what it is

Review Title: Fantastic welcome at the front desk and clean and comfy room next to the airport.
Happy Review: The location to the airport is perfect. The room was clean and modern. The weclome by Alex on the front desk was as welcoming as you could get and really informative. Lovely guy.
Unhappy Review: A little bit pricey but you pay for the location and quality of hotel. It was worth it.

Review Title: Very comfortable but would not normally pay this rate for a hotel. Purely because of location.
Happy Review: Staff on reception very pleasant and helpful
Unhappy Review: Very expensive

Review Title: Stayed to be close to airport & went well
Happy Review: Nice choice & good that it's included.

Review Title: Always a pleasant stay, just need to adresss the bar area.
Happy Review: The location. Right across the road from airport.
Unhappy Review: Stayed here many times and still the queue at the bar to order drinks and food is ridiculous, up to 30 minute wait they need to come up with a new system.

Happy Review: 250m walk to the airport which is great for an early flight and the room was very comfortable
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Easy access from airport, quiet
Unhappy Review: Our room was far too small for 3 people - no space for luggage and very little space round bed to walk

Happy Review: Close proximity to the airport. Nice and modern, friendly staff.
Unhappy Review: That you can’t use cash. Cash is legal tender.

Review Title: You feel like you're on holiday as soon as you step inside!
Happy Review: Comfortable rooms and delicious breakfast. Super convenient for the airport.
Unhappy Review: It's a little pricey and a bath would be good.

Happy Review: Well placed for airport and bus station and very comfortable beds
Unhappy Review: No usb charging points

Happy Review: How clean the room was and how big it was for the money. Good sized sofa in room
Unhappy Review: An airport hotel people use to catch early flights but they don't serve hot breakfast until 0600

Happy Review:
Spacious and clean
Staff very friendly and helpful
Unhappy Review: Windows faced other rooms. This meant curtains had to be drawn almost always

Review Title: Overall as expected and ideal location
Happy Review: Location ideal for an early flight. The staff were very helpful especially at checkout when I experienced difficulty in finding a trolley as I had a lot of luggage. The receptionist went above and beyond to help me.
Unhappy Review: It was quite pricey for the type of accommodation

Happy Review: Clean and comfortable and close to check in for early morning flight.

Review Title: Convenient, very good quality hotel within 100m of the arrivals gate
Happy Review: Great location. VERY quiet in spite of being on the airport. Good cooked breakfast buffet. Friendly late night reception staff.
Unhappy Review: Nothing.

Review Title: Perfect for a late flight home
Happy Review: Convenient to the airport
Unhappy Review: The sofa bed was very difficult to get in and out of, due to the metal frame protruding from the bed. Very easy to catch your leg

Happy Review: Convenient
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Good all round hotel shame about additional parking charge
Happy Review: Breakfast was great room was excellent although a little pricey very close to airport which we could walk to
Unhappy Review: Extra cost of £14.00 to park the car overnight

Review Title: Chose the hotel because of location for early flight. Met all expeditions and standards very good.
Happy Review: Close to airport. Staff at Reception exceptional. Alex and Tom.

Review Title: Enjoyed the comfort of the room and the pillows were wonderful to sleep on .
Happy Review:
Quick and easy access from the airport. Lovely comfortable beds and lovely bathroom. 
We were very disappointed that there were no face flannels in our bathroom. 
We had to wash with the corner of one of the hand towels.
Unhappy Review:
We were amazed that there was a carpenter doing work in the sitting area of the restaurant when we went down to breakfast in the morning. 
Didn’t expect to have to listen to someone banging into the seat frames that he was installing in the seating area of the restaurant.
Also we thought that the £14.50 parking charges were extortionate just for 1 nights parking.
We didn’t check in to the hotel until the early hours of the morning.

Happy Review: Staff were helpful & friendly. Room was clean & comfortable. Breakfast was perfect for an early morning start
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Close proximity to the airport. Within walking distance. Excellent staff all round.
Unhappy Review: The choice of food. But this is a minor gripe.

Happy Review: Very comfortable rooms.  Accessible room with the adjoining room was perfect for our needs
Unhappy Review: Breakfast was a little disappointing - it seemed like a good range but toaster didn't toast properly, horrible scrambled eggs, syrup for waffles didn't flow etc etc

Review Title: Was short stay but staff and presentation was very good
Happy Review:
Room very clean and look good well presented.
Bed was nice and comfortable with lovely bedding.
Breakfast was nice and tasty with plenty of choice.
Unhappy Review: There was nothing I disliked

Happy Review:
Very clean and tidy
Great location for airport departure and arrival 
Choice at breakfast was v v good
Quietness of rooms
Shower was Lovley and nice shower gel and hand soap
Unhappy Review: Just thought the parking could have been included in the price

Happy Review: Location and staff excellent. Rooms very clean and spacious.
Unhappy Review: Pillows are awful!

Review Title: No nonsense and a step from departure gates
Happy Review: Location!!
Unhappy Review: Utilitarian

Happy Review: Needed a room for the night after flight was cancelled. Being right at the airport it was convenient.  Room was clean comfortable and welcomed after sitting in the airport for hours. Reception staff were patient and helpful with myself and the rest of the weary and disgruntled easyJet customers.
Unhappy Review: Nothing.  The hotel was great.

Happy Review: modern, clean, good food and drink and excellent staff
Unhappy Review: could have done with spare pillows in rooms

Happy Review: Location, breakfast , quiet room
It is SO convenient to be able to walk to the terminal if you're dropping someone off for a 4am check-in.
Unhappy Review:
The food is not great. Breakfast was especially  disappointing - really terrible coffee, no bacon, rock hard (yesterdays?) croissants. 
At almost £200 a night for B&B,  it was a shock to then also pay £14 for overnight parking (reduced from £45!!).

Review Title: The perfect stay over before an early flight!
Happy Review: Location, comfort of the room and the quality of the food.
Unhappy Review: The coffee at breakfast. I’d be prepared to pay more for a proper espresso!

Happy Review: Stayed the night before an early morning departure. Easy to find on arrival to the airport via taxi. We didn't eat at the restaurant for dinner. Check in process was relatively straightforward. Staff at checkin and checkout were very helpful. Breakfast was served from early in the morning which was great and plenty of choice and food for everyone. No queues at the bar or restaurant at breakfast. The room was very quiet and couldn't hear any plane noise or people moving about in the corridors or rooms which was great.  Would recommend to anyone with an early flight and that doesn't want the hassle of Bristol traffic in the morning
Unhappy Review: The bar staff were disorganised - couldn't find items on the till, didn't seem to know their drinks menu, randomly selecting sizes of drinks etc. But overall the stay was good.

Review Title: Staff always friendly and welcoming.  Hotel facilities always to high standard
Happy Review: Location ideal for stay over for early flight. Access to parking and airport within easy walking distance
Unhappy Review: All good

Review Title: Nice hotel but got locked in the bathroom
Happy Review: Great location, I like that we could get breakfast very early.
Unhappy Review: The lock on the bathroom door didn't work properly. I got locked in the bathroom and couldn't get out. The door locked but I couldn't unlock it.  Luckily my wife was able to open the door from the outside, but I'm not sure I would have got out if I had been travelling alone.

Happy Review: Location excellent for airport
Unhappy Review: Breakfast is very tired. Needs fresh products.

Happy Review: Near airport
Very convenient for Bristol airport; short walk to Terminal; convenient breakfast from 4am for early flight.

Review Title: Flight landed at 01:15,  5 minute walk to the hotel, lovely comfortable bed!
Happy Review: Everything
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Booking in
Unhappy Review: Very bad smell in first room had to move

Happy Review: The location is the best bit about the hotel. I stay here every time I fly into Bristol airport. It's so convenient. A good night's sleep is certain in the hotel. The staff are friendly.
Unhappy Review: No. It was all good.

Happy Review: The room,the staff, lovely big shower very comfortable. Restaurant lovely the breakfast superb.
Unhappy Review: I didn't like the fact that although reception were aware of needing assistance from airport staff to collect me I had to keep pestering them to give me an answer from assistance and they arrived at least an hour late.also couldn't get TV to work with remote that was there.also an alarm went off at 3 a.m and reception brought in a ladder to sort it .apart from was ok

Happy Review: Short 5m walk from airport .Efficient and friendly check in check out .Nice room and big shower.Late night supper was good and breakfast very good .large car park .
Unhappy Review: Nothing
Food terrible, had to queue to order dinner. Breakfast croissants stale, coffee machine out of action.
Doors bang shut if not careful and therefore noisy

Happy Review: The location was good as we were meeting a friend flying in to the airport. It was an hour drive to the Cotswolds which we planned to explore. I found the hotel very overpriced. It was one of the most expensive hotels on our trip and was nothing extraordinary. There was a big variety of food at the breakfast. The room was ok, nothing special. The staff were fairly friendly but nothing special either.

Review Title: Great hotel with the loveliest staff
Happy Review: Great location and great facilities. The gentleman at the reception was exceptionally helpful and considerate of our needs as a big family; it was clear he went above and beyond to ensure our rooms were as close together as possible. My sibling was also offered an emergency dental kit when they forgot to pack their toothbrush. It was a lovely stay all in all.
Unhappy Review: It’s a shame there’s no hot breakfast until 6AM and we had to leave before that. The continental breakfast available was lovely though.

Review Title: Only stayed for 1 night but it was comfortable
Happy Review:
Breakfast was nice, good selection. 
Nice size bed.
Unhappy Review: Cleanliness needs a little attentive to the shower.

Happy Review: Everything
Unhappy Review: Menu

Review Title: Bit pricey but for location standard of rooms can’t be faulted
Happy Review: Close to departures nice friendly staff

Review Title: Facilities really nice, food terrible and price very expensive for just the night.
Happy Review: Room was big, clean and was no noise.
Unhappy Review: Good wasn’t the best, me and girlfriend had food night before there wasn’t many gluten free options for her and my meal was very bad had a burger and might be one of the worst ones I’ve ever had, breakfast in the morning was ok, for the price of one night staying there I would think the food would be much better and night time food wasn’t included so had to pay for that.

Happy Review: Praticable for an early flight
Unhappy Review: Parking

Review Title: Nothing too exciting but nice staff and food was fairly decent.
Happy Review: General airport hotel style., ie bland.
Unhappy Review: I was VERY disappointed that we had to pay extra for parking for 1 night after already paying an extra £20 for my dog that slept on the floor

Happy Review: The room is very nice and the was great
location was very convenient
Unhappy Review: The sofa bed was very uncomfortable

Happy Review: Proximity to airport. Welcoming staff. Spacious room
Unhappy Review: Room was too hot

Review Title: Great place to stay for early flight
Happy Review: Handy for early morning flight
Unhappy Review: Booking.com described room as Queens room but only had double bed

Happy Review: Convenient location for flying from Bristol, confortable room and good breakfast

Review Title: An overpriced airport hotel for an overnight stay! Basic accommodation but lovely staff!
Happy Review:
It is functional but totally overpriced! 
As an airport hotel, the staff are extremely helpful. 
The parking charges for leaving car overnight before departing from Bristol airport are outrageous.
Unhappy Review:
Parking charges in hotel car park. 
Basic accommodation. 
Cleanliness needs improving.

Happy Review: Near airport
Unhappy Review: Not have a small cooler/fridge

Review Title: It’s ok but could do better
Happy Review: Lovely styled hotel.  Great location for airport
Unhappy Review: Food menu really poor.  Staff were slow at serving.

Happy Review: Location, staff friendly, quiet
Unhappy Review: Only thing was no USB charger points that I could not find

Happy Review:
Excellent choice of continental breakfast for 4 a.m. start!
Staff very efficient and helpful.
Morning call delivered as arranged. (Very important)
Location of hotel ideal for our needs.
Very comfortable beds with ‘down’ filled pillows.
Unhappy Review: Car parking would be expensive for long stay.

Happy Review:
Breakfast 
Room 
Location perfect for Bristol Airport

Review Title: Lovely but slightly marred by my cut thumb.=
Happy Review: The beds were the most memorable. Very comfortable, good quality bedding and a lovely nights sleep.
Unhappy Review:
The restaurant. We enjoyed the basic menu and the setting with the lovely bar. 
However, the cleaning left a lot to be desired as I cut my right thumb on a sharp piece of glass that was down the seam of my seat. I ran my hand down the seam and felt a sharp sting. I reported to the staff and they filled out an accident report and provided me with blue plaster and antiseptic spray. They apologised, removed the glass but didnt even offer a glass of wine by way of apology.

Review Title: Great location food was good bed was hard drinks expensive taxi’s extortionate
Happy Review: Located on the airport
Unhappy Review:
Bed was hard
Drinks were expensive 
Taxi to other venues were extortionate

Review Title: Just as expected. Clean with friendly staff.
Happy Review:
Food was excellent 
Hotel was clean. 
Beds were comfy.
Unhappy Review: Although the bed itself was comfy. The pillows were awful. Woke up sore.

Happy Review: Location is great if you are flying. 5 minutes walk from the terminal.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast is a bit basic, Choice is limited.

Happy Review: Location and cleanliness. Good facilities.
Unhappy Review: Bed was very uncomfortable and room expensive.

Happy Review: The room was very comfortable and the breakfast was both plentiful and very tasty.
Unhappy Review: Nothing springs to mind.

Review Title: Could be cheaper for a one night stay,leaving very early in the morning. But convenient and comforta
Happy Review: Convenience to airport.
Unhappy Review: More pricey than last year.

Review Title: Fantastic location for flying from Bristol Airport
Happy Review: Clean
Perfect location for an airport stay. Rooms are a nice size and bed comfortable. We left at 4am and had the option to take a continental breakfast with us
Unhappy Review: All good

Happy Review: Location  near airport good sized room, breakfast was good.  Stopped here before would come back due to location. Getting a bit expensive.
Unhappy Review: N/a

Review Title: Perfect stop over for an early morning flight with breakfast available whenever you need to check out
Happy Review: Convenient friendly efficient and clean
Unhappy Review: N/a

Happy Review: Lovely
Unhappy Review: n/a

Happy Review: Enjoy this Hotel as was very convenient & close to the airport. Perfect location. Hotel itself was very clean and modern. The room itself was great as it had everything u need.  Very comfortable bed and nice bathroom. No noise of the airport which was a bonus. Also the staff where Friendly and kindly hold are luggage for us so could have a day out in Bristol.
Unhappy Review: I sorry to say that theirs a few things that disappointed me. One was the cost of the room for one night £175 which is expensive. Another thing that  wasn't the best is the breakfast, I was so disappointed with it, considering what I paid. The full English was a big disappointment, no fry eggs, sausage where discussing, so was the scrambled eggs, bread too. Also the coffee was out of a machine, I could go on. Please sort it out, I wanted to complain but didn't have time as had to go.

Review Title: Did the job but no great experience
Happy Review: Convenient for airport and advance check in of luggage
Unhappy Review: Early morning departure. At 4am no coffee unless paid for despite breakfast included in price. Flight departure at 6.30 meant no time to have anything.

Review Title: This hotel seemed less good than on previous stays while the price had increased.
Happy Review: Pleasant room, comfortable and very convenient location. Great that they have provision for a help yourself continental breakfast for those who have to leave very early to catch a flight but the choice was limited.
Unhappy Review: Evening meal quality was very poor with limited choice and smallish portions for the price. Continental buffet breakfast could be improved. Even though we were very early the fresh fruit platter was finished and had not been replenished.Generally there was limited choice.

Review Title: Excellent place to stay for an early flight. Staff could not have been more friendly. Nice clean comfortable room, decen
Happy Review: Less than 5 minute walk to airport
Friendly staff and the breakfast is lovely

Review Title: Nice clean hotel with well appointed rooms and good breakfast
Happy Review: We booked a late check in and staff were were expecting us (at gone midnight). Breakfast was great, wide choice of food including vegetarian and vegan options. Room was good but the bed was far too firm. Bathroom was good. Super convenient for getting to the airport terminal, which is why you stay there!
Unhappy Review: Bed was far too firm.

Review Title: Airport stay for early flight out and late back, adequet but cheap and cheerful would be better
Happy Review: position for Bristol Airport.
Unhappy Review: Price

Review Title: Airport stay for early flight out and late back, adequet but cheap and cheerful would be better
Happy Review: Airport hotel, excellent location for Bristol airport, rather expensive.
Unhappy Review: Price, breakfast but as had early start not able to have but paid for.

Happy Review: Location to airport
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Room good restaurant more like a mid level cafe
Happy Review: Convenience to airport. Easy walk
Unhappy Review: Ripoff parking charges. Not even a drop off point for luggage. A £7 parking fee for 20 minutes unloading and getting into our room before taking the rental car back is beyond a joke.

Happy Review: Location, comfort and friendly,helpful staff
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Location to air port
Unhappy Review: Drinks to expensive

Happy Review: The staff at this hotel were absolutely faultless. I arrived after a long journey and they were very friendly and welcoming, which was a huge relief as I was travelling alone. The room was spotless and spacious and the breakfast offering was fresh and tasty.
Unhappy Review: The price! It is such a convenient location when flying from Bristol, but it is overpriced for what it is and that is the only thing that puts me off returning.

Happy Review: Bedrooms quiet which is important when you have to get up early for flight
Unhappy Review: A bottle of water in room would be nice

Happy Review:
Gym facilities and very modern throughout. 
Couldn’t hear the aeroplanes
Unhappy Review:
Pillows weren’t very comfortable 
Tv didn’t have Netflix

Happy Review: Very comfortable and quiet rooms. Restaurant was good and affordable. Convenient location.
Unhappy Review: It’s very expensive for what it is. You are paying for the convenience of being located on the airport. Only you can decide if it is worth it. I had an early flight so the extra sleep and less stress was worth it this time but if I had a flight at a reasonable time I wouldn’t consider it.

Happy Review: Location, ease of getting to departure terminal, food was ok with multiple options depending on time of day,  rooms clean, email communication was quick
Unhappy Review: Originally rang the venue to ask a question about booking in times as had had a flight cancelled  at Gatwick so would be arriving very late, receptionist couldn’t answer the simple question of if they operated a 24 hour booking in desk? And after being put on hold for ages the call was disconnected, as I was already in a very stressful situation this wasn’t good

Review Title: Makes an early start at Bristol Airport more bearable.
Happy Review:
Location next to terminal, size of room comfortable bed, quiet.
Helpful staff.
Departures listed and updated in hotel
Unhappy Review:
No flannels in the bathroom.
Tea & coffee limited (no biscuits which would have been nice)

Happy Review: We ate in the restaurant but was very ordinary
Unhappy Review: The plug sockets on the head board didn’t work

Review Title: Comfortable clean stay between flights. Excellent receptionist
Happy Review: Proximity to airport
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Chose the hotel due to early flight from Bristol Airport.  Can't get any closer than over the road!
Unhappy Review:
The cost is a little high for twin room overnight stay as you can't check in before 15.00 and we were out of the room by 4.30 am. 
15.00 check in is a bit of a pain.  Would be better with an option for an earlier check in.

Happy Review: Smart hotel in the perfect location
Unhappy Review: Price!

Review Title: Not a cheap 1-night stay but well worth it for the great location & high standard of facilities
Happy Review: Very helpful, friendly staff, great food selection at breakfast, lunch & dinner, so handy for accessing Bristol airport - just a short stroll to check-in. Lovely fresh decor in all areas and good-sized rooms. The option of a ground-floor room was a real bonus when travelling with heavy luggage.
Unhappy Review: Room felt quite cold and I was unable to adjust the temperature. Not sure if I was having a 'senior moment' and not pressing the right buttons, but an instruction card for adjusting the heating would have been useful.

Happy Review: Didn’t have breakfast as flight was 6 o’clock in the morning. Due to delay only had room for one hour, so quick shower then back to the airport.
Unhappy Review: No delays on flight  from Edinburgh.

Review Title: Value, efficiency and convenient.I would have no hesitation to stay again in future
Happy Review: Proximity to airport after a late flight
Unhappy Review: Breakfast ..... produce okay but not a fan of cafeteria style

Happy Review: Convenient location for our needs.  Room was big enough, clean and comfortable.  Staff very welcoming and friendly.
Unhappy Review: Nothing to dislike.

Review Title: Good pre-flight stop over, comfy bed, slept well :)
Happy Review: Everything about the hotel optimised for easy air travel which is perfect.
Unhappy Review: Little bit basic in terms of facilities, but to be honest given target market is basically people sleeping before they fly, I think that’s the right call.

Happy Review: We had a late flight into the airport so decided to stay over and drive home in the morning. Really glad we did. Room was comfortable, breakfast was good and the walk from the terminal was really short

Review Title: Perfect location, great staff, but quality didn’t match price.
Happy Review:
Check in, staff friendly.
Breakfast was good and so was the supper.
When curtains closed in our room you had to put a light on. When sleeping it meant leaving a light on but none were dimmed enough not to keep us awake. The giant mirror in front of the bathroom door reflected the light throughout the room. That comment was for what we didn’t like.
Unhappy Review:
The bed was hard and uncomfortable.
The bar area had seats which had had their cushions removed so we’re unusable.

Happy Review: Room was very nice, bigger and brighter than I expected. Super handy for the airport, a three minute walk which was brilliant. Breakfast was okay.
Unhappy Review: NA

Happy Review: Very efficient check in and comfortable rooms for an airport hotel. Very quiet! Food ....again efficient and above normal standards for an airport hotel.
Unhappy Review: No decent decaf coffee!! Bar set up late at night needs attention. Quite a few people were waiting a long time for drinks.

Happy Review: All was good
Fantastic for air travel being on the airport door step.
Unhappy Review: We had only two teabags and two coffees and only a sweetner instead of sugar, for the money we paid i don't think it'd hurt to be a little more generous. We did an overnight for flight the next day and had no tea or coffee after break

Review Title: Excellent accommodation for early morning flight, no worries of traffic jams!
Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Close to airport
Quiet and clean
Unhappy Review: Poor ventilation in the bathroom and the water noises from above the room
Bed was too hard and could have benefitted from a memory foam mattress

Happy Review:
Location in airport for early flight
Breakfast included in stay
Unhappy Review: The hamburger I had was awful

Review Title: Very convenient for the airport terminals
Happy Review: Great location, right next to the airport terminal
Unhappy Review: Expensive rooms

Review Title: Would be happy to stay there again.
Happy Review: Modern and the location. Excellent breakfast and staff working to provide it.
Unhappy Review: Room doors have a tendency to slam shut. Rather disturbing.
The sausages weren’t as good as last time tasted different

Happy Review: Spotless. Rooms nicely equipped. Breakfast that starts at 04:00 is great to catch early planes.
Unhappy Review: No mini fridge in the room.

Review Title: Used as like everyone else as there’s little alternative at airport
Happy Review: Only picked due to location to airport and early flight
Unhappy Review: Small room , well used room needs updating.

Review Title: Like i said room and staff were good ,not the evening food/
Happy Review: The room was good ,location good.
Unhappy Review: The breakfast was good but the evening food not good

Review Title: Check in was fast and efficient.  No table service for bar/food but staff friendly.
Happy Review: The location was perfect.
Unhappy Review: The cost of the room was on the pricey side but I guess this is because you have a monopoly.

Happy Review: Location. Short walk to terminal

Review Title: Good spot on the airport,clean rooms but disappointed in the breakfast, not value for money.
Happy Review: The room was fine but the breakfast was 2nd rate,it starts off with good food and then it is let down by the cooking.
Unhappy Review: The breakfast it was so second rate.

Happy Review: Very clean hotel. The room was spacious and quiet. Bed was comfortable. Staff were friendly and attentive. We only used the room for a few hours due to arriving at the airport in the early hours and then travelling onward. Didn't get chance to have the breakfast. The experience in booking was very easy online and was easy to amend after an error on my part on booking the wrong day!!
Unhappy Review:
More milk in the rooms, please.
Could breakfast run a little longer? We arrived at 4am and were very tired after an eight hour journey back to the UK. It was not possible to get down to eat in time.

Happy Review: Closeness to airport terminal
Unhappy Review: Would have liked a hot breakfast, but due to our flight time only continental offered.

Happy Review: The location is perfect, the staff were very helpful, the rooms are extremely comfortable, thank you
Unhappy Review: I would have liked more choice of breakfast, there were few bananas, please have more next time

Happy Review: Great location

Review Title: Great as a stopover before you fly
Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Excellent, brilliant location for late trips into the airport.
Unhappy Review: Shower difficult to obtain a good consistent temperature

Review Title: Good place to stay before an early flight.
Happy Review: Very handy for the airport and helpful that they offer free parking while checking in and dropping luggage (we were parking at the Silver Zone park). As we had an early check-in for our flight we thought we would have to miss breakfast so were pleasantly surprised by the early continental breakfast available.

The hotel is right next to the national Express bus stop and to the airport yet we didn't hear any noise whilst we were trying to sleep. The staff were very friendly. The room was spotless, shower was amazing. They also had a selection of games in the lounge area such as 'guess who' and 'battleships'. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Unhappy Review: The 'on the go' breakfast is NOT very good. It contained an apple, a cereal bar and a croissant. Considering you have breakfast included in the price and no option to remove it, I would consider a better 'on the go' breakfast for people who have early flights. For example, we had to leave the hotel at 4am and the hot breakfast doesn't start until 6/7am. A cold bacon/sandwich sandwich would have been better than a croissant in our opinion.

Happy Review: This is the perfect stopover for flights that are either late getting in or early morning. It is right next to the terminal and far exceeded my expectation both with the staff and the facilities.

Review Title: Have to stay here as no other alternative but very expensive although comfortable.
Happy Review: location to airport after late flight.
Unhappy Review: £160 and no water in room. Checking in at 0200 and receptionist more interested in offering us 10% off our next visit. We were tired! No fried eggs at breakfast and not available. Both coffee machines not working properly at breakfast. Can’t offer a parking deal as spaces owned by Bristol airport so whole thing very expensive.

Happy Review: Excellent breakfast.
Unhappy Review: Reduce room price per night

Review Title: It was good apart from no breakfast
Happy Review: Could not have any as flying out early.
Unhappy Review: That I paid for  breakfast included in the price but you could not provide a cooked breakfast  before  my early  flight. Breakfast  should be optional extra in the price as I paid for something  that wasn't possible to have.

Review Title: My flight arrived quite late in the evening so it was suitable for that situation.
Happy Review: Room was very nice, clean and cool. Very nice helpful staff.
Unhappy Review: Being old I struggled with the journey from terminal to hotel on foot with luggage. Food and drink prices very high and too much self service, given the prices.

Review Title: Friendly staff and close to the airport
Happy Review:
proximity to airport
restaurant and bar area
Unhappy Review: drinks were expensive

Happy Review: Very clean and comfortable
on airport site
Unhappy Review: bedroom far to small, food average, drinks extortionate

Happy Review: It was OK for 4am.
Unhappy Review: An omelette would have been nice,  not just coisonts and cereals

Happy Review: the rooms were clean, tidy and spacious enough
Unhappy Review: the showers didn’t have a bath but were still big enough.

Review Title: convenient when you have an early flight
Happy Review: close to airport

Review Title: if food is improved, this will be a much better hotel overall
Happy Review: room was practical and clean
Unhappy Review: quality and choice of food was poor

Happy Review: Breakfast fab plenty of choice
Unhappy Review: It was fine bit costly

Happy Review: The room was very comfortable and clean. The toiletries in the bathroom were lovely, and the towels were good.
Unhappy Review: The continental breakfast was very poor. The "orange juice" was orange squash, there was hardly any food, and the tea was awful. I think perhaps the machine needed properly cleaned.

Happy Review: The location is great but you get wet going to and from the terminal if its raining
Unhappy Review: too expensive

Review Title: overnight stay before early flight, very comfy night!
Happy Review:
very modern look about the place. upto dare decor. 
evening meal was excellent.
super convenient for the airport.  the staff were so friendly and helpful

Review Title: stayed here after flight cancelled, definitely not worth the £220 for one night stay for solo traveler,
Happy Review:
location to airport 
very clean
helping courteous staff
Unhappy Review: the price way too expensive

Happy Review: Did what it ment to for us.
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Just across the airport, a great gym and breakfast buffet to enjoy before heading for the next stop
Happy Review: Very short walking distance from the airport and a great gym--they had a Peloton!
Unhappy Review: A bit pricey but you are paying for the convenient location so close to the airport

Happy Review: Convenience
Unhappy Review:
Restaurant sub standard and  low quality.
Menu has been the same for years.
We always plan to not eat there but tiredness after travelling means we end up eating there.

Review Title: relaxed and comfortable.  staff were helpful and friendly
Happy Review: close to terminal.  clean.  helpful staff

Very convenient from Bristol Airport for a place to stay late at night after a flight from Barcelona. Saved driving straight home.
Room nice and Clean.  Breakfast was very tasty.
Thé atmosphere in the hotel was relaxed but efficient. all the  staff were all extremely friendly and helpful
The proximity to Bristol Airport. was excellent. An easy check-in and good breakfast. The room was average sized and very clean. We were happy with the room
Unhappy Review: Everything was good and no surprises.

Happy Review: Room and airport was good quick & easy access room was l9vely & comfortable and clean.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast in a bag was poor not much food choice on evening menu plus not accepting cash card only.

Review Title: Great staff and comfort - But the price is just robbery.
Happy Review: I stay here every 12 weeks as I have an early flight to travel to work. As usual, the staff, comfort and cleanliness is great. It’s also very convenient having a place to get a drink and a meal on site.
Unhappy Review: THE PRICE! It’s just absolute lunacy! £220 for one night B & B. I know market drivers etc. but there no need to fleece your customers. Unfortunately for us customers there aren’t really any compatible viable options in the locality.

Happy Review: Did not use the breakfast.   Room overlooked the dirty washing store.

Review Title: Will be booking again next year
Happy Review: Excellent location as we had an early flight and very short distance to the departure area. The continental breakfast was good
Unhappy Review: Not being able to be dropped off by the entrance to the hotel, it was a mad scramble to get out of the car at the roadside and we couldn't say goodbye properly to my husband .You have to pay an exorbitant fee to park for a few minutes

Review Title: Great location right next to the terminal buildings.
Happy Review: The location is amazing! The breakfast was superb!
Unhappy Review: The windows don't open in the rooms. The rooms are small. Could have been a bit cleaner - bleach will take care of mould straight away!

Review Title: Comfortable stay but felt it was a bit overpriced
Happy Review: Location excellent for the airport. Good bus service from centre of Bristol.

Review Title: All good  - need invoice sent to me please
Happy Review: Location and food
Unhappy Review: Fire alarm and evacuation at 4am

Happy Review: Closeness to airport

Review Title: Overnight airport hotel stay in Bristol
Happy Review: Clean and comfortable. What is expected from a Hilton hotel. Very early breakfast (as of 4am) - perfect for early travellers. 10 minutes walk to Bristol Airport.
Unhappy Review: A more varied menu choice from hotel restaurant. Dining area just next to main reception and it looked very busy to me.

Review Title: Thank you very much to all the staff at the Hampton by Hilton
Happy Review: Everything was good the staff were really friendly and helpful the breakfast was good the room was clean we will be staying with you again thank you 😀

Review Title: Convienient, comfortable and a great breakfast.
Happy Review: Very close to the terminal. Nice room, bathroom, tv, sofa. Good wifi. Free, unlimited brekkie was excellent with lots of choices - just make sure you get there before it closes.

Review Title: Good hotel, very convenient location, and you have to pay for that.
Happy Review: The hotel is very convenient for a very early departure time from the airport (we live two hours drive away). The welcome was very friendly, and it was easy to find our way around. It’s also very quiet.
Unhappy Review: It’s an expensive stay (£200 for the night), but the only hotel that allows you to walk to the airport departure gates.

Review Title: For a last minute change to my plans it was a good place to stay
Happy Review: This was a last minute booking as was supposed to fly out the same day but things didn't go to plan and I needed somewhere to stay for the night. The room was lovely; the staff were excellent and very helpful; and the food (both evening and breakfast) were to a high standard.
Unhappy Review: I have to admit that I don't stay in hotels and the price did seem excessive- until I got there and actually saw the place. It was still expensive but I could see why.

Review Title: very convenient but expensive for a v short night
Happy Review: proximity to airport
Unhappy Review:
I chose to book a room through the app, and get a digital key. 
reception then said they need to change my room. digital key arrived 90mins after I got into the room

Review Title: Great facility when you have an early morning flight
Happy Review: Location to the airport and car parking

Review Title: Good for being close to the airport
Happy Review: Great location close to the airport.
Unhappy Review:
The hallways need the windows open, very hot walking up to our room carrying heavy luggage. 
The pillows are rubbish, not a very comfy night sleep with the pillows

Happy Review: clean. convenient. good breakfast. 24h reception. comfortable bed. good shower. great soundproofing.

Review Title: Very pleased with our first stay at this hotel and will use again.
Happy Review:
Conveniently located to the bus stop and the Airport's departure entrance point.
Room was clean with comfortable bedding.
Excellent toilet/shower facilities.
A good selection of cooked and continental breakfasts were available together with fruit juices/tea/coffee, etc.
Very pleasant and helpful Reception Staff.
Unhappy Review: Not much ....but the climb from the Hotel to the Airport's Departure point proved to be a bit of a challenge to my ageing legs.

Happy Review: Right on airport, lovely staff, quiet rooms, and great breakfast options for earlier check outs.
Unhappy Review: Our bathroom was an assessible bathroom, which I wouldn't really mind, but the water wasn't draining properly, and it seeped out of the bathroom. Bar meals a little basic.

Review Title: Great location, attentive and friendly staff and excellent buffet breakfast. Recommended
Happy Review:
Hotel easily accessed from Bristol Airport, even with suitcases/prams down the accessible slopes.
Staff were extremely accommodating and friendly. We arrived at 12.30am and requested a cot. Two staff members met us when we arrived at the room and set it up very quickly so we could get the kids to bed.
Room and rest of hotel was clean and tidy.
The breakfast buffet included in the price the next morning was excellent. Great selection and coffee was good quality.
Hilton Honours allowed us to extend checkout until 2pm for free, which was great as our flight wasn't until 3.30pm. Once we made the pull-out bed back into a sofa, the room was sufficient size for us to stay in for a few hours.
Overall great stay, would highly recommend.
Unhappy Review: We were a family of 4 (2 adults and 1 child and 1 infant), so selected a Queen room with pull out bed and cot. Room was a little snug once the pull out bed and cot were out, but this was fine for a 1 night stay. The next day we folded the bed back to a sofa which gave us enough room.

Happy Review: location near airport and food good
Unhappy Review: bed and pillows not comfortable

Happy Review:
easy access to both terminal and car parks
fantastic staff each time
great location
Unhappy Review: overpriced but worth it for convenience i

Review Title: Nick is a brilliant member of staff, I hope he gets the recognition he deserves.
Happy Review: everything was great, Nick was absolutely fab and made our holiday! He is so polite and friendly!
Unhappy Review: The only thing was an alarm was going off in our room which woke us up but the problem got sorted.

Unhappy Review: nothing

airport so near 
comfortable bed

the pillows and the connection to airport

Perfectly situated right beside the terminal building with covered walkway for some of the way . 
Clean , comfortable and everything you need for an airport stay .
Unhappy Review:
The cost was ridiculous . Overpriced and taking advantage of the monopoly they have at this airport . 
We arrived at 1230am were up at 5 and it cost £220 .
The fire alarm going off at 4 in the morning! 3rd June.

Happy Review: Location very handy for airport and good value.
Unhappy Review: Beds were quite hard.

Happy Review: Very close to the airport which was great for our early morning flight. Comfortable beds and clean room

Limited choice at continental breakfast buffet

Happy Review:
Very reliably clean, comfortable accommodation. Near to transport away from the location when moving on.
Friendly staff snd low key checking after midnight  arrival was much appreciated.
Unhappy Review: Nothing really

Happy Review:
Very comfortable beds which were hugely appreciated after a very long day travelling, and arriving at 3 am. Good blackout so not disturbed in the morning, and able to check out at 12 rather than 11 am. Excellent breakfast, very relaxed environment.
Although it seemed expensive the convenience adjacent to the airport and the comfort offered made it worthwhile.
Unhappy Review: Reception was a little slow, as the receptionist was perhaps inexperienced and needed assistance with the guests ahead of us. This was frustrating for us as we were desperate to get to our room!

Review Title: a relaxing nights sleep after a late flight
Happy Review: The location within walking distance to the airport is super handy.  the room was very clean, beds very comfy, shower good. breakfast could have had a few more choices eg fried eggs, more pastry items like pan au chocolate (considering the price).

Unhappy Review: Price was a little expensive considering it was cheaper to stay in similar hotels abroad. But the hotel was lovely.

Review Title: great for an over night stay.
Happy Review:
this hotel is ideally situated directly opposite the airport, with a path to access steps up to the Main entrance. it was perfect for one night stay over for an early flight. with a continental breakfast available from 4am, it’s brillant to grab and go. 
room was clean and spacious, we had the sofa bed prepare for our young son, it was perfect for him, but for and adult it would have been very uncomfortable. 
we hardly heard a sound from runway and had a good nights sleep. 
staff were very friendly and helpful, we arrived late, exhausted and grateful swift checking.
Unhappy Review: the bed, now don’t get wrong we slept, but the bed felt very unstable and bumpy

Check in was quick and efficient, our room was clean and suited our needs. As we had an early flight the continental breakfast was welcome and had good choices, the hot food starts at 6am.
Nice staff/ easy access to the airport

Happy Review: Location is convenient.

No access to fresh air, window locked so had to use air conditioning. The continental breakfast was very poor with little choice.

Happy Review: This hotel exceeded our expectations. It was spotless, rooms were large and airy and the bed was so comfortable. The decor was super . 24 hour bar a great idea. Staff were FANTASTIC and could not have been more helpful. They bent over backwards to accommodate what we needed for a disabled person and made our airport stay far better than we imagined. We will definitely stay here again for our next flight .

Happy Review: Very convenient for early flights as it is right next to the airport. Good and clean facilities. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Breakfast is excellent quality, but most items don't get restocked, so make sure you get there fairly early to have plenty of choice.

Lovely hotel, but very overpriced for what it is. Unfortunately there is no real competition around, as it's the only hotel at walking distance from the airport. The price seems particularly high if you think that most guests (like us) only stay for a few hours, checking-in late evening and checking-out early morning.
The sofa bed in the family room was very thin and uncomfortable. It would probably be ok for a child, but not great for an adult.

Super convenient for the airport. We had a twin room which had really big twin beds - probably 4 foot. Breakfast was tasty. Impressed that they start continental breakfast at 4am.

Staff on check in were very friendly, room was good size, clean and comfy. Good soundproofing, barely heard an outside noise all night and slept well. Didn’t experience other facilities as left very early in the morning but so convenient to stay right next to airport and get a good nights sleep before an early flight.
Unhappy Review: Bed was quite squeeky when I rolled over, and just wish the price was a little lower.

Review Title: Stayed twice and enjoyed both times. Only down side was the pouring rain on both occasions
Happy Review:
Position  of hotel on airport for easy access , room and breakfast very good,
Staff friendly and attentive including early morning call.
Unhappy Review: More than happy with our stay - can't think of anything we didn't like!

Happy Review: Location is great for departures, just across the road. Used the multi-story carpark which is next door. On checking in found out we could have used the hotel parking but didn't see this as an option when booking.

Happy Review: I love that it’s only a few minutes walk from the Arrivals at Bristol Airport. It’s so handy if you are coming in on a late flight or leaving on an early morning flight.  Staff are friendly and the breakfast hours are great if you’re on an early flight.  There’s a 24 hour reception.
Unhappy Review:
I found the room slightly cold and the bathroom floor very cold. It would be lovely if cloth slippers could be provided to help with this. 
It would help if there were more gluten free options at breakfast and things were clearly labelled for allergies, etc. Thanks.

Was convenient for the airport. Had a quiet room as requested.

Review Title: Brilliant staff, convenient location and comfy room.
Happy Review: We were travelling on a 6am flight with children so decided to book this hotel for the night before. Staff were excellent, hotel is very conveniently located with a short covered walk to the terminal and the multi-storey car park is right next door. Dinner was really nice and while I cannot comment on the official breakfast because we had to be in the airport before it started, a really nice touch they provided a small breakfast bag which was perfect to tie the kids over until we could get on the plane. We had a double room with a sofa bed which was perfect for the kids, really comfy stay.  Would definitely recommend for a nice layover or for making an early morning flight more convenient.

Review Title: Generally good apart from the breakfast set up

The room was clean and bed was comfortable 
Staff very helpful and welcoming

Unhappy Review: take away breakfast needs to improve.  I wa unable to find out if there was a restaurant for evening meal before we arrived and was unaware they have their own parking on site.

Review Title: Perfect hotel for when you flight is cancelled and your next flight is the next night!
Happy Review: My flight from Bristol was cancelled due to snow so as I had stayed at The Hampton previously, I instantly knew to book quickly as there was going to be a lot of people needing rooms that night. The hotel is the perfect location as its just across the road from the airport. The staff were extremely helpful and friendly, which I don’t remember being the case on my first visit. I had dinner in the hotel and I have to say that it was better than I expected and not a bad price. Breakfast was a good selection.
Unhappy Review: I do think the rooms are expensive but I get that you are paying for the convenience of being so close to the airport, plus being the closest, they can charge those prices and still get the guests.

Happy Review: As close as you can be to the airport  very handy. Food was reasonable, comfortable stay food room. Freindly staff.

Review Title: A perfect overnight stay in a conveniently located airport hotel.
Happy Review:
Impressed by the wide variety of food at breakfast and clean layout of self service area.  Waffles were fun to make. Quality of the food we ate was good. We didn't go for a cooked breakfast. 
Bathroom was excellent, loved the shower. 
Very comfortable bed and lovely soft pillows. Didn't hear any planes! 
Good size room which was very clean and ordered. We appreciated the lit pathway from the airport to the hotel after our late flight arrival.
its a good option if you have an early flight

Review Title: Convenient location at Bristol airport with excellent service and a nice breakfast.
Happy Review: The hotel was in a perfect location for me as I needed to be close to the airport for work. Great connection by bus to Bristol city too. I enjoyed the coffee during breakfast a lot, breakfast in general was nice, breakfast area was also clean and staff was ready to help anyone out where needed. The staff at the hotel in general are very friendly and ready to answer any questions. The room was refurbished, was spacious and had all items one could need during a stay.
Unhappy Review: The bed linnen had some area with a glue-like deposit on it which should have been picked up by the person preparing the room and it should have been replaced. I managed to get the deposit off myself though and it didn't bother me anymore.

Review Title: Comfortable hotel, sooooo close to the terminal.  Perfect
Happy Review:
The staff at check in and check out were extremely helpful and so friendly.  The staff in the bar and food area too were very nice.  Food was easy to order and quick to arrive.
As for the room, very comfortable and quiet too which was just what I needed before an early flight.
Unhappy Review: I wish I had know the parking cost before hand and then I would have parked for my whole time in the multi storey car park.

Happy Review: convenient for early flight, even got some breakfast
Unhappy Review: prices at the bar were too expensive

Happy Review: comfortable rooms, good dinner, drinks and an early breakfast that starts at 4am for those catching the early flights! 5 minute walk to airport
Location was perfect and the breakfast was very good.
Unhappy Review: All good

Review Title: Made our onward journey a little easier as we didn’t have to drive to airport in the early hours.

Very comfy and convenient for an early morning flight
very close to the airport terminal, made my check-in for my flight very easy

Breakfast was a bit poor only one coffee machine working not a good selection of fruit and cereal

Happy Review: 5min walk to departure, able to get breakfast from 4am

Happy Review: The breakfast offering was amazing, fresh, and plentiful. The staff were incredibly helpful and friendly.

Great location, easy parking, recommended. Rooms were clean, tidy and comfortable. 
Highly recommended property.

Review Title: excellent tostay after late night arrival or early morning departure

convenience, early breakfast, super comfortable beds.

Unhappy Review: As with all airport hotels it is very expensive but if you want the convenience of the location you have to pay.

Happy Review:
Room and bed comfortable 
Proximity to airport

Happy Review: If you're looking for an easy spot to make it easier to get to a very early flight then you can't do better than this. A one minute walk to the terminal. Hotel itself is exactly what you want from a Hampton.

Review Title: lovely hotel but need to sort the big problem you have with the heating
Happy Review: staff was super friendly and so close to the airport
Unhappy Review: very clean staff could not be more helpful

Happy Review: The rooms are clean, the beds comfortable and the breakfast plentiful. The location within a short walk of the airport is superb.  The free one hour stay for drop offs is very welcome, though needs better visibility.
Unhappy Review: The lack of snacks (cakes, biscuits) to go with a cup of tea or coffee is disappointing.

Happy Review: Convenience to airport. Increased warmth of public areas from previous stays.
Unhappy Review: No rose wine. When I asked for a small red wine I was given a spirit sized measure!  When I asked for complimentary water got told there was a tap in my room.. Asked for fried eggs at breakfast, was told "we don't do fried eggs on Tuesdays".  People skills lacking all round. Also, rooms badly designed with one side of the bed only about one foot from the wall.

Happy Review: All very good, pleasant staff, good evening meal at reasonable price, clean and comfortable room, excellent choice for free breakfast. Would definitely stay there again.
The availability and position of the hotel. Friendly, welcomed by staff. Clean rooms....
Unhappy Review:
Breakfast was more limited than in the past..... acceptable but a bit minimal.
.

Review Title: It was great to arrive in a such a welcoming place, both before departure -  and on our return.
Happy Review: This hotel is the only one at the airport, so it could not fail, but its proximity to it certainly made for a very relaxed departure and arrival. The rooms were not huge, but the beds being very comfortable made up for that and the  toiletries provided: shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, hand wash and body lotion were good quality which made a welcome change as I did not need to unpack may own. The staff were, without exception, all lovely and helpful and pleasant.
Unhappy Review: it would have been good if the bathroom door had been lightproof, so as not to disturb the other guest when needing to get up in the night! It was made with a see-through perspex panel. Also - shutting it made a loud sound and leaving it open to avoid this meant that one was reflected in the mirror opposite the door, whilst doing what you needed to - thus giving one's sharer a great view! We laughed about this, but you may not be aware! Secondly, the entrance area which is filled with tables for guests to drink and eat and meet was looking a bit tired with a few things scratched or peeling and in need of a bit of a refresh, décor-wise to properly meet the star standard.

Happy Review: location next to airport. comfortable. good breakfast.

Review Title: the only on airport hotel so it’s worth the price
Happy Review: excellent location and nice rooms

Review Title: It’s very convenient for the airport but overpriced.
Happy Review: Convenient for the airport. Comfortable and clean rooms.
Unhappy Review: Food isn’t great. No hairdryer or usb ports which I would expect at the high price charged. Badly planned rooms - E.g. no thought given to plugging your hairdryer in and actually being anywhere near a mirror.

Happy Review: receptionist ( young blonde lady) was particularly helpful to us. she deserves full marks and will go far in life
Unhappy Review: bed was lumpy and uncomfortable. this was the only bad point about our whole one night stay .

Review Title: Very convenient and comfy, if you need to stay at the airport.
Happy Review: Friendly, helpful staff. Lovely room and bright modern bathroom. Nice that conditioner was supplied. Friends came for a drink and were able to park for a couple of hours for free, which I really appreciated.
Unhappy Review: Before arriving, it was tricky to discover whether there was a restaurant, or just breakfast; also the parking situation. I feel that these things could be promoted better, as both are positive additions to the hotel 😊

Review Title: An excellent option for an early flight from Bristol Airport
Happy Review: We booked this hotel as we had a 7am flight and we did not have a car. It is a very short walk along a dedicated path across to the airport. Also, a continental breakfast was available from 4am which was excellent. The room was very spacious and well-equipped and the heating worked well.
Unhappy Review: It is relatively expensive as it is the only hotel at the airport but it was worth it for the peace of mind.

Happy Review: across the road from the airport. the english breakfast was fantastic
Unhappy Review: direction/signage to the hotel can be much better

Happy Review: Pretty much everything. The room was very good with a comfortable bed. The staff were friendly and helpful. The breakfast was excellent.
Unhappy Review: The walk to and from the hotel in the rain

Review Title: very convenient location but a few minor issues could be improved.
Happy Review: Hotel  is the only one on the actual airport site so location is good and you don’t need a courtesy bus. Food in the restaurant was standard stuff but good. Rooms are comfortable and quiet and breakfast albeit continental is on from 4:00 am as many staying are on early flights. Good welcome from reception.
Unhappy Review: The hotel is much lower than the terminal building and even roll along bags require either a climb up several steep flights of steps or a lengthy walk up a series of ramps. There is a short covered section but got soaked walking to the terminal in heavy rain. can’t imagine why a covered way isn’t possible. Restaurant area is getting tired now and for our evening meal (self service)it was difficult to find a clean table.

Happy Review: Very near airport for early flight
Beds comfortable, very clean, staff helpful and polite.
Unhappy Review: We had to leave light on in toilet/shower room at night to enable my husband to use toilet safely. The only problem was that the majority of the door is glass and there was also a large mirror opposite, meaning not only was the light in the bathroom shining but also reflected by the large mirror in entrance area, looks very nice and bright, but meaning that the bedroom area was lit up all night, not conducive to a good nights sleep by any  other person in party.

Review Title: Enjoyed the stay. Not the parking charge

Unhappy Review: Overnight parking charge

Unhappy Review: The smoke/fire alarm in the room (right above the bed) made an audible high-pitched whine all night, which did disrupt my sleep. Luckily I was only there from 11pm to 4am or I would have said something to reception.

Review Title: very convenient and comfortable. Staff on check in excellent. staff in morning a little uninterested
Happy Review: really convenient for early flight. quiet room and comfy bed
Unhappy Review: food choice very limited and was surprised at how quickly it arrived after ordering (about 3 minutes!!)

Happy Review:
Great comfortable hotel in short walking distance from airport…
Nice staff…
And great buffet breakfast…
Unhappy Review:
check in was a bit slow…
after flight & airport queues…
I was exhausted.

Happy Review: location, comfort, clean, good facilities, nice food, excellent sound proofing
Unhappy Review:
no cooked vegetarian options at breakfast 
no bath

Review Title: Great other than what ive mentioned already, really made my stay sour as it annoyed me quite a lot
Happy Review: The stay itself was fine.
Unhappy Review: The fact you have to pay £5 to get out of the car in front of the Hotel or risk a £100 fine is a total joke! The check in staff were agreeing with me on this point and stated that its not under their control, which is fine I accept that! However you as a company/leading brand of hotels should be sticking up for your customers for such things to be removed. Why do you feel its ok for your paying customers to ripped off on your front door? Bristol airport are making a fortune from something completely unfair and people are not given an alternative. money money money that's all its about. Unfair.

Happy Review: Great location. Excellent service. lovely and clean rooms
Unhappy Review: Can't really fault the place. Perfect start to our holiday.  No mad rush to the airport or stuck on the motorway.

Review Title: friendly staff, ideal for early morning flight, with breakfast available
Happy Review: very clean and relaxed

The staff were great and very helpful and the bed was very comfy, food downstairs was very nice and didn't have to wait long for it to come to you was close to hotel so didn't have to worry about the walk
Unhappy Review: The bathrooms were not very clean there was some unwanted hairs from previous guests that was the only downfall about the hotel the rest of the room was great

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Its a little expensive

bedroom was cold not told till the day we checked out we had to request if we wanted heating on.This should be in the information pack.
like wise we were dropped off at the hotel and have twice paid a parking fee but this time discovered yo didn’t have to if you took the ticket to reception.

Review Title: Friendly efficient hotel.  Very comfortable room and bed.   Good bathroom and always very clean.
Happy Review: Efficient service.  Friendly staff.  Housekeeping staff particularly good.
Unhappy Review:
Breakfast was a little disappointing.  I found the food quite oily.   The coffee machine is good but the powdered milk completely spoils the taste.
Food choice for dinner was limited and until I ordered the curries I found the beef burger and the calamari dishes quite tasteless and the salads were very limited.  
The tables in the dining area need constant cleaning and the soft furnishings need to be steam cleaned - they are stained and dirty with food.  It creates a bad impression altogether.

Review Title: other than above it was really good
Happy Review: good efficient and wonderful staff (well the front desk when we got there)
Unhappy Review: no refrigerator in the room (which was rather important, marketing told us there was one?

Happy Review:
staff were very helpful 
bedrooms very spacious and spotless
Unhappy Review: no shuttle to the airport travelling with someone in a wheelchair was not good at all but not the hotels fault!! Chelsea on reception was superb

Happy Review: Landed after 10pm so was unable to get hire car until the following day. A pleasant overnight stay with breakfast.

room

Unhappy Review: Short walk with plenty of steep steps, or ramps taking far longer, to walk to airport. No problem if fit and able and not pouring with rain! Arrow taxi rank at airport able to oblige with pickup from hotel and dropoff at airport for under 20 pounds. Worked, but you need to plan in advance especially if heavy rain as I had.

Happy Review: clean and convenient

Unhappy Review: With two medium sized suitcases, we found the walk to and from the airport difficult and tiring. This was never explained before we booked the hotel and was not expected. We are reasonably fit and not disabled but neither are we Olympic athletes!!!

Happy Review:
Excellent location right next
to the airport.

Happy Review: perfectly located as we had a very early flight

I couldn't have been more wrong. Great atmosphere, friendly and welcoming employees, decent size room and simply the best bed I've ever slept in (I want one!)

The room was comfortable.

Nobody around to speak to at 4a.m. Receptionists busy with customers checking out

Very close to airport terminal

Reception told us breakfast was from 4am - 11am
We arrived for breakfast at 10.10….to be told by quite a grumpy employee breakfast finished at 10am.
He reluctantly interrupted a business meeting in the breakfast area and then agreed we could have breakfast.
Not great as we’d paid £165 for the night. We didn’t have toast, fruit etc as felt a bit awkward interrupting the morning briefing. The grumpy employee might have offered to help get the extra things we needed for a full breakfast.

Happy Review: Good food

Happy Review: Normally Hampton's are basic and sometimes slightly depressing "liverpool airport Speke Hampton Hotel comes to mind" but this is not! Staff were brilliant from my 2:30 am check-in, my everything is included breakfast and to finally check-out. Great help, good breakfast & great service, to be honest best customer service ive received in a hotel for over 2 years and THATS alot of hotels. Well Done to your staff and you are definitely the bonus to a slightly unimpressive Bristol Airport.
Room clean comfortable excellent location to terminal. Food choice and quality not bad. Staff were friendly
Unhappy Review: Little bit over priced you get caned for last minute booking .

Happy Review: The convenience to the airport. The friendly staff, particularly at reception. Incredibly comfortable beds. Lovely temperature in bedroom. Clean and tidy rooms.
Unhappy Review: The poor chouce of food for our evening meal, very basic and special menu stated peas but they were mushy peas....yuk!

Review Title: Did the job  though not a enjoyable and relaxing start to holiday, thought it was expensive.
Happy Review:
Convenient and geared up for flights, efficient and friendly check in. quiet, good beds, good sleep. Breakfast from 4 am ! 
Super close walk to terminal, though wouldn’t be ok if you had mobility problems as included 2 flights of steps.
Good that taxis get a free pass out otherwise they won’t accept pick up .
Unhappy Review:
We were sorely disappointed by the poor quality, limited choice and poor value of evening meal . The ‘Special’ was a dried up cheap pie, brown smash and a few mushy peas - only the gravy made it edible. I thought even the staff were embarrassed. The dining room area was grubby and tired (seats stained and bits of coleslaw / food o do had to watch where you sat).Badly arranged canteen style with little ambiance  or coziness and  was a continuation of reception and the thoroughfare to the airport. 
Breakfast was really good but chaotic, only one coffee machine switched on , run out of teabags, food stations and crockery/ cutlery not topped up - so took ages to find things you wanted . 
Room was good except for trim missing on bathroom door and grubby and shredded shower tray non slip section .
Not what I expected from a good brand and premium price.

Happy Review: position

Review Title: THE LOCATION WAS BRILLIANT BUT AT A HIGH PRICE.
Happy Review: WE CHOSE THE HOTEL PURELY FOR THE LOCATION AND THAT IT WAS A GOOD HOTEL CHAIN.  THE STAFF WERE EXTREMELY FRIENDLY AND PROFESSIONAL.
Unhappy Review: FOR ONE NIGHT'S STAY £240 FOR ONE NIGHT WAS A LOT OF MONEY AND OVERALL DID NOT MEET OUR EXPECTATIONS FOR THAT COST.  THE ROOM FACILITIES WERE GOOD BUT HAD A BASIC LOOK/FEEL..........CONSIDERING THE COST OF THE ROOM.  WE HAD A MEAL BUT I HAD TO TAKE MINE BACK AS IT HAD NOT BEEN MICROWAVED THOROUGHLY.  THE CENTRE WAS COLD AND THE REST TEPID.   THE STAFF WERE QUICK TO SORT THIS OUT AND THE REPLACEMENT MEAL WAS PIPING HOT.  HOWEVER, THE MEAL SHOULD HAVE BEEN PIPING HOT TO BEGIN WITH!  ONCE AGAIN, FOOD AND DRINK HIGHLY PRICED BUT NOT AT A STANDARD THAT GOES WITH £240 PER NIGHT.

All in all, OK for convenience but very expensive (£157) for what we actually got.

Review Title: a very suitable overnight stop before a flight at silly o’clock

breakfast was good, plentiful and well maintained. 
continental available from 4am for early LCC flights. 
rooms were bright and sound proofed 
bar food and bar were easy and served a good selection. 
the 4 minute walk to the terminal has a 6 minute option for those who don’t wish to drag cases up about 10 -15 steps. 
staff were friendly and helpful. 
wifi was good and simple to connect and stay connected. 
yea and coffee facilities in the room were good.

We paid for 3 people in the room and there were 3 beds made up but there were not 3 towels, not 3 cups and not 3 glasses?

Review Title: Excellent for early morning travellers if a little on the expensive Side.

Unhappy Review: We had an issue with checking in. I had booked two rooms and they had difficulty with finding one of the rooms details. However this was sorted quite quickly. Little on the expensive side for the time we were there.

Happy Review: Room was excellent - everything great.   Location great - short walk to Terminal - ideal place to stay for an early morning flight.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast - coffee from machines not very good.  Croissant doughy and not cooked through.  Cooked choices were not appetising.  Yoghourt was deiicious though!

Happy Review: Well isolated rooms, comfy beds, great variety at breakfast and good fitness room too

At the morning buffet the potato cakes were hard and dried out.  The vegetarian sausages were of very poor quality and tasted horrible.  I think you need to increase awareness of available vegan and vegetarian options for cooked breakfast.

Happy Review: We have stayed here quite a few times when having an early flight or late arrival. In terms of proximity to the airport and pure convenience, it just can't be beaten.
Unhappy Review:
Compared to previous stays, this was disappointing. The hotel remains unchanged in terms of cleanliness, professional staff and convenience etc., but the price we paid was considerably higher than before - I would say double the price, if not more. My past reviews were, of course based on a lower price, and therefore better value.
The food served also seemed to be of lower quality - same menu, similar price, but just not as good. 
We have decided, despite the obvious convenience, not to repeat our stay at current pricing levels.

Happy Review: Short walk from the airport, lovely staff, v comfy bed and good breakfast. There's also a huge space for hanging out before you need to go to the airport, with departure boards. Much more comfortable than the airport itself.
Super fast check in, I was done in 2mn. The room was perfect, spacious, clean, comfortable bed, everything there. Short walk to the terminal. Staff very professional.
Unhappy Review: The restaurant is not really a restaurant. I order indian food, it arrived within 5mn, tasted rather like a cheap ready meal (I really believe it was a ready meal, it was definitely NOT proper food cooked from scratch), awful. And you can only pay by card, they do not accept cash. I wish I got a Subway from the terminal instead.
