Happy Review:
The staff were all very helpful but some were new and did not know the system. The room was perfect for my mother and I. It did not mention that there was a kettle in the room which was an added bonus. My Aunt and Uncle drove us to the hotel which was quite a distance for them. It was so nice that we were able to offer them tea in the restaurant and not have to pay a parking fee as the car parking ticket was validated by the reception staff.
I was also able to push the wheeelchair for my Mother from the room to the airport check in without too much effort.
Very good location next to the airport, perfect for my morning flight. Very nice size room with comfortable bed and excellent breakfast.

Late, very late check in thanks to a very delayed flight was no bother. Check in staff were very welcoming indeed. Bed very comfy, quiet, welcome night sleep.
Breakfast staff were very helpful and happy. Made to feel really welcome.
Unhappy Review: The prices have been creeping up somewhat. Looking at future prices, I think we may need to look elsewhere which is a shame because this has always been a good value hotel.

Happy Review: Really comfortable and clean. Breakfast started at 4am and it was brilliant..lots of choice. Was given choice of floor too and staff were lovely.
Unhappy Review: It was quite expensive for one night stay but I was willing to pay this for the convenience if being so close to airport in morning.

Review Title: Nice hotel, dinner in restaurant poor
Happy Review:
Lovely fresh rooms, nice and big, easy to control temperature, black out curtains excellent.
Breakfast setup great for early flights
Quick walk to airport
Unhappy Review:
Food was terrible. Ordered a jacket potato with beans for my daughter, the beans were stone cold with some scrambled egg in them??? Couldn't help but think they were left over from breakfast. Gross. 
I ordered a burger and chips and neither were even warm! We sent both meals back (after having to flag restaurant staff down they were no where to been seen during the meal) but both came back barely warm again. Couldn't be bothered with the faff of having to find someone again as we were starving from travelling. 
No one came to check or say sorry it was really poor for the price of the food and the price of the rooms!

Happy Review: Get staff, location, breakfast, cleanliness etc.
Unhappy Review: We wanted family room (2 adult 2 kids) but all that was available was double with sofa bed pullout. The pullout sofa in the room had a hard metal mechanism poking out which our young daughter hurt herself on while getting out of the bed.

Happy Review: Such a convenient location to the airport- great. Check in was speedy and the receptionist was helpful and informative. Beds were comfortable and we slept well
Unhappy Review: Surprised that breakfast ended so abruptly and also so soon after fresh hot food had been put out

Review Title: Was good value for what we needed. Ie . 1 night stay before early flight. Was , we thought value for
Happy Review: Did not have breakfast, left for early flight, took pre packed breakfast bag. Was acceptable , could have  been a bit more substantial. But acceptable..
Unhappy Review: Nothing.

Happy Review: How close it is to the airport.
Unhappy Review: The prices at the bar.

Review Title: just the best place to stay when you have a late arrival or early departure.
Happy Review:
super convenient and confortable 
super nice personnel
Unhappy Review: the food isn’t really great but that’s ok

Review Title: Enjoyable nights stay that took the stress out of travelling and flying on the same day
Happy Review: Location takes the stress out of travelling to the airport same day to fly. Friendly staff, clean room, great shower and comfortable bed. Food and drink was reasonably priced given the location
Unhappy Review: Was not made aware at check in that a breakfast bag was available for early departures. This would have been good to know as breakfast proper is not available until 4am.
Ok

Happy Review: Comfortable bed. Nice shower. Clean room. Breakfast available since very early morning. Efficient service at reception and restaurant. Convenient location.
Unhappy Review: Room size just about right - I would have liked it a bit bigger given the room price. Hair dryer missing. Restaurant menu is ok but some little improvements could help. Service at the restaurant very minimal - no table cloth, cheap silvery, table not quite clean.

Review Title: Good option if you have an early flight
Happy Review: Excellent location. Comfortable room. Friendly staff.
Unhappy Review: Nothing in the short time we were there, we arrived late and left very early & only spent time in our room.

Review Title: A good and convenient airport hotel
Happy Review: The breakfast was really good. I was wondering expecting a continental type meal but instead there was a well cooked full English breakfast available as well as a wide choice of cereal, toast and fruit
Close proximity to the airport terminal. Staff were helpful. Clean rooms. Lots of places to sit and relax.
excellent rooms; beds extremely comfortable
Unhappy Review: what's not to like?

Review Title: Does the job for a stay before an early flight.
Happy Review: Continental breakfast from 4am, good if you have an early flight. 3 minute walk to the terminal.

Review Title: great location for sirport but expensive
Happy Review: nice clean comfortable rooms
Unhappy Review: restaurant/ bar area - like a canteen

Happy Review: Staff good
Unhappy Review: Breakfast did not reflect the cost
breakfast bag could have included more/better quality items

Happy Review: clean, spacious, comfortable
Unhappy Review: too many steps down to the hotel

Happy Review: Gym
Unhappy Review: Really poor evening meal cold.and poor; wouldn't recommend this hotel

Review Title: would definitely stay here again and recommend to other people
Happy Review: so close to the airport it’s perfect
Unhappy Review: breakfast wasn’t the best but adequate

Review Title: Handy for airport but not good value for’oney
Unhappy Review: Food very poor and overpriced

Happy Review: It would be good if they could have a flight info screen on each floor so you don't go and hand your key in then on way out see your flight is delayed for 2hours
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Perfect location, staff friendly
Unhappy Review: No additional pillows in room

Review Title: Necessary due to late arrival of flight. Room, facilities, breakfast all as it should be.
Happy Review: All just as it should be but expensive for a few hours sleep. Breakfast good.
Unhappy Review: Price

Review Title: great place to stay prior to an early morning flight
Happy Review: close to the airport and provided an early breakfast

Review Title: very close to the airport stay
Happy Review: ideal for airport early/late flights; nice downstairs lounge/restaurant

Review Title: All the staff were  cheerful and extremely helpfully
Happy Review: I had ordered special assistance with Ryanair and the hotel told me that there was no problem with this. However at 4am they were not able to contact Ryanair - no one was answering the phone.After more than half an hour of trying, one of the receptionists said that she would go up to the airport with me and carry my luggage. I was very grateful and thought that this was above and beyond the call of duty.
Unhappy Review: I would have liked waitress service in the restaurant. As I have a back problem I found standing in a queue waiting to order very difficult.

Review Title: great for an early flight but expensive
Happy Review: Clean, friendly staff, location great for airport
Unhappy Review: it was expensive

Review Title: We can thoroughly recommend this hotel and will use again
Happy Review: the location was excellent and the decor and size of room exceptional
Unhappy Review: the quality and price of meals being offered

Happy Review: Close to terminal, great rooms, modern, bright, nice staff, comfortable beds, nice toiletries....fresh clean linen. Good to have breakfast and a restaurant available.
Unhappy Review: Buffer breakfast could be improved, breads with cold meats would be better, one coffee machine and hot water not working.

Happy Review: Great to have the hotel just a short walk from the airport, when we didn't land until 1:30 in the morning!
Made our flight out to Majorca so much easier after a good nights sleep and breakfast readily available to help ourselves. Room clean and comfortable..

Review Title: great location but price is going up significantly every year. service is really poor but the location is unbeatable for
Happy Review: location
Unhappy Review: service

Happy Review: Comfortable hotel Ideal location for the airport.
excellent facilities, good breakfast, great location

Review Title: A good place for a short stay.
Happy Review: Good location for an incoming flight at midnight.

location was excellent

Review Title: Pleasant stay, would do it again.

Happy Review: Location

Unhappy Review: No complaints all as expected

Happy Review: was very short walking distance to the airport. Was quiet so could have a good night rest before the early morning flight.

Review Title: We enjoyed our stay and being able to check our luggage in with Jet2 the night before made things so much less stressful
Happy Review: proximity to the airport.
Unhappy Review: Takeaway breakfast was very poor. Two cartons of juice, an apple and a packet of biscuits!
Room service

Happy Review: welcoming
Unhappy Review: poor external signage from the Airport.  Poor lighting to the hotel once one had left the immediate Airport area, as a woman I would have been very wary if I had been on my own. Some breakfast foods not available.

Happy Review: Conveniently located on the airport. Room comfortable.
The location was excellent  and so surprised we couldn’t hear any noise from airplanes.  Excellent breakfast. Your front of house male on the checking in desk was very pleasant and helpful.
Unhappy Review: We did go to get some drinks and a female serving was a little bit brusk and not extremely helpful, plus I couldn’t get a coffee as she said the machine was broken.  She seemed a little bit impatient.

Happy Review: Walking distance to airport
Unhappy Review: Breakfast was not cooked properly

Happy Review: at the airport so great for tired travelers.
Unhappy Review: breakfast was very basic.

Happy Review: easy access to airport for early morning flight
Unhappy Review: restaurant service could be better

Happy Review: great location for airport

Review Title: Great for an early morning flight
Happy Review: Right next door to the airport, had an early morning flight so missed breakfast but they did a take away breakfast of a croissant, juice and an orange.  Friendly staff, restaurant food is quick and easy ie pizza, burgers, pasta dishes
Great location
Unhappy Review: Only a takeaway breakfast bag as I had an early flight, but the booking is bed and breakfast

Review Title: we would definitely stay there again. Ideal location
Happy Review: convenient location, clean, bedrooms quiet.
Unhappy Review: queues for drinks and food. insufficient staff

Happy Review: Didn’t have breakfast
Unhappy Review: Thought it was expensive

Happy Review: Location, comfortable and clean. Good breakfast
Unhappy Review: Everything was ok

Happy Review: The location in relation to the departures at the airport

Review Title: overpriced but convenient stop over for early morning flights.
Happy Review: proximity to airport is main reason to use this hotel as the room price has become very expensive.  Staff are pleasant.
Unhappy Review: Nothing much not to like except perhaps there was a lack of anything easy to grab like a banana at 4am for an early morning flight and no bags obvious to take a pastry in.  I didn't have time to search for a staff member to ask.  I would only use this hotel when flight departure is 8 am or earlier as it has become quite expensive.  There are many other options within a 10 minute drive some offering airport transfers.

Review Title: Very convenient for flights and a good quality room
Happy Review: The room was very well appointed, attractive and spotlessly clean. The bed was very comfortable and the room was well sound-proofed. staff at reception and in the bar/restaurant were all very friendly and helpful.
Unhappy Review: The restaurant meal wasn’t great quality and the advertised ’grab and go’ breakfast for early starters turned out to mean ‘make your own breakfast and put it in one of these bags - except that we’ve run out of bags.’ We ended up just grabbing a croissant, which turned out to be stale.
Juice provided that had to be thrown away at check in

Review Title: Very good stay after a flight
Happy Review: Location is just outside arrivals/departures.Food available at all times and the breakfast is particularly good.Very clean and comfortable place to stay
Unhappy Review: Nothing to dislike

Happy Review: rooms were spacious, very clean. the rooms a were very quite . walking distance to the airport.ordered evening food which was very good .
Unhappy Review: that the high price did not include a takeaway breakfast which was in with the prices. we had a early start. that we had to pay parking at this hotel which was next door to the hotel.

Happy Review: clean, nice shower, lovely staff.
Unhappy Review: Not a great mattress and duvet too small for a queen size bed! why do hotels use too small duvets? curtains could do with a  hoover! very dusty. Food was adequate but not great.

Review Title: Excellent location and a very well maintained hotel with polite and friendly staff
Happy Review: Great location for airport.
Unhappy Review: There were several items on the menu not available.

Happy Review: location
Unhappy Review: reception staff so very slow at check in - late at night and just took ages with the computer and paperwork.

Review Title: Convenient location but what happened to my pajamas??
Happy Review: Convenient
Unhappy Review:
I left my pajamas in the room and only noticed when I got to the holiday destination but thought no worries picking up thecar in a week's time I will call in to Reception which I did. Told them I had been in Room 10 a week ago but staff said no pajamas.  Either the cleaner took them or simply threw them away.  I emailed the General Manager and have heard nothing.
Considering we paid £186 for the room and we had to leave at 2am in the morning and we were told there would be breakfast bags to Takeaway which there wasn't I think it is not good value.
Surely a hotel of this size must have some sort of Lost Property system in place.
The take away breakfast was poor  in comparison if had a full breakfast for the same price.  Banana, breakfast bar, OJ and pain au chocolate did not warrant a B&B price

Happy Review: The staff were brilliant in the restaurant and bar area.
Unhappy Review:
The menu and food were very basic.
The communal areas were quite dirty

Review Title: Just want we needed and so clean and very helpful staff on reception
Unhappy Review: Disappointing menu but everything else very good. Would stay again

Happy Review: Located
Unhappy Review: Fire door outside room banged due to door dampers not working

Review Title: Great location within the airport - value for money.

Amazing provision of takeaway breakfast for early morning flyers.
Unhappy Review: Could be more sound proofed.

Happy Review: Location excellent for an early morning flight

Happy Review: Location and service v good.

Review Title: Comfortable hotel very close to airport.

Happy Review: We had an early flight so it was perfect location being a  5 minute walk from the airport. Nice toiletries. Tea and coffee is room which is always a plus! The room was spacious and clean.

Happy Review: Room.was clean., good shower and comfortable bed
Unhappy Review:
Not much of a choice at breakfast at 5am.

located on the main Bristol Airport site. a short walk from the terminal. as the airport struggles to administer flights a pre flight hotel is essential. early morning flights are severely impacted. travel to the airport the night before and maximise your sleep.
the staff at the hotel are warm and welcoming

it's a shame that that the hotel fails to deliver the basics:

Slow check in, cott not in room when requested and when delivered dumped in room hallway without being able to get it past the bed and into the room.
Breakfast bags provided for those departing before 4am, but no pre-orders taken for these. None left when we got to the lobby so we had to go without.

check in and check out
breakfast set up

More staff at dinner time to handle the number of customers.
dinner was brought to table efficiently and was a good curry dinner.

Happy Review: Clean and comfortable and very close to the airport which is helpful when catching an early flight.

Review Title: Pretty good but the early breakfast should be out earlier

Review Title: It was fine for our purpose but the food needs stepping up.
Happy Review: Happy with the room and service.
Unhappy Review: The food is appalling and we’re not fussy eaters. It was just the same the last time we stayed.

Happy Review: Excellent location. Good size room and friendly staff. I would happily stay there again.
Unhappy Review: There was an issue at check in, all the computers were down which caused a delay. This was not the fault of the staff, who were trying their best to deal with the situation in a polite and friendly manner, however after a long day of travelling and arriving quite late, it added to my tiredness!

Happy Review: Excellent location. Nice staff. Lovely breakfast options. Perfect for the airport, literally 5 mins walk

Staff were very welcoming and helpful on arrival and departure. The room was  perfectly adequate for our needs and was very quiet - which was unexpected and very welcome. The breakfast was fine with a varied choice. I was impressed with the electronic noticeboard in the breakfast/lounge area that listed flight arrivals and departures - it appeared to be the same as the one used in the airport.
Unhappy Review: The pillows. I prefer a slim to medium thickness pillow. The 2 pillows provided were much thicker than I'd prefer.

Happy Review:
The self-service breakfast was excellent. So many choices, and using a tray made everything easier. Just like in the good old days at school.
I hope the management appreciates the staff.

Review Title: functional, let’s face it who chooses to stay in an airport hotel?!
Happy Review: the staff were young and lovely even when clearly pushed by so many visitors
Unhappy Review: house keeping need to hoover under the beds!  I also would have loved a non caffeine late night drink - herb teas?

Happy Review: convenient location for early departure or a late arrival … staff very friendly

Review Title: Great for overnight stay before early flight.
Happy Review: Really handy for overnight before we flew and we could check our luggage in the night before. Made the whole security check much easier as did the paid for fast track.
Unhappy Review: Very busy bar service for both drinks and food as the hotel doesn't have a restaurant as such. The staff were doing their very best but they had a lot of people to serve.

Happy Review: location
Unhappy Review: price

Happy Review: It was in a good location to get to the airport for an early flight.
Unhappy Review: The food menu seemed limited and they didn’t accept cash. It was my understanding that cash was still legal tender 🤷‍♂️

Review Title: splendid stay here before my flight
Happy Review: room very smart and clean
Unhappy Review: shower was cheap

Happy Review: Very close to airport terminal. Basic , reasonably comfortable room. Convenient!
Unhappy Review: Pillows were terrible.. flat and hard. Nobody answered at reception on repeat calls to change them/ get more.

Happy Review: Position

Review Title: Generally good room but breakfast disappointing.
Happy Review: Excellent location.
Unhappy Review:
Breakfast was quite disappointing, no staff, no fried eggs, fruit salad was clearly from a low range catering tin. Layout not intuitive at all.
The shower in the room did not drain fast enough to prevent overflow.

Review Title: Nice and convenient for the airport, slightly overpriced though....
Happy Review: Hotel nice and quiet and really handy if you have an early morning flight and need are travelling to the airport the day before.
Unhappy Review: Check in took absolutely ages as the payment systems were down. Eventually got booked into my room and the payment was taken during the early hours of the next morning. Once I got to my destination country I had a notification off my card provider to say the hotel had taken the same payment again. So did the person I was travelling with. Could not get hold of them by phone so upon arrival back to Bristol Airport had to physically go in the hotel wait for ages in the que and then take the issue up with the person on the check in desk. It was resolved but was hassle I could have done without.

Happy Review: location
Unhappy Review: nothing

Happy Review: Close to terminal and parking, good clean hotel with cooked breakfast.

Member of staff at front desk very good, great ambassador for Hilton 
well done

Review Title: Perfect place for an early flight.

Happy Review: The location was central to my travel and it worked out well
Unhappy Review:
The Parking. Unfortunately having to pay for parking is a massive dissapointment. In Ireland the one good thing is people staying in the hotel have free parking. This was also not advertised that you had to pay the parking and if it was not for the staff explaining how to do the parking I would have ended up with a large unexpected bill.
The bar was cashless. The other issue was the bar/restaurant was cashless. If you did not have a credit card then you could not purchase any food or drink.
Price doubled since my stay in Jan 2022

Review Title: Convenient stopover but at a price.
Happy Review: Within walking distance of Bristol airport. Modern hotel. Nice food.
Unhappy Review: Our pre booked cot for baby wasn’t in room. Only towels for one person in twin room. Pricey.

Happy Review: very modern and close to the airport

Review Title: Perfect short stay before early flight.
Happy Review: So convenient for a very early flight at the airport. Room and shower room modern, well equipped and comfortable. Good evening meal and could even take some breakfast with us.
Unhappy Review: A bath would have been nice as well as a shower.

Happy Review: friendly staff, convenient location.
Unhappy Review: slippery shower tray.  drinks on the bar were expensive.  bed a little too hard.

The way that the food section operated. We had ordered some fish and chips. Fish was not cooked properly. Waited ages and then we were told it could be cooked again I said we will get a sandwich from Airport no offer of a refund!! Totally unprofessional . The room excellent very clean even showerhead . Check in professional and friendly . The above was a big let down

Review Title: Very good location for airport very quiet slept well.
Happy Review: Didn't have breakfast was an early morning flight
Unhappy Review: We asked for an early morning call which we didn't get, we asked at reception and they said the phone in our room didn't work. Not very good!!

Review Title: fully recommend this hotel for airport stay
Happy Review:
excellent location for travelling,
staff were very helpful
Unhappy Review: poor choice of food for evening meal

Happy Review: Lovely atmosphere, comfortable room, friendly staff.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast included in room price but not available for us as we had a 6am flight as our flight was at 6am and we had to leave the hotel before breakfast. Therefore paid for something that wasn't available. No option when booking room to not pay for breakfast.

Happy Review:
Lovely room, easy walking distance to the terminal
The food was good - we both had a curry. We will stay there again.

Review Title: clean, tidy, comfortable hotel that does what it says!
Happy Review: clean and functional. friendly welcome by the check in staff
Unhappy Review: having to cue up to order evening meal and drinks. not the greatest way to start a holiday but I guess this property is simply a transit stay for early morning next day flights. the smell of burnt toast at 5am in the morning was also a bit off putting.

Happy Review:
Location convenience, Room excellent 
Staff very helpful

Review Title: our stay was short but food was good and easy access to airport
Happy Review: very close to the airport for early am flight
Unhappy Review: nothing

Happy Review: Great room location
Unhappy Review: Price time of breakfast

Review Title: Decent stay at Hampton by Hilton Bristol Airport
Happy Review:
Check in was excellent, really attentive, genuinely friendly and helpful. 
I travel a lot and so often reception and check in is awful. It's the first contact the guest has with the hotel and important to be right.
Room was comfortable, clean and generally quiet. Asked for a quiet room away from lift traffic and was accommodated.
Unhappy Review:
Food ordering system and other pushy customers jumping the queue.
Appeared that some groups had package holiday vouchers which, to them, meant entitlement and special treatment.
It's a package holiday airport hotel so I suppose that is to be expected.
Food was OK, bar team very helpful given the circumstances.

Review Title: great hotel for early or late airport arrival
Happy Review: quick check in, good breakfast and nice rooms
Airport, room and breakfast good value

Location excellent, cleanliness and comfort of bed.
Good sound insulation
Unhappy Review:
No body shower gel / soap in container. No bottle water in room.
Menu was abysmal ,too basic and limited.

Review Title: Comfortable. and efficient but tooo expensive
Happy Review: It was comfortable  and efficient with helpful, The location was ideal.
Unhappy Review: It was far too expensive and I would not book there again

Review Title: Great overnight stay for an early morning flight.
Happy Review: Friendly and welcoming staff, good food, comfortable room. The location is brilliant with just a short walk to the airport terminal building.

Happy Review:
Easy checkin. Room perfect for family of 3
Beds comfortable and spotlessly clean 
Also so close to airport for an early flight
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: So comfortable and convenient for an early flight.
Happy Review: Hot Breakfast is very good. Early cold breakfast is available from 4.00 hrs for early flights.

Review Title: Very nice hotel, great location, but the price had gone up a lot
Happy Review: The airport location, cleanliness and staff friendliness were excellent

Happy Review: the location and ease of arrival
Unhappy Review: the fan in the bathroom ran noisily all night.

Review Title: Comfortable, good welcome but could have done more for very early morning flight food
Happy Review: Good location
Unhappy Review: The hotel were fully aware of earlier check outs ,telling us to get to the airport by 4am but breakfast started at 4am so in my opinion knowing the ongoing problems at airports ,should  have had 3.30am access to continental breakfast at least or bread roll jam and butter in room come on Hampton !

Happy Review: Spacious clean hotel right at the airport.
Unhappy Review: .Early check-in was a bit annoying. We had to join the Hilton club to check-in early.

Review Title: Comfortable stay, very convenient for airport
Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Arrangements for evening meal

Happy Review: Reception staff on checking in were excellent, and very helpful.

Happy Review: The location is perfect if you need to stay near the airport. The room are comfortable and clean. The staff are very helpful and friendly. The breakfast was good. All in all very good value for money.

Review Title: Really nice but except for not having toothpastw

Happy Review: very convenient for airport

I received many messages to use the online key, but it wouldn't activate, although I continued to receive more messages to use it.
The cooked breakfast is luke warm and over cooked.

Happy Review: Location is excellent.  Room very clean.

Happy Review: Breakfast was good, we left early so only had the continental but good choice

Unhappy Review: all fine

Review Title: very handy for airport, only scrambled eggs at breakfast
Happy Review: near airport

Review Title: We enjoyed our stay but we found it expensive and would only use it on certain occasions.
Happy Review: Continental breakfast adequate. The position to the airport was perfect and the room was adequate for the night and very clean.
Unhappy Review: It is a Hotel that is used by the airport passenger and as such is very good.

Happy Review:
2 minutes walk to airport terminal 
iron, ironing board & hairdryer in room.  Quiet room, great shower. room had everything needed for 1 night stay

Happy Review: Nice, clean and comfortable room in good location

Review Title: Perfect for a relaxed, comfortable pre flight stay.
Happy Review: Easy check in, comfortable and quiet room. Good food menu although several items were out of stock.  What we had was very nice, however.  Nicely stocked bathroom, comfy mattress so we slept well and it was a fast check out. Also able to walk to the airport easily.
Unhappy Review: One long queue to order food and drink which meant we couldn't be bothered to order more drinks.  One lady decided to walk over to the airport to get something instead.

Happy Review: convenient for the airport very quiet
Unhappy Review: pricey

Happy Review: Breakfast cold and not fresh at 7am. Poor facilities upon arrival 10pm. Rather expensive for what is no more than a premier inn type hotel.
Unhappy Review: See above

Happy Review: Excellent location on the airport site

Happy Review: .V convenient for the terminal
Unhappy Review:
V limited food choice in the restaurant.
Carpet in the room was dirty and beneath the bed was unsavoury.
No trolleys available at the hotel to transport luggage to the terminal.
No instructions for using the heating system.. it was either too hot or too cold. It was always noisy.

Review Title: Good place to stay for Bristol airport, would recomend.
Happy Review: Easy check in, with friendly staff and a nice welcome.  Parking was easy.  Communication before arrival was excellent. Cleanliness of room was excellent and comfortable bed.
Unhappy Review: An extra pillow would have been nice.  The coffee and tea tray would have benefitted from a biscuit as well.  No internet charging socket was available which would have been really useful.

Review Title: Would book again, hopefully they will sort out the breakfast issue.
Happy Review: Good location, nice rooms which were all very clean. Staff were extremely friendly and helpful.

Review Title: Excellent location.  We will certainly stay there again if we fly from Bristol
Happy Review: Rooms are well designed

Review Title: A really great way to start our visit after a flight and journey.
Happy Review: Easy transfer from arrivals to hotel, staff helpful, welcoming, nice food and drink in evening, great breakfast.Room comfortable and clean just what we needed to start our visit to UK.

Happy Review: proximity to airport.  wonderful breakfast included and served from 4 am

Review Title: Great location for early flights from Bristol airport.

Great location on site at Bristol airport - just a few minutes walk to terminal.
Rooms were better than expected - comfy beds and good shower.
Unhappy Review: No bags available for the grab and go breakfast and we didn’t have time to eat in. Quite expensive for a family for one short night.

Happy Review: Easy to get to and very convenient for the airport in the morning.

Really helpful
A few minutes walk from the terminal so ideal for an early morning flight. Staff were really friendly and helpful. Breakfast served from 4am.
Location is perfect for a short walk to the terminal and also to the long stay and multi story carparks. Great breakfasts.

Review Title: Modern hotel with lovely staff, could improve menu options
Happy Review:
The front desk staff were super friendly and went above and beyond to ensure we didn't pay any extra for parking or late checkout. Even though there was no room service available we asked the staff and they allowed us to collect the food from the restaurant and take it back to the room with us. The room was modern and clean, we weren't woken up by any noise from the airport or other guests. 
The complementary breakfast had everything you could want.
Unhappy Review: There weren't a tonne of food options for the evening meal, mostly fast food like burgers, pizza, potato wedges, and a daily dish (one meat, one vegan). Because of the location there aren't any other places to eat, so you're really stuck with just the selection there.

Happy Review: it was convenient and comfy

Review Title: Great location and comfortable room but dire dining
Happy Review: Pleasant clean and modern room, very quiet and comfortable. Breakfast is laid on from 4am, hot food from 6am and you can take away portable items if you don’t have time. Very close to airport terminal.
Unhappy Review:
The food and dining experience was on the level of a motorway services, and not the good services like Gloucester and Tebay either. You are effectively eating in the foyer, unable to get away from screens with football and the food itself is barely edible and certainly not wholesome, being largely white carb. The red lentil Dahl for £12.95 was very overpriced, devoid of flavour or spice. The felafel burger was also a very long way from the original concept. 
There is no signage to the hotel if you want to find a pedestrian/wheeled luggage route from the long stay car park to the hotel. If you are foolish enough to consider dropping off passengers and luggage before parking think again as a van patrols the airport looking for reasons to dine you £100. Happily we could park near enough in the end.

Happy Review: On-site for early morning flight
Unhappy Review: nothing to fault

Unhappy Review: A bottle of water in the room is surely a basic expectation.  Possibly my naivety, but I read the parking fee is a reduced £8 a day flat rate if you stay here, so planned to leave the car there for the 2 nights we were away, but its only £8 for the nights you stay there, then it jumps to £45, then £19 a night, so don't plan to leave your car here for your trip.

Review Title: A perfect place to stay before our early flight.
Happy Review: The Hampton by Hilton is situated within easy walking distance of the airport terminal. The staff are polite and efficient. The rooms are clean and comfortable and there’s a restaurant on site which is handy, serving breakfast from around 5am.

Hotel is walking distance from the airport terminal. Reception staff were excellent - efficient, smiling, nothing was too much trouble. They have a safe luggage room if you want to leave your bags there. Also there are airport trolleys behind the hotel which you pay for and can then you can keep the trolley and some of your bags in the reception safe luggage room. Excellent for if you have an early departure. Bar staff were very friendly. Room spacious & comfortable - no noise from the airport.

proximity to airport departures

It's a nice touch having the boards up with the flights - really helpful to know whether to walk over or wait.

They were amazing ⭐️

Review Title: I would definitely stay at this hotel again for its convenient position close to Bristol Airport.
Happy Review:
The breakfast was a great self-service set up and good early start for those having to check-in for an early flight from Bristol Airport. A shame the waffle maker wasn't up and running early, but understandable.
Having the live flight departures and arrivals information up in the restaurant area was helpful and reassuring.
Unhappy Review: Initially, I was put off by the parking price information when I first arrived, but after visiting the hotel reception I learned that customers of the hotel paid a reduced overnight price which was far more bearable. It would be better if customers didn't have to pay for parking for the duration of their stay.

Unhappy Review: No USB port stairs hadn’t been cleaned for a while ok

Happy Review: We have stayed in many hotels all over the world but the customer service here was fabulous and up there with the best. So warm and genuine. Nothing was too much trouble. The staff really seem to enjoy working at the hotel and it shows. We were only at the hotel for 1 night but were made to feel so welcome from the moment we checked in. The restaurant was great too. Decent menu, service, quality and prices. It all felt very safe despite Covid and restrictions. The room was spotless. The very short distance from the airport terminal made it super convenient and there was ample parking outside.
Unhappy Review: I honestly hate to leave any negative comment as the positives were so good but it would have been nice to have a bath in the room. I kind of expect that of a Hilton. The sofa bed's springs also dug in during the night but the soft quilt kind of helped detract from that!

Unhappy Review: Furnishings were a little tired. Some carpets appear stained/dirty. Tables slow to be cleaned.

Happy Review: everything except the evening meal and bar
Unhappy Review:
At the Hampton our room and facilities were fine but the food at our evening meal was more than disappointing. It was probably the most unappetising food we have experienced. We had the falafel veggie burger described on the Menu as being with bread and butter pickle, tzatziki and chips, which were just cooked and only warm.
The item came with ‘salad’, which was not described in the menu and which we were told was standard for a burger being lettuce, tomato, and onion. Not everyone likes onion and removing it from food after it has been sliced is equally unacceptable. It should be recognised on the menu, for customers to have a choice.
The ‘bread and butter’ description was false as it was a Brioche, which is a sweet bun and totally unsatisfactory in a savoury dish. Staff and Manager were accommodating and helpful in accepting our criticism of the food.
The bar serves only malt Scotch Whisky and Irish Whiskey which is an unacceptable and expensive choice when requiring a long whisky drink with a mixer ie ginger ale, where a Blended Scotch Whisky is the norm. These are supplied under numerous titles such as White&Mackay, Bells, Grouse, etc. etc. It feels like your captive audience is being held hostage.

Happy Review: Very helpful and friendly check in from Gloria.
Unhappy Review: Dining area and bar somewhat basic.
