Happy Review: The room was lovely, modern and very clean. Beds comfortable. Large walk in shower too which was great! Location was amazing. Airport a 5 min walk away. The front of desk was lovely as well. He made us feel very welcome.
Unhappy Review: The food. Ordered a jacket potato it was brown 🤢 my sister ordered a tuna sandwich and the bread was stale. Needs improving.

Review Title: very convenient as close to the airport but overpriced rooms
Happy Review: closeness to the airport, staff very helpful breakfast available from 4am great for early flights
Unhappy Review: food in restaurant not good value for money, was obviously microwaved pre packaged food. Room nothing special for the money charged beds very hard

Happy Review: The location is superb and the rooms are excellent
Unhappy Review: Over 200 pounds for one night

Review Title: The hotel is convenient for the terminal and that is reflected in the room rates.
Happy Review: Given that a lot of guests were taking early flights the start of service should be earlier. The continental offer was average.
Unhappy Review: My comments are influenced by one member of staff who was taking food and beverage orders. I was queuing behind a customer waiting to be served when she came to the counter ignored me and served the person behind me while I was still waiting. That was rude and doesn’t go down well with us Brits.

Happy Review: Location was the key factor
Unhappy Review: N/A

Review Title: it’s an airport hotel - efficient and soulless
Unhappy Review: I know it’s in the airport but it’s still a lot of money for a room in the Bristol area

Review Title: would stay again if using the airport
Happy Review: close to the airport
Unhappy Review: a free beer on arrival would have been nice

Review Title: good experience Would stay again before an early /late flight
Happy Review: location
efficient
Very clean comfortable and 3 minutes from the airport, would definitely recommend.

Review Title: Great start for my daughter's graduation journey. Thank you. Roberto D
Happy Review: It was a great choice for the location right in the airport, very convenient for leaving very early in the morning. My daughter had a great time.
Unhappy Review: Nothing negative.

Happy Review: Proximity of the Airport. Breakfast.
Unhappy Review: Hotel food was of poor quality.

Happy Review:
This was an overnight stay at an airport hotel. It was comfortable and close to the airport. We also got a later check out which was much appreciated.
Self service breakfast was excellent.
Unhappy Review: The food menu was limited the chilli I had lacked meat and taste.

Review Title: A comfortable stay in an ideal location for an early flight. It is a shame you cannot get better food options.
Happy Review: It is very convenient for an early flight.
Unhappy Review: Food options are limited.

Happy Review: Close to the airport - comfortable rooms.
Unhappy Review: Dinner menu sparse

Happy Review: Very nice

Review Title: Great food, lovely people, lumpy, noisy mattress.
Happy Review: Evening meal and breakfast was hot and good quality. Chelsea was great looked after us wonderfully.
Unhappy Review: It Was without doubt the worst bed I have ever slept in..the mattress was at least 50 years old.. which was strange for a new hotel. And one pillow each on the bed... really whats that about.

Review Title: convenient location but seriously consider eating elsewhere
Happy Review:
excellent location for the airport particularly when you have an early flight.
comfortable and quiet room & very clean.
Unhappy Review:
the evening menu choices are very limited.
it completely lets the hotel down. 
The menu is not in keeping with the quality of the accommodation. For some it is the beginning of a holiday & a good meal would be a great way to start.

Happy Review:
Breakfast was expected and good.  The hotel very modern. 
 The walk from airport  arrivals lounge to the hotel late at night was dimly lit.  I will be writing to the airport authorities re this.
Unhappy Review:
The walk ways need weatherproofing ie; covered against the rain.  I will be writing to the airport authorities re this!
Arrived very late due to flight delays.

Happy Review: Clean, modern, well located
Unhappy Review: Food is poor

Review Title: It exceeded expectations & the location is ideal for the airport.
Happy Review: The reception staff were friendly, approachable & helpful.
Unhappy Review: Nothing.

Happy Review:
Excellent for having Safe,iron and hair dryer
Breakfast very good
Comfortable bed
Unhappy Review:
Price of basic bottle of wine £20
Shame can't park car for the week of a holiday at a discounted price

Happy Review: convenient
Unhappy Review: all good

Review Title: IDEAL FOR AN EARLY FLIGHT AND EVEN THE 4.0 AM CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST WAS MORE THAN ADEQUATE
Happy Review: LOCATION
Unhappy Review: EVENING MENU

Review Title: We’ve stayed here a few times and enjoyed it I’d recommend it and I’ll definitely stay here again.
Happy Review: Lovely hotel nice room good service from the checking in,staff very helpful we had early flight so missed the cooked breakfast but still plenty of choices with the continental choice,it’s so convenient with airport just across the road.
Unhappy Review: nothing to say about it ,

Review Title: Very pleased with the overall experience.
Happy Review: Nice room good facilities, pleasant lounge area and restaurant.
Unhappy Review: location

Happy Review: Staff really friendly on arrival and both my 'special requests' had been catered for. An excellent breakfast (though the scrambled egg is powdered, I think). All in all a very satisfactory stay

Review Title: It is the best airport hotel I have stayed in.
Happy Review:
Within a few minutes walk from the airport, it is clean, comfortable, with very pleasant and helpful staff. A cold breakfast begins at 4am, which is very good. the hot breakfast begins at 6am. 
The room is designed to maximise the space, is clean and comfortable. It is the best airport hotel I have stayed in.
Unhappy Review: Nothing.

Happy Review: Would have liked to have seen an opportunity to have a take away arrangement as we had an early flight and left the hotel at 05.00 am.
Unhappy Review: Your dining experience needs to improve, the menu is always the same and not very exciting and of a mediocre quality.

Review Title: Great stopover to make our holiday journey easier
Happy Review: Close to airport , excellent breakfast and late 11am checkout
Unhappy Review: nothing

Happy Review: Excellent location and good breakfast.
Unhappy Review: I was charged over £40 to park my car for the night. That was a nasty surprise.

Review Title: Fab one night stay before an early flight Room was very clean Bed was was very comfortable Staff very helpful
Happy Review:
Location to the airport 
Very clean and friendly staff

Review Title: A great rest before the trip.
Happy Review: Cosmetics with a beautiful scent, a very useful safe in the room, and the beds are very comfortable, other equipment very useful. Perfect location.
Unhappy Review: The breakfast was very sparse, a small selection of cold cuts and breads and the shower water could have been a little warmer,

Review Title: Staff, room and breakfast excellent but let down by the charges pending still remain
Happy Review: Excellent Breakfast. Everything you'd want from a cooked breakfast
Unhappy Review: The amount from the previous week was showing even though it was claimed by the 15th. After the stay on the 20th November 3 amounts were still showing  pending. The charge was £112 which has been claimed but 2 pending items remain. Not good enough 3 days after the stay.

Happy Review: location
Unhappy Review: only one small pillow on bed

Happy Review: It was very close to the airport, it was very clean and comfortable.
Unhappy Review: There is not anything

Review Title: had a keycard issue on stay pre outgoing flight and even manager couldn’t sort it so ended up moving rooms.
Happy Review: location
Clean and comfortable
Unhappy Review: room cold , poor heating

Review Title: Really good place to stay when taking an early morning flight.
Happy Review: Very convenient, clean, comfortable and value for money.
Unhappy Review: My husband couldn’t sleep because of the shortage of pillows.

Happy Review: My Meal was excellent. I chose Chicken Jalfrezi and had a portion of chips & a glass of wine. It arrived quickly and was piping hot and immaculately served.  Thank you.  I am elderly and have stayed here several times as it means I can easily walk to the airport after a longish train journey, from Cornwall,  then a bus trip from Temple Meads Station and it makes my life easier.  I prefer to have a room with a bath, otherwise it was warm clean and comfortable. All the staff were lovely.
Unhappy Review: To have a room with a bath and shower head.

Happy Review: Very convenient for early morning flight, too early for breakfast but had takeaway coffee and juice

Review Title: It served its purpose for travelling back, nice decor
Happy Review: breakfast, bar service. decor
Unhappy Review: noisy all night from room above

Happy Review: Very clean and easy for the airport
Unhappy Review:
Nothing to dislike 
OK

Happy Review: It was a good value
Unhappy Review: Restaurant menu more varied

Happy Review: Great location super good for airport
Unhappy Review: Breakfast buffet was pretty average…

Review Title: Always good service at this hotel. Comfortable and super quiet considering its at the airport. Easy 2 minute walk into t
Happy Review: Comfortable, very clean and super quiet considering its at the airport. Easy 2 minute walk into the departure terminal.
Unhappy Review: a scenic view :)

Happy Review: Great location  breakfast  was good apart from no fried egg only scrambled,  just my preference.
Unhappy Review: Nothing all was good

Happy Review:
Very helpful staff.
Very close to the airport.

Review Title: Great location, but ask for shuttle bus if disabled
Happy Review: Breakfast available from 4.00am to catch early flight
Unhappy Review: Difficult for disabled person to walk to airport, although the reception arranged for the shuttle bus to pick us up, so in the end this was not a problem if you ask for this to happen.

Happy Review: Location was perfect. Breakfast was a little basic, as in cheap products.
Unhappy Review: Free parking

Happy Review: Breakfast was great. Shower was excellent too. Staying so close to airport I expected noise but it was so peaceful
Unhappy Review: Not enough pillows in room

Review Title: Overall it was ok the location was excellent as was the Continental breakfast. Incredibly quiet.
Happy Review: The staff were very welcoming and helpful at all times
Unhappy Review: The only thing I was disappointed in there were no teabags in the room and I felt it was too late 10pm to ask staff plus I was tired but I was so looking forward to a cup of tea - small things but important at the time! Also the bins had not been emptied. When showering in the morning the water was not draining away in the tray and had to turn it off!! Room 157

Happy Review: 2 minutes from the airport great for a layover

Review Title: very convenient, modern hotel, will use again
Happy Review: modern, clean, very close to the airport
Unhappy Review: nothing

Review Title: very convenient location for airport. Will return though would have liked larger choice menu in the evening.
Happy Review: very clean, well laid out and helpful staff.
Unhappy Review: Food average. Evening burger dry - breakfast, no fried eggs.

Happy Review: Everything thank you
Unhappy Review: Poor choice of menu for evening meal

Happy Review: fabulous location and great facilities!  super breakfast too which was included in the price!  the waffle maker was a big hit with my son!
Unhappy Review: the beds weren’t very comfortable unfortunately!  that’s the only thing that let it down a bit!  having said that we would still stay again!

Happy Review: Good breakfast. A good place to stay after a late arrival at the Airport.
The location for me to get to the airport timeously for an early morning flight.
Comfortable room. Staff very cheerful and helpful both late at night and very early in the morning. Breakfast at silly-o-clock when we had a 6am flight. Only 5 minutes walk from terminal.

Review Title: Exactly what you want from an airport hotel. The exorbitant parking charge is the negative
Unhappy Review: The parking charge is extortionate.

Happy Review:
location was excellent for the airport. 
very clean and comfortable. 
a decent breakfast selection,
Unhappy Review: The dinner restaurant meals were very poor, on both occasions. Staff very friendly.

Happy Review: Only stayed because of proximity to airport. It was good to have continental breakfast available from 4am and to be able to pack a breakfast and take it with you. All the staff were friendly and helpful.
Location for airport was great, food was great with a great selection for breakfast and it was clean.
Unhappy Review: Bed was hard, lumpy and uncomfortable and only one pillow each.

Review Title: good location for flying from airport next to terminal
Happy Review: good quality accommodation and excellent breakfast
Unhappy Review: nothing

Happy Review: Comfortable bed and good desk to work and plug the laptop.
Unhappy Review:
No hot breakfast before 7 am..
You could at least offer some porridge with the continental breakfast or some boiled eggs.

Review Title: Would use the facility whenever flying from Bristol Airport, even if only for a coffee or snack.
Happy Review: The proximity to the Bus Park and to the Airport. The friendlness of the staff and the superb response to our request for an additional duvet and pillow each on our arrival in the cold night on return from Tenerife, all this at about 1 am. Much appreciated.
Unhappy Review: The sudden closure of the breakfast area doors without notice. We understood breakfast was from 7 till 11 but didn't expect that!

Happy Review: the receptionist
Unhappy Review: close to the airport

Happy Review: The location

Review Title: The location was the best! Ended up getting to our flight without a lot of difficulty
Happy Review: The breakfast was nice and the location couldn’t have been better!
Unhappy Review: We traveled over 3 hours in a coach to the airport and looked forward to a meal at the hotel. Unfortunately they were out of everything we picked so we went to bed hungry

Review Title: Short but sweet stay will be back.
Happy Review:
Great hotel in a very convenient location for weary travellers using the airport. Well designed, beautifully clean with all the elements needed for a restful stay.
Staff were very friendly and helpful with a genuine will to want to give great customer service. My check in was the best I’ve ever had in a hotel.
Unhappy Review: We had to check out at 4am so was disappointed that takeaway breakfast was not available. A take away coffee would have been very welcome! If I’m unable to have time to enjoy breakfast I should be offered a reduction in rate or a takeaway.
Pillows were not comfortable.., too flat

Happy Review: easy access to Bristol airport. the staff were very friendly and helpful. very comfortable and well appointed room also very very clean. Breakfast available from 4am which for early travellers is a bonus. would definitely stay here again.
Unhappy Review: nothing to dislike

Happy Review: Clean and convenient to the airport.
Unhappy Review: Very limited menu at the moment.

Happy Review: very handy for airport
Staff were amazing when we incounted 2   problem with our room but the staff were A1
Unhappy Review: Not a lot to do in hotel more pillows should be in the bedrooms food menu  very Ltd there is nowhere else to go for food

Happy Review: Comfy room and good breakfast

needed more pillows the two pillows on the bed had less depth than a folded towel. whilst I realise I could have asked for more at midnight when your in bed it’s not ideal to get dressed and go and ask reception. the bathroom fan was humming all night and the shower did not drain properly. we had to wait 10 mins for the shower tray to empty before my husband could shower for fear of flooding the room .
ideal for a stop over before a flight.  Lovely spacious rooms and a good breakfast

Review Title: great property, room and staff, very poor breakfast
Unhappy Review: The hotel and staff were 4 star, but unfortunately the breakfast was 1 star. Such a shame as everything else was fantastic and the staff were outstanding

Happy Review: The hotel was very clean, emphasis on Covid precautions.  Staff friendly and helpful.  The breakfast was excellent, lots of choice in both drinks and food.  Superb location for the air terminal.
Unhappy Review: A hairdryer in the room and a little more space between bed and wall as there's only about a foot.

Happy Review: Good that it’s available from 04:00 for early departing flights
Very close to get to the airport
Unhappy Review: You had to walk outside in the rain to get to the airport and contend with stairs while carrying your cases

Happy Review: No noise, nice and quiet.
Unhappy Review: The floor of the shower cubicle got filled very quickly with water, and despite turning up the temperature for hot water it didn’t budge at all. Shame, as it could have been a better experience.
takeaway breakfast was awful!!

Happy Review: right next to the airport 3min walk
Perfect location if you have an early flight.
Unhappy Review: Only got one pillow each and they were very soft so it was basically like laying your head directly on the mattress.

Happy Review: location
Unhappy Review: the choice of breakfast was fantastic, everything you could want, unfortunately the hot cooked selection was cold and inedible

Review Title: Good clean hotel near ti Airport
Happy Review: Bedrooms were spacious  and comfortable clean
Unhappy Review: Food menu  was Ltd and has you are out if the way nowhere else to eat so could be a little more variety

Happy Review: clean and comfortable
Unhappy Review: lack of proper direction in bar and eating area

Happy Review: close to terminal
Unhappy Review: food choice is just not good enough, nice to have a good meal before departure, stayed here many times for early morning flight but food always an issue. Breakfast is good. full cover walkway and better signage, too many steps or 150meter ramp.
We arrived at 1.40am and were given the furthest room from the lift on the 2nd floor even though there were many available.

Happy Review: near airport and car park
The room
Unhappy Review: The food had a pizza 🍕 not good luke warm cappocina coffee 🍵 warm I sat there for 1 hour few tables were left not cleared staff were there did not clear tables not a good look

Happy Review: location
Unhappy Review: steps from terminal

Happy Review: Rude reception on check out. Shame no bottled water provided to the room, fairly standard at this standard of hotel.
Unhappy Review: Convenient to airport. Excellent reception on arrival. Comfiest bed ever! Super clean. Lovely shower. Lovely products in bathroom.

Happy Review: Great facilities and very clean. Good choice of food at the restaurant and great value for money.
Unhappy Review: We didn’t receive our 4am wake up call!!

Happy Review:
Doors are sealed after cleaning, , tv remote cleaned, then it is put in a wrapper, 
Bed, duvet and pillows comfortable,
Unhappy Review: I stayed in the hotel two years ago , the same weekend and the price was 45 pounds more expensive,  I thought the price a bit expensive. I understand about the increase in cost of cleaning and difficulty in getting staff, but since I had a 6am flight I did not really have any choice, as there are also less flights to choose from.

Happy Review:
short walk to terminal
quiet at night
Unhappy Review:
food is ok - not too exciting!
price is ok - captive audience pushes it up a bit

Happy Review: The cost
Unhappy Review: Convenience for airport and standard of accommodation

Happy Review: it was all good

Review Title: Good functional stay for very early flight
Happy Review: Location good for earlybstart
Unhappy Review: Pillows

Review Title: Delivers everything you need in an airport hotel.
Happy Review: Comfortable bed.

Review Title: Best way to start a holiday
Happy Review: Hilton know how to deliver a seamless overnight stay, one of the best airport hotels I’ve stayed in.
Early breakfast (4am) a real bonus. Luggage storage very helpful. Proximity to airport terminal. Bus service into city centre.
Unhappy Review: No fridge. No extra pillow.

Happy Review: convenient for airport and great standard of accommodation
Close to terminal
Unhappy Review: Nothing to dislike

Review Title: comfortable room which was extremely clean and well presented
Happy Review: room was excellent breakfast was good

Review Title: stayed overnight for flight excellent value
Happy Review: close to airport
Unhappy Review: we had a disabled room where bathroom flooded using shower but for disabled was brilliant

Happy Review: Proximity to airport departures.
Unhappy Review: Little parking on site.

Review Title: A most convenient hotel for a short stop-over.
Happy Review: Good choice of breakfast and bar meals and comfortable, clean  room. So easy to get to/from airport.
Unhappy Review: I arrived early evening, in pouring rain to find the room chilly. I would have appreciated walking into a warm bedroom.

Happy Review:
Room was good, Very near the AIRPORT which was good for me as I am disabled.
Breakfast was late on the hotplate.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast was late to the hotplate.

Happy Review: close to airport usual Hilton standard lively rooms
Unhappy Review: limited bar menu lots of things off menu. Poor staff were run off their feet. 1 new staff member for a busy hotel bar. poor man

Happy Review: clean, tidy, quiet and great location for terminal.

Review Title: It served my purpose nicely for a great nights sleep, and a hearty breakfast after a long travel.
Happy Review: Room clean and comfy, very nice gym also. Breakfast very good.
Unhappy Review: Tables needed cleaning in restaraunt area and plates not cleared away - small issue but important.

Review Title: Perfect overnight stay for early morning flight!
Happy Review:
Proximity to airport,clean and comfortable with helpful but not overbearing staff
Early (4 am )continental tasty breakfast included which was appreciated!
Evening meal was also tasty….we had curry and nachos…great start to our holiday!
Unhappy Review: Quite expensive
Bedroom comfort not great and very noisy

Review Title: Comfortable stay after a late flight arrival.
Happy Review: Location at Bristol Airport is great. Rooms are comfortable, easy check in and an all night bar. Good breakfast. Excellent, friendly and helpful staff.
Unhappy Review: Maybe just a tad pricey.
Menu is very basic and our meals was advertised with potatoes wedges but arrived with chips no explanation given.

Review Title: We like the functionality of design and service: it's just right for a before and after flight stay.
Happy Review:
Check in easy and that's what was needed at 2300 after along tiring day.  Male member of staff friendly and sensitive to our exhaustion!
Room clean and bed comfortable.  Shower and towels excellent. Breakfast varied and welcome.
Unhappy Review: Two pillows rather than one.  Too late at night for us to feel like requesting this though on our next stay we shall do this in advance.

Review Title: Perfect place to crash after a late landing flight
Happy Review: Great location. Very good breakfast choice
Unhappy Review: Room was bit small & hot
my food for the evening was heated up in a microwave half was cold and half was warm they changed and warmed it up but this kinda stuff should not happen.

Happy Review: Friendly staff, a good breakfast and comfortable beds.
Unhappy Review: Small rooms

Happy Review:
Excellent facilities just a short walk from the Airport and the bus station. Everything was very well equipped, superbly comfortably and super Covid clean.
I felt very safe there as a senior solo female.
Unhappy Review: A bit pricey, but almost totally worth it for the convenience.

Review Title: Excellent position for an early flight
Happy Review: The location alone is worth the price. This trip the breakfast exceed my expectations, you don't expect cooked at 4 in the morning and the choice of meat cheese and fruit was an improvement on my last trip. All the staff in interacted with were 100% except the guy at check out, he was 110% when I'd forgotten my jacket in the room, he looked after my bags without fuss, well done
Unhappy Review: I didn't like having to order food from the bar, last time my order was taken at the table (because of COVID-19) it was not busy and could have been accommodated. This meant I had to carry my belongings rather than leave them on the table. The bathroom is excellent but unfortunately this time there was a bad sludge arould the seal of the shower tray, had I stayed more than one night I would  have expected a change of room, given the price paid

Happy Review: Speed of check-in & out; practical Covid responses; good room layout
Unhappy Review: Nothing - all was excellent

Happy Review: Great staff. Preferable to driving from home for a 6am flight.
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Good for 4.30am.
Proximity to the airport. Rooms were cleaned to a high standard. All the staff were polite & friendly
Unhappy Review: Only the price, the same as any hotel so close to an airport

Happy Review: gym and food
Unhappy Review: bathroom door and no swimming pool

Happy Review: OK but too early for fried breakfast as left by 5am which was a shame
Unhappy Review: Fried breakfast

Happy Review: Convenience to departure, helpful but overrun staff,
The bed was so comfortable we extended our check out time!
Unhappy Review: We arrived late at night after a very long flight so tried to order a pizza which was advertised as a 24 hour product. We were told We had to go down to reception to order, and there were only cold sandwiches available.  Not a massive deal but not as advertised either.

Happy Review: Varied options. Good coffee. Practical self service.

Review Title: It was convenient, handy - an overall OK stay but couple of minor issues meant it wasn't excellent
Happy Review: Walking distance from the terminal. Late night check-in was easy. Receptionist was very friendly and welcoming. We could get a drink in the bar even though it was late.
Unhappy Review: Bathroom had a strange smell on first entering. May have been from lack of use or cleaning products. It was gone by morning. Breakfast was a little disappointing - though there was a good variety, what I had lacked in flavour. For the price of the room I expected an excellent breakfast.

Happy Review: Spacious room, very clean, very close to the airport, food & drinks available, comfy bed
Unhappy Review: I wish there’s a bath tub available in the room. The room cost is quite high, I think it should have been less than 90 quid, maybe at least 75 quids.

Happy Review: Clean room, easy check in
Unhappy Review: Queueing for a drink in the evening! Had 2 drinks had total time 40 mins waiting.

Happy Review: Location for early flight
Unhappy Review: Too few staff leading to queues for check in and the bar. Very nice staff despite the pressure

Happy Review: Locality to airport,
Unhappy Review: Lots of steps and ramps to get to departures

Happy Review: Location. Complimentary breakfast from 4:00am. Great staff.
Super easy check in by helpful staff, again when we checked out. Lovely clean room. Nice breakfast
Unhappy Review: External signage and lighting. Could be better signposted, but if they had all the lights on it would have been easier to spot

Happy Review:
Reception staff very helpful. Best thing is parking your car and then knowing you just have to walk 2 mins in morning to airport. 
Food menu pretty basic but food good.

Review Title: Good, but could have been better.
Unhappy Review: Reception could not find our original booking!!,and told us that we were lucky to get a room as the hotel was full. This was pretty stressful at the time. Also, despite notifying the hotel of our earlier than check in arrival time, we could not use the gym

Happy Review: Breakfast was cold (cooked breakfast).
Unhappy Review: Warmer cooked breakfast.

Review Title: Perfect location. Will use again for an early flight
Happy Review: We book because of the location. Flight too early for breakfast
Unhappy Review: Expensive
Bed uncomfortable

Happy Review: The position is key here, given the lack of competition so close to the airport. The hotel is not yet old, and there is a certain brand standard that is nice to be able to rely on. Fabulous beds, nice shower and always good to have a powerful hairdryer available. The dinner was super-decent and not expensive, the WiFi signal strong and reliable for my needs, even for live streaming. Staff were generally very nice and helpful. There was something to eat even at 4am, which was helpful.
Unhappy Review: A bit of maintenance is already needed; in my room none of the power outlets by the bed worked; I was lucky that the cables I had with me were long enough to use the ones by the desk. Rather disappointingly none of my calls to the front desk were answered.

Happy Review: Works well as an airport hotel for pre-flight.  It's also great that the breakfast is available very early in the morning
Unhappy Review: The food offer is basic & could be improved

Review Title: Very convenient for catching flights from the airport
Happy Review: We didn't have time for breakfast due to early morning flight although we were able to take some muffins and pastries with us to the airport as some food available at 4.00am
Unhappy Review: There wasn't  anything we didn't like, although next time we come it would be good if there was more evening meal selections

Review Title: Smart well appointed Hotel ideal if you are using Bristol Airport
Happy Review:
Position near to Airport buildings
Early breakfast
Excellent Guest Room
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Convenient for airport - a good choice if travelling early morning.
Happy Review: The location - near the airport and car parks. Clean and tidy, though quite basic, room. Everything worked fine. The staff were very helpful. It will be our hotel of choice when using Bristol airport.
Unhappy Review: Shame a covered walkway couldn't have been designed in to reach the terminal. Expected a bit more in the way of food - limited choice. Expected more for the price paid. Had the feel of a budget hotel.

Happy Review: Location brilliant breakfast selection good
Unhappy Review: Price was cheaper after I.had booked

Happy Review: Very clean and comfortable
Unhappy Review: Close to airport

Review Title: Very convenient after a late flight
Happy Review: Very convenient for Bristol airport
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: NICE AND QUIET WOULD STAY AGAIN SHOULD THE OCCASSION ARRIVE, BUT MAYBE A LITTLE PRICEY AT £157.
Happy Review: EVENING MEAL OF A CURRY WAS VERY NICE, BREAKFAST WAS FANTASTIC ABSOLUTLY NO COMPLAINTS ABOUT THAT AND 100 YARDS FROM THE AIRPORT.
Unhappy Review:
METAL BED FRAME WAS A BIT NOISY.
TV DID ON OCCASION FREEZE

Happy Review: For Airport best location
Location is perfect for the airport terminal....accommodation is modern,functional,clean and well staffed
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Good start and end to our flights
Happy Review: Good price on the simple meals available
Unhappy Review: Price of a glass of wine well over the top

Review Title: A typical airport hotel where you are there of one night only. Most things were to my satisfaction.
Happy Review: Everything was as it should be, the room clean and tidy. The Receptionists were very helpful with instructing me to collect a trolley, and then they stored it, for me, in the Luggage Room, to assist with my baggage and early morning 4am start.  There is a ramp up to the airport that made pushing a laden trolley much easier.
Unhappy Review:
I thought the menu was very poor,  giving an extremely limited choice. If you liked any type of burger you were catered for! I plumped for Cream of Tomato Soup - out of a tin - and a baked potato with a chilli con carne filling. (they wouldn't need a chef to rustle that up) I was expecting Dinner! - Nope!
Also, there was a horrible B.O. odour in the room, on arrival.

Happy Review: Good chouse
Unhappy Review: It was quite cold by the time I got back to my table

Happy Review: Beautifully clean, comfortable beds and friendly staff
Unhappy Review: Had to jump to get onto the toilet

Happy Review: Room was excellent, staff very friendly
Unhappy Review: Didn’t have breakfast as flight was really early. Dinner was disappointing but this could have been due to the current situation.

Happy Review: Restaurant open until 22.00, good food.
Room spacious, comfortable, clean, modern and quiet.  Breakfast-time was relaxed with plentiful choice.  Staff friendly and helpful.  Parking readily available in hotel car park.
Unhappy Review: My partner found the pillow too thin and unsupportive, and there weren't any more in the room.  I would have liked to have seen a few more interesting items on the menu.

Review Title: A perfectly good place to stay.
Happy Review: Perfectly placed for the airport. Crisp clean bedroom. Light breakfast available for an early get away
Unhappy Review: I understand why the checking in & out process is virtually contact less but I miss the human touch.

Happy Review: all service was good
Unhappy Review: nothing

Happy Review: The location of the hotel is perfect if you arrive late at the airport (or if you have an early flight). The rooms are very comfortable and clean.
Unhappy Review: The breakfast is very much ‘off the production line’, with the fruit out of tins. It is okay but nowhere near the best we have had at a hotel.

Happy Review: Amazing location if you have an early flight. Super clean and comfortable.

Review Title: Very enjoyable stay after a holiday.
Happy Review: As a vegetarian good choice cooked breakfast, good selection to eat and drink.
Unhappy Review: Only thing was no extra pillows in room got in bed and pillows bit flat.

Review Title: Highly recommended for early departures and late arrivals
Happy Review: Always reliable hotel, great for late arrivals or early departures.  The rooms are beautifully appointed and quiet, soundproofing must be good. The staff are friendly and helpful. My wife had to make a trip into Bristol in the morning (losing our spot in the long stay which doesn’t allow reentry) but the hotel were happy for her to park in the hotel car park when she got back, which was very much appreciated.
Unhappy Review:
There was a technical problem between the booking.com and Hilton systems which meant that we were initially overcharged for our room, but the front desk were very helpful in sorting it out and fully refunding the difference.
It would be great to have some kind of rapid checkin for late flight arrivals as everyone arrives at once and is so tired.
Breakfast cold at 7am very poor

Happy Review: Comfy room, lovely breakfast, cleanliness and a great proximity to the Terminal in the airport.
Unhappy Review:
For some reason we only had one pillow each.
Reception did not answer the phone on many occasions for me to request two more.
Had to trudge down to Reception as they did not answer and ask for pillows.  Reception was manned by two people who were ignoring the telephone.  That was not good.

Happy Review: The selection and choice at breakfast was exceptional, something for everyone, The room was very clean, spacious, and comfortable, The staff on hand were very friendly and welcoming
Unhappy Review: access to the hotel from the airport terminal isnt great with heavy suitcases due to the amount of stairs, and the acccess ramps taking you so far away

Happy Review: All the rest was OK
Unhappy Review: Found it very difficult to get from hotel to airport as had to carry case up steps very hard for my age 78yrs on my own. Plus my daughter took me and it was £5 just to drop me off.

Happy Review: Clean quiet great location
Unhappy Review: Early morning breakfast very basic - could have better choice pastries fruit etc

Review Title: Excellent location and helpful staff, really clean rooms
Happy Review: Perfect 👍

Review Title: Fabulous for a quick stay at the airport
Happy Review: Good standard clean and comfortable rooms
Unhappy Review: Very limited menu, if you're staying more than one night it is difficult to find something different to eat on the second night

Happy Review: location and large room
Unhappy Review:
Way too expensive
No breakfast has left at 03:45 and nothing offered instead (paid B&B rate)
Had to pay for parking on the night of our stay
System to order dinner was ridiculous 
Small evening meal menu

Review Title: Ideal place to stay right at the airport.
Happy Review: Fantastic location to airport. Decent food. Very clean room. Perfect for an overnight.
Unhappy Review: I'd have liked to be able to get room service.

Happy Review: Friendly and professional Staff
Unhappy Review: Poor basic Breakfast

Review Title: Clean and easy for the family
Happy Review: Free Internet use and printing facilities, which we used for our Spanish locator forms last minute which was a god send
Unhappy Review: Rooms quite small

Happy Review: Friendly staff, very clean, food of good quality considering the ties with COVID.

Review Title: Good airport access. very comfortable stay.
Happy Review: Very near airport for access. Complimentary breakfast at 5am.
Unhappy Review: Everything very good standard.

Happy Review: Location and staff
Unhappy Review: The eating area wasn’t sanitized with food on the floor, it was difficult to find a clean table at breakfast it was understaffed

Happy Review: Our flight check in was 430 and breakfast,  meant to be available from.4pm was not
Convenient
Unhappy Review: Shower flooded

Review Title: Great value for money and convenient
Happy Review: Just what we wanted....what else can I say
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: The down side was the Luke warm cooked breakfast.
Unhappy Review: The Luke warm breakfast

Happy Review: Great welcome and attention
Unhappy Review: Room was a little cramped ! Less furniture would give more room around the bed.

Happy Review: Closeness to airport
Unhappy Review:
Pillows
Poor choice of menu in restaurant

Review Title: The stay was fine and suited our purposes very well.
Happy Review: Breakfast was and lunch. Staff were very helpful especially the day time reception staff, couldn't have asked for anything more.

Review Title: Flying out early meant we needed to find something the night before and this was perfect.
Happy Review: Everything was good. I had tried to use my Hilton Points but couldn’t get anything sorted.
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Very clean and comfortable.  Great parking with shuffle buses running throughout night.   Very slick service
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Convenient in the airport. Great room and really good breakfast.

The bed was very comfy.
Room very modern.
Tv in the bar area good idea.
Food lovley
Comfortable room, easy access to the airport tetminal
Unhappy Review:
The restaurant - limited memu and food badly cooked.
Having to pay car parking for dropping off less than 5 minutes.

Happy Review: The location was perfect and the hotel was very clean and the staff were lovely.
Unhappy Review: Food on offer done on a canteen basis which I didn’t like. Limited menu.

Happy Review: The hotel was extremely well located for Bristol Airport. Very clean and modern but perhaps lacking a little soul but I think that might be due to the covid restrictions. The staff were helpful and charming but there was not many of them….overall a pleasant experience and I would recommend it to anyone travelling….it was not cheap but it was very clean and everything worked more or less
Unhappy Review: Soulless atmosphere, air conditioning broke down during the night setting off a hideous alarm

Happy Review: 2 minutes walk from terminal. Lovely clean room with good use of space. Absolutely silent, no noise factor at all. I slept very well. I also thought the staff were good and the breakfast was generous- you can eat the buffet breakfast and take coffee and food away in a paper bag for later. The hotel was fairly quiet which is good as I hate having breakfast in busy dining rooms.
Unhappy Review: I think the price is a little expensive compared to similar standard hotels but it is the only real airport hotel in Bristol.

Happy Review:
As Airport hotels go this is 1 of the best  Excellent breakfast with great choices and meal of the day 
super value
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: magic bang on
Unhappy Review: bar not enough staff

Review Title: Very convenient location having flown in late at night.
Happy Review: Room was fine and quiet.
Unhappy Review: Some of the tables in the dining room were very sticky and unpleasant and some of cutlery and plates were not very clean.

Review Title: Close to airport and made everything easy
Happy Review: Everything
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Lilla the reception manager was very helpful and attentive.
Near the airport

Exceptionally convenient for early morning flights and allowed us to arrive at our destination to feel fresh.
I expected to hear lots of noise but we slept perfectly.
Unhappy Review: Over priced!

Happy Review:
Excellent position with short walk to terminal. Room was clean, comfortable and great shower! 
Staff were very helpful and seamless process to book in and out. 
Evening meal/Burger was excellent.
Unhappy Review:
No outside area to enjoy a drink with tables and chairs just a smoking bench to front and rear. 
Breakfast was barely warm, no choice of eggs, only scrambled.

Happy Review: Sofa bed rock hard. You can hurt yourself on all the exposed metal.
The facilities were amazing for travellers who need a overnight stop off between flights.
Unhappy Review: There is nothing we didn’t like about the property.

Happy Review: Close to airport very convenient and good quality hotel
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Perfect for a one night stop over!
Happy Review: Breakfast was just average! Location perfect after a late flight!
Unhappy Review: More fresh fruit and berries for breakfast and scrambled egg that was yellow in colour not cream! and wasn’t sitting on a hot plate for hours!!! Fresh baked bread would have been nice!

Happy Review: Location, close to airport
Unhappy Review: A little bit far out of town

Happy Review:
We ate at 4am so Limited continental...not great to.be honest
No fresh fruit apart from dome sad looking satsumas and bananas 
No peanut butter..cream cheese.. bagels
Unhappy Review:
Only.one pillow  on bed
No.one answered  phone
Had to.go.to reception
The breakfast could be improved

Review Title: Fine for the night and great for airport
Happy Review: Just had continental take away which was fine. Room was said to be queen but bed a king? More towel rails needed!
Unhappy Review: Bathroom needed more towels rails and two pillows would have been good.

Happy Review: Always spotless and easy to use
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review:
Room and bed and cleanliness 
Pre early flight stay
Unhappy Review: No room service

Happy Review: excleent rooms check n covid precautions
Unhappy Review: Poor choice of cereals and fruit at breakfast rest of breakfast very good not as good as a premier inn  breakfast though

Review Title: Becoming our regular pre flight accommodation.
Happy Review: Close to the airport
Unhappy Review: Food a bit pricey , but expected for an airport hotel.

Happy Review: Very convenient for the airport.
Unhappy Review: I ticked the box for a quiet room on the top floor, but was told that only two floors were in use. I would swear that there was someone in the room above me and it was not particularly quiet.

Review Title: Very pleasant stay but disappointed about lack of breakfast.
Happy Review: The location was perfect and so was the room, very comfortable bed.
Unhappy Review: We didn't manage to have breakfast as it was not available early enough.  Most disappointing.  We were on a 6am flight, but so must a lot of other guests be as there are a lot of flights at that time, so it would be great to be able to get breakfast earlier.

Happy Review: Near departures and parking
Unhappy Review: Had to wait for room…. At £200 + I expected something amazing !

Happy Review: Breakfast was excellent standard and choice. Room was of a high standard and bed was exceptionally comfortable. Staff very friendly, professional and very helpful.
Unhappy Review: The time it took for reception to answer the phone. We had to chase our evening meal order ordered. We waited 40 minutes for a call to say it was ready for collection. Our order had been forgotten so we had to wait for it to be prepared. Staff were very apologetic. Food was good, worth waiting for!

Happy Review: Exactly what you need when your flight is at 6am. Right next to airport, early breakfast, comfy beds.
Unhappy Review: Restaurant could be a bit more varied and better quality.

Review Title: We arrived at 10pm so only lukewarm water for our shower
Happy Review: Breakfast included; close to airport bus A1
Clean .. spacious .. clean rooms .. comfortable beds ..

It was a perfect start to our trip and made for an easy departure
for our early flight the next day.
Room
Unhappy Review:
Portion at supper a
rather small.

Happy Review: The accommodation was good
Unhappy Review: The evening meal and breakfast were terrible

Review Title: I was happy with the facilities, very close to the airport.
Happy Review: We did not have time to enjoy breakfast but picked up some porridge on the way to the flight.
Staff very friendly and extremely helpful
Unhappy Review: Evening food was very limited in choice and in my opinion not the best quality. Not what you'd expect for this type of hotel

Happy Review: N/A
Unhappy Review: Typical Hilton, no soul

Happy Review: Very friendly staff, a really easy and quick check-in and check-out. Great breakfast!
Unhappy Review: It would be nice to have 2 pillows per bed as a standard.

Happy Review: The hotel was clean and modern, got a gym on sight and a bar also. And the rooms was clean and welcoming.
Unhappy Review: The hotel is really nice, could recommend people to stay. The TV wasn't picking up any channels in my room  when staying. It was a fair amount of money for my stay for 2 nights plus the £8 per night parking. Ideal for flying out, but when staying in the area, it was a lot of money. Also the selection menu for dinner was limited, not a lot to choose either.

Review Title: Excellent location, clean room, and overall good value for money.
Happy Review: Hotel was very convenient for the airport, room was very clean, breakfast was extensive with plenty of choice.
Unhappy Review: Room decor was a little sterile; would have been nice to have a couple of additional pillows.

Review Title: Brilliant extra helpful staff went over and above
Happy Review: Staff, location
Unhappy Review: Just wish we’d known the kingdom stay carpark was so near and we could have just parked there and give straight to departures in the morning

Review Title: Can't wait to return to  this  hotel.
Happy Review: Location is  good. Staff are welcoming  and very friendly.  Rooms are nice, clean and comfortable.  I have stayed  here before and look forward to  returning.
Unhappy Review: Absolutely  nothing.

Happy Review:
Used a few times before so location great along with facilities 
Spacious clean room 
Great after red eye flight
Unhappy Review:
Breakfast is average with varied food temperature from buffet and powdered scrambled egg
Extortionate price due to pandemic supply and demand

Happy Review: Great location as only a few minutes walk to the airport.  The staff are very friendly, especially the check in staff.  The breakfast started very early, which worked well for us with an early flight.  Great selection too!
Unhappy Review: I thought the hotel was quite expensive and the dinner menu was very limited, especially for vegetarians.

Review Title: Excellent location but no connecting room
Happy Review: The location next to Bristol airport (but not physically linked to it) is brilliant in particular for the weary traveler on an early morning flight. Very clean, new, functional rooms.
Unhappy Review: On check-in requested two connecting rooms and was offered two rooms in the same corridor - only to find that one was a connecting room with nobody yet checked-in on the other side (the covid seal on the other door was intact). Despite this well worth it.

Happy Review: I loved this hotel, the staff were lovely and the hotel itself was lovely and clean and comfy .
Unhappy Review: The only thing I can fault with this hotel was the shower. I looked forward to the shower as again was lovely and clean. However, as soon as I stepped In the floor was so slippery I went straight on my back and bruised my arm and my back badly. For me the floor is way too slippery and I nearly fell over in it again.

Happy Review:
We always stay here when we have an early flight the next day. We have a couple of drinks in the bar before going to bed, which is nice,
We always sleep well and it saves us getting up in the middle of the night if we were to travel to the airport on the same day.
Unhappy Review: Bar staff could have been a bit more efficient, but its a minor gripe.

Happy Review: Clean comfortable and quiet room. Very convenient for my purpose
Unhappy Review: Although breakfast included it was of v low quality

Happy Review: Staff were helpful and accommodation met expectations and was clean. No issues so perfect.
Unhappy Review: Clean and tidy with helpful staff

Happy Review:
Room was clean. Bedding quality was high. Interior design in Hampton was excellent. Gym was very useful. Although I didn't use laptop safe, I think it is useful. 
Communal area was very clean and nicely colour coordinated.
Unhappy Review:
Shower tiles were very small. They are very nice in design wise when they are new. But as it gets older, grouting gets dirty easy. 
I wish we have fridge in room.

Happy Review: Cleanliness, smiley staff
Unhappy Review: Evening cafe food was atrocious! Overpriced!

Happy Review: Quick check in, parking tickets dealt with quickly.
Unhappy Review: Never enough milk for me in the room, bar menu minimal and not great food.

Review Title: Welcome rest stop minutes walk from the airport
Happy Review: This was a quick convenience after a late night flight. Check in was fast and while the room was nothing special it was clean, comfortable and a welcome rest. We were in an accessible room which for those requiring supportive bathroom furniture, I would recommend these rooms as these are really well equipped.

Breakfast- fantastic!
Early check in- thank you!
Helpful staff
Unhappy Review: Bed was a bit hard for sleeping! Sorry, comfortable but a very firm mattress which my back didn’t like!

Happy Review:
Clean and comfortable 
Close to terminal 
Reception very friendly and efficient
Unhappy Review:
Pizza not as good as previously
Bar staff not so friendly

Review Title: Excellent but marred by the above.
Happy Review: We were able to pick up a grab breakfast for a 7 a.m. flight.  The room was good and we were comfortable.  The food we had for dinner wasn’t brilliant.
Unhappy Review: We got a fine for going into the car park at the airport the wrong way.  We are pensioners and I had asked if we could park at the hotel if we paid in advance as we have disabilities.  We got a fine for stopping at a line and it’s not fair.

Happy Review: Buffet breakfast was available from 4am - fantastic for those of us with crack of dawn flights.  Doggy bags available for those with no time to sit down. Restaurant open for dinner until 10pm - simple food but good.
Unhappy Review: Everything was great

Happy Review: Nice clean hotel in good location for airport.
Unhappy Review: Room incredibly dark during the night. A very dim light would of been good in the bathroom.

Happy Review: Location was spot on and staff very nice and food at hotel was excellent
Unhappy Review: Lack of pillows and room very small for £155 per night
Proximity to airport

Happy Review: Cleanliness
Unhappy Review: No comment

Happy Review: No breakfast early flight
Unhappy Review: nothing

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Very clean, excellent and very accommodating staff, comfortable and convenient for the airport.  Highly recommend.
Unhappy Review: No rooms have baths which makes it slightly inconvenient with little ones - not a dealbreaker though!

Happy Review: LOCATION
Unhappy Review: HAD TO BE IN THE AIRPORT AT 4.00AM BUT NO BREAKFAST PROVIDED

Review Title: Next to Airport, perfect for visiting Bristol and surroundings.
Happy Review: Next to the airport, perfect for traveling around the area, excellent service. Rooms are very comfortable and breakfast is nice and abundant.
Unhappy Review: Nothing to complain about but Be aware is 8 pounds extra per day for parking. Everything else was superb. If arriving late maybe worth not hiring a car the same day as the hotel is located meters away from the airport main entrance.

Happy Review: Clean, close to Airport, good food …
Unhappy Review: Nothing to dislike

Happy Review: Me airport comfy and clean
Extra lie in before flight time.
Beds very comfortable. Quiet and clean hotel. Lively staff.
Unhappy Review: Limited menu and mainly pub like food.

Happy Review: Always stay here before an early flight if it’s available. Can’t beat the location and helpful staff. The rooms are ideal and comfortable. The holiday starts upon checking in.
Unhappy Review: Food variety and quality has deteriorated since my last visit.

Happy Review: Nice comfortable rooms, close to the airport
Unhappy Review: It's difficult to rate due to operating during covid. So overall it was the best experience that could be offered under the circumstances. Well done to all !

Review Title: Great place to stay for an early flight.
Happy Review: Location is great, very helpful staff and very clean and confortable.
Unhappy Review: The reataurant menu is very small and the choice not brilliant. Needs to improve. The price is high considering hotels are supposed to be desperate for customers........This is Bristol not Heathrow!

Happy Review: Hotel staff where very friendly and helpful, had an early flight so missed the breakfast. Location to the airport, perfect.
Very clean and safe from Covid
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Room was clean and comfortable,  easy for airport and long stay parking
Unhappy Review: The eating area was not cleaned to the standard I would expect of a Holton hotel

Happy Review:
Location excellent for airport. 
Extremely Clean, plenty of hand gel and antibacterial wipes available. 
The rooms, beds, towels and bathrooms were really good standard. 
Lovely reception and restaurant staff. 
The breakfast selection was very good.
Unhappy Review:
The bar food wasn’t particularly good. 
Both burger and chips were bone dry and the chips cold. I think the burgers were microwaved to oblivion. 
Breakfast scrambled eggs were of the egg powder type, which always taste like water, not like eggs.

Happy Review: everything
Unhappy Review: nothing

Happy Review: Bed very comfortable
Unhappy Review: Last time I stayed at the hotel the evening meal was basic but good.  Last night had the chicken burger … not recommended.  Just because there is a pandemic please don’t dumb down the food.

Review Title: Convenient base for people needing to use the airport.
Happy Review: Large comfortable rooms
Quick and Easy booking in

Review Title: A good modern hotel in a very useful location.
Happy Review: Excellent location. Good facilities. Well provided and comfortable bedroom.
Unhappy Review: The breakfast is OK but a bit 'standard' in comparison with others in the same price range. However, satisfactory within the price. Most of the beer pumps were off.

Happy Review:
We stayed here the night before our flight and it was perfect walking distance to the terminal. 
We had dinner in the restaurant, very small menu but could be that they were short staffed or Covid related. 
Room was clean however the bin hadn’t been emptied from the last people staying there.
Unhappy Review: Small menu choices and dirty bins.

Happy Review: Breakfast options good - takeaway
Unhappy Review: Felt it was expensive for what I’d a simple one night stay with a very early start

Happy Review:
Clean and room was nice. 
Easy parking
Food was nice
Unhappy Review: Staff shortage, therefore waited nearly 30 minutes once seated for a drink. Staff did apologise.

Happy Review: The location.next to Bristol Airport.
Unhappy Review: The bed.there was dip in the mattress.not good quality.

Review Title: Enjoyed my stay and would use again
Unhappy Review: 2 pillows but not a complaint

Happy Review: Breakfast and cleanliness
Unhappy Review: More choice on menu for evening mesl

Review Title: As I stayed here before it meets my expectations
Happy Review: My early flights to Gibraltar means I can never enjoy breakfast.
Unhappy Review: The bathroom was a disability bathroom with a wet room which had a level that allowed water to leak onto the carpet at the entrance.

Happy Review: Comfy and clean rooms - great for an early flight. Very helpful staff.
Unhappy Review: Limited options in the restaurant.

Review Title: Excellent accommodation in a terrifically convenient place.
Happy Review: Excellent hotel, well appointed, extremely clean.  We had very good service from staff serving the food and from Reception staff.  Well done to all.
Unhappy Review: The menu was extremely limited and didn't allow any real choice.    The food that was served was shockingly bad - the coating on the squid was mushy and uncooked; the macaroni cheese was full of flour that hadn't been cooked out, was pale, completely lacking in cheese and, to boot, cold.   The 'special' was cannelloni and that was more of the same.    The hotel was very let down by the food but that can't detract from the main function of the hotel which was the provision of excellent accommodation and comfort.

Happy Review: The staff are very helpful
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review:
Close to the airport. 4 am breakfast provided for early flight. Helpful staff. 
Quiet. Comfortable bed.
Unhappy Review: Fairly ordinary food and drinks

Happy Review: close to airport.  easy for early morning flight.  Good idea to have breakfast bags available to eat at the airport
Newish airport hotel. All facilities you would expect. Very clean. Breakfast totally ok.
Unhappy Review: We had a family room. The sleeping couch is very uncomfortable.

Happy Review: Very clean
Unhappy Review: Food availability limited.

Happy Review: I found the whole hotel to be welcoming and comfortable.
Room and so close to airport
Unhappy Review: Wanted a cooked breakfast but unfortunately our flight was before 7.00pm which is when a cooked breakfast would be served.

Happy Review: It was clean and comfortable. Just perfect
Unhappy Review: It was perfect 😂

Happy Review: Clean and comfy.

Review Title: Good site and ideal for airport stay.
Happy Review: Easy to find and very close to main terminal. Plenty of parking so able to unload cases easily and parking was free to resident. Staff very helpful and facilities clean and good service. Quiet with few guests due to pandemic.
Unhappy Review: Limited evening meal menu, probably due to pandemic.Choice from about half a dozen items for main course and all fairly basic.

Happy Review: Handy for airport
Unhappy Review: Breakfast was poor

Happy Review:
Staff very helpful 
Reasonable breakfast choice for early departure
Unhappy Review: Limited food menu but understand this at present times

Happy Review: Great breakfast
Proximity to the airport always a bonus especially with an early flight. Staff always friendly and helpful
Unhappy Review: The pillows provided - just 2 of them, were uncomfortable and we would have appreciated additional ones being available

Review Title: Table service but not enough staff.
Happy Review:
Room was very comfortable and food (when it arrived) was good.
Staff were very friendly and helpful.
Lasagne was tasty, and plenty of it. Pizza was well cooked.
Unhappy Review:
Service in the bar/dining area was very slow. Took over an hour to have two beers, two meals and two shorts. Staff were not very attentive. Tables weren’t cleared and drinks orders were taken and then took 15 minutes to arrive. They were absolutely lovely and friendly, but just not very quick. Three staff in the dining/reception area to check people in and look after ten people in the bar. I can do that on my own. 
Place is very over priced (£120+ for two people  for bed and “breakfast”, which consisted of a bagged croissant, fruit, coffee, juice and fruit juice - but they have a captive market, have to recoup money from being shit down, and can ultimately charge what they want due to the location. I don’t mind paying the money for the convenience, but they need to make it worth me spending the money. For that money I would expect a decent breakfast to be available before 0600 for a start.

Happy Review: Great location, very clean.
Unhappy Review:
They need more vegetarian and vegan options on the menu.
No cereals for breakfast.

Review Title: I will return again due the next business trip
Happy Review: Great bedroom . V comfortable
Unhappy Review: The wake up call didn’t happen. Needed for early flight

Review Title: A good night's sleep before a decent cooked breakfast and short walk to the airport
Happy Review: Friendly, helpful staff. Perfect location
The exceptional service.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast was mediocre

Happy Review: Very convenient to airport ie walking distance
Room facilities very good. Bed very comfy. Great location
Unhappy Review: Continental breakfast was terrible. Not a good selection. Items not fresh .So disappointed

Happy Review: Most things but room could do with USB points and a fridge.
Staff was really nice. Conveniently located at airport
Unhappy Review: Bed was so hard ,Breakfast took so long to get

Happy Review: Rooms good nice shower and great staff.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast was disgusting, 2 stale pastries and a small orange, threw it all in bin.

Happy Review: Close to airport
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Very quiet and everything we needed
Unhappy Review: Extra pillow would of been nice

Happy Review:
Handy for airport.  Staff helpful
Good sized room.
Unhappy Review: Not very good selection of evening meal and early breakfast croissant and pastry’s did not taste at all fresh bearing in mind room was with breakfast

Happy Review: Breakfast was amazing and the staff was super
Unhappy Review: Lack of staff and parking charges.

Review Title: Short, utilitarian but nice stay. Limited dinner menu unappetising so ate locally
Happy Review: Excellent and cleanly cooked breakfast ; Lauren was lovely and made our son waffles with chocolate sauce when she overheard him mention it.
Unhappy Review: The car park fee was an unpleasant surprise and should have been clear; it will always cause problems even discounted.

Happy Review: Clean and great rooms
Unhappy Review:
Not enough staff
Breakfast was a nightmare

Happy Review: Manager was really good and very helpful Some of the staff  was not very helpful.
Unhappy Review: Restaurant menu was very limited

Review Title: Perfectly located hotel with super staff
Happy Review: 5 minutes from the airport. Incredibly clean.  Very welcoming staff and comfortable rooms. Really good service in the Lounge/restaurant and a particularly great guy on reception who couldn’t have been more helpful.  Continental Breakfast from 4am was really helpful.
Unhappy Review: Could have done with maybe one healthier dish on the menu but wouldn’t stop me returning.

Review Title: easy hassle free stay ,close to airport
Happy Review: proximity to airport, lovely homely hotel lobby, bedroom great size but decor maybe not as nice as lobby and communal areas...a little stark in comparison
Unhappy Review: proximity to airport but good public transport link to city if so wished

Happy Review: Friendly, good covid safety measures in place, vegan food was good.
Unhappy Review: Nothing was objectionable

Review Title: Relaxed stay over before early morning flight
Happy Review:
Clean sanitised room. Consiidering the hotel is a few minutes walk from the airport it is very quiet.
early flight and due to COVID take away continental breakfast bagged reasy to go..
Unhappy Review: Expected to be reduced evening menu and it was sorry to say not up to usual standard.

Happy Review: Warm welcome although the hotel appeared quite empty.
Unhappy Review: All satisfactory

Review Title: Can think of visit being bettered.
Happy Review:
Self, not into much breakfast. Wife very much enjoyed, eat well.
My wife has Dementia so this was the 'good bye' visit to friends of long standing. The condition can be difficult but the staff could not do enough to help. Lovely people.
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Lovely staff, exceptionally clean rooms and bathroom. And so easy to walk into the terminal at 4am!!
Unhappy Review: Incredibly small menu but I guess that’s due to the times we’re living in. But we managed and the food was good - especially the Korean chicken burger. The only slight negative was the size of the duvet - too small for the bed. But we were only in the bed for 4 hours before our flight so wasn’t too bad 😂

Happy Review: The rooms were lovely.  Shower especially excellent.
Unhappy Review: My bfast wasnt as warm as I would have liked but still edible. I appreciate it was very busy.

Review Title: Excellent service and very clean. Felt very safe  during these times.
Happy Review: Location and value for money

Review Title: You definitely pay for being close to the airport departures
Happy Review: The airport is so close to departures which is fabulous. The staff were very helpful and helped us with our problem.
Unhappy Review: We thought the room very basic for the price we paid for the room. You definitely pay for being right next to departures. Breakfast was included but as we had a 7 am flight got a bag with a few bits in. Not quite what we expected. Could do a better job of that.

Happy Review: Room was comfy and quiet.

Review Title: Next to the airport- great location for odd hour flights and very clean rooms.
Happy Review: We had an early morning flight and chose Hampton because it is literally 5 minutes walk away from the airport. Very comfortable location. Only downside was taxi to city center was rarely available and we had to wait for 30 minutes until we got ours. For early morning flight, the hotel had arranged takeaway breakfast including juice/coffee, croissant and a fruit. It could have been a bit better but i am not complaining as i am not much of an early morning breakfast person.
Unhappy Review: We took a three person occupancy room. The main bed was clean and comfortable but the sofa cum bed for the third person was very uncomfortable. That can certainly be worked upon.

Happy Review:
Walking distance to airport
Staff extremely friendly and helpful
Quiet rooms
Good bed
Fairly priced car park - not airport rates!
Breakfast was really good quality and the variety was excellent. The rooms was nice and clean. The bathroom was really good with shower gel and shampoo included.
Unhappy Review: Parking should be free considering the price of the rooms. Evening menu was not very good and the food quality didn't match the prices you charged. You shouldn't have to wait in a long que to get your parking ticket validated at the reception desk, they should have a better system in place for customers who have already booked in.

Happy Review: Very welcoming (Jez), very clean and comfortable room, very convenient location.
Unhappy Review:
Dinner meal choice was burger/pizza. Would have preferred "proper" (i.e. not fast food) dinner.
Breakfast was good, though.

Happy Review: Close to the airport
Unhappy Review: Food not great (cold) but they gave us free desert which made up for it, and not long been open so we have to understand that.

Happy Review: Great room and location.
Unhappy Review: My colleague arrived earlier but was not allowed to use the wifi as she was too early to check in.

Happy Review: The room was excellent and the location was perfect.
Unhappy Review: My colleague arrived early and was not allowed to use the wifi as she was too early to check in.

Review Title: Airport Hotel with a friendly vibe
Happy Review: Room was well laid out and clean. Location excellent for airport. Staff very friendly and helpful.
Unhappy Review: Due to current restrictions on holidays abroad, there were limited choices for food available at the hotel. It was however nicely done and the staff were excellent. I would suggest any allergies or food restrictions are advised in advance to ensure a choice would be made available. The hotel is perfect for flights out from Bristol Airport and parking at the multistorey. Overall, very good experience.

Happy Review: Location and cleanliness. Friendly helpful staff.
Unhappy Review: Room a bit chilly and I mentioned at checkout that 2 pillows would have been preferable.

Happy Review: Very friendly and helpful staff.
Unhappy Review: Having to pay car parking charges. They were discounted though.

Review Title: The staff were the best thing about this hotel.
Happy Review: We liked the staff. Extremely helpful and friendly and valued the customer. The location was perfect for a short walk to departures.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast should be optional in case it's not needed. Bathroom very cold. A towel rail would be good. Check bathroom linen as ours had a hole in it. Parking should be free. This is due to Bristol airport taking over the hotel car park so not the fault of the hotel but negotions could take place to rectify this. Beds were very hard.

Happy Review: Really handy for departures from airport. Access from car park is ramped and easy to get to hotel.
Unhappy Review: Serving meals and drinks can be slow depending on number waiting.

Happy Review: Good location to the airport
Croissant only, v early flight
Unhappy Review: Needs lift & covered way to airport

Review Title: Lovely stay, so close to airport after a long day. Comfortable, clean & tidy. Excellent breakfast!
Happy Review: Close to the airport, well sign posted. Comfortable bedroom, good shower, TV worked well. Bar was well stocked, staff friendly and professional. Breakfast was amazing, one of the best I’ve had in an airport hotel!
Unhappy Review:
Reception didn’t take my card details on check in and I needed to add this later when getting a drink from the bar. 
One side of bed was quite close to wall despite wide room.

Happy Review: Convenient, of course, and completely met my low expectations.
Unhappy Review: Overpriced, as cost of breakfast included, even though we flew too early.

Happy Review: Location was convenient to airport  Available food was excellent. Room was very nice. Staff very helpful.
Unhappy Review: Nothing to complain about.

Happy Review: Very friendly staff
Unhappy Review: Bit expensive for 1 night

Food gave me terrible stomach aches the next morning.

Happy Review: Everything

Review Title: Perfect for an overnight stay before early morning flight
Happy Review: Perfect for an overnight stay before an early morning flight as the hotel is less than a 5 min walk from the airport. We were 2 adults and 2 teens and had 2 spacious connecting rooms which were quiet and we all had a very good night's sleep. Great that breakfast was available from 4am and the staff were nice and friendly.
Unhappy Review: A bit pricey for a family of 4 for 1 night but we felt it was money well spent for the convenience.

Happy Review: The bathroom and bed are very satisfactory. The room is biggest and lied on bed then sleep fast.
Unhappy Review: I don’t like staff has lots of write each other, it’s really late, we need sleep early. 🤨

The room was sparkling and spacious too. Loved the 4am breakfast option and flight details on departure boards in the hotel.

Happy Review: Always stay here. Great place
Unhappy Review: N/A

Just felt that the H by H are totally exploiting the location of the hotel in relation to the airport. You expect to pay more, but not at the expense of service, quality or cleanliness. Next time I will be trying the small privately run hotel less than 5 minutes away.

Happy Review: Room was great, very comfy bed, pillows. Bathroom clean and well appointed
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: A  very mixed experience. Good, but not cheap hotel who failed to deliver on this occasion.
Happy Review:
After a serious problem the night staff led by Gill  did their best to resolve it.
While our sign in was unwelcoming, when Gill took over a few minutes later and dealt with my complaint, she was excellent and ensured that next morning we would have transport to collect our car. Great service, especially when compared to my comments below.
Unhappy Review: Poor communication. Through no fault of  the hotel the footpath was closed which meant a 10 minute walk with two  large cases, one of which had no wheels so a struggle for two aged 78. When we raised this at the hotel we received a totally unhelpful response at the hotel check in by a rather curt man on the desk. It appears that we should have received a message by text to say if we needed help then we could get it and how. No message ever came and the text that did only explained the path closure and the long walking route. There was supposed also to be a notice at the arrivals doorway, but nothing evident at 10.30 at night.

Happy Review: Excellent breakfast
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Location. Buffet breakfast. Comfy beds.
Unhappy Review: Car parking prices are simply extortionate

Happy Review: location
Unhappy Review:
Hi On booking we stipulated a room near the lift,this was on the booking form as my wife needs assistance mobility wise.We were given room 371 which is the furthest you can get from the lift.
  As it was only one night we put up with it.
  Very poor.

Review Title: Very impressive. A well designed hotel with travel in mind and the staff filled the space well!
Happy Review:
This hotel has looked carefully at the needs of travellers needing to make a quick getaway. 
The design of the rooms - and especially the bathroom - was exceptional . No bigger than most airport hotel rooms, it made excellent use of space. From the sliding bathroom door that 'closed'the wardrobe to the simply but thoughtfuly designed desk, bedside tables, multiple power points and superbly positioned shower controls and soap/shampoo this room had been carefully designed with the traveller in mind. No space wasted. Everything provided - even a safe. A+ facilities.   The front desk and bar staff also worked as a team in a well-designed lobby and cafe. Superb.
Unhappy Review: At first I did not like the fact that we couldn't book the room without breakfast - but - the way that they had set up the buffet  breakfast by the airport exit door was again so you could grab a quick bite en route. Again - very thoughtful layout and design.

Happy Review: My bedroom was really good. The  room was clean, the bathroom /shower was excellent. The breakfast the following morning was very good plenty of different choices to have.. All in all a pleasant stay.
Unhappy Review: I had an issue with my booking when I arrived.. The gentleman could not find my booking. I told him my name but continued to say he could not find it! I had to show him an email from my booking. He said my name was too long and the system did not show my surname. I felt quite stressed after having my journey to the airport. After much discussion it was sorted out.

Happy Review: Grim and dirty
Unhappy Review: Everything was poor

Unhappy Review: Nothing

My pre stay email requesting sheets and blankets if possible was quickly acknowledged .
On arrival told not available and accepted extra sheets, and told to ring 0 and ask for them. On doing this told blankets were available and would arrive. Later call to our room denied  their availability, In a somewhat fraught manner. 
Perhaps a better outcome could have been achieved by indicating that my request was not possible.
The other problem was dragging suitcases from the airport to the hotel when a long detour. Best wishes John Friend (A fit 87 yr old!)
